loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a 42-year-old man living in Kyenjojo,Uganda. He is a very hardworking man who deals in local brew and also sells produce such as maize and coffee. The good father that he is, he desires to see his children educated up to the University level. Unpredictable weather changes and price fluctuation affect his business growth. His dream is to add value to his business by processing the goods.

Patrick intends to use the loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Nicolas vive en la cálida ciudad de Aguaytia, ciudad en la cual podemos apreciar paisajes hermosos, ya que se encuentra en la selva peruana, asimismo hay muchos platillos típicos muy deliciosos y sobre todo sus pobladores son personas muy amables y hospitalarias.  Nicolas es una persona muy carismática y es así como pudo conquistar a su esposa con la cual tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 10 años, Nicolas ama a sus pequeños y por ello se esfuerza cada día para brindarles una vida digna y sobre todo para que sean personas de bien. Desde joven Nicolas aprendió a trabajar y más aun porque sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos y debido a ello solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero logro estudiar un curso de ebanistería y Carpintería y gracias a ello logro iniciar su negocio de taller de fabricación, refacción y venta de muebles de madera, asimismo también confecciona instrumentos musicales entre otros; el se levanta desde muy temprano para aperturar su negocio y trabaja hasta 10 horas al día. Nicolas cree que está saliendo adelante en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y siempre tiene diseños bonitos y con buenos acabados.

Nicolas está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para realizar mejoras en su vivienda y por ello comprara calaminas, clavos, entre otros, de esta manera podrá tener una vivienda más segura y le dará una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos y tener el taller más grande de su ciudad”.
texts.en:
Nicolas lives in the warm city of Aguaytia, a city in which we can appreciate beautiful landscapes in the Peruvian rainforest. Here, too, there are many very delicious typical dishes and, above all, the residents are very nice and hospitable people. Nicolas is a very charismatic person, and that is how he came to capture his wife, with whom he has 2 children, ages 5 and 10. Nicolas loves his little ones and for that reason, he works every day to provide them with a worthy life and, above all, to lead them to become good persons.

From an early age Nicolas learned to work, all the more because his parents had scarce economic resources. For that reason, he could only study to the 5th grade of secondary school. But he managed to complete a course in cabinetmaking and carpentry, thanks to which he was able to launch his business, a shop for woodworking, repair and selling wood furniture. He also makes musical instruments, among other things. Nicolas arises very early in the morning to open his business and works over 10 hours per day. He believes that his business is advancing because he treats his customers well and always offers attractive designs and good finished products. 

Nicolas is very grateful to Kiva investors. Thanks to the help they have offered, he is able to buy materials to make improvements to his home. For that purpose, he now wishes to buy corrugated iron sheets and nails, among other things. In this manner, he will make his home more secure and can offer a better quality of life to his family. Thus, he will continue struggling to make his grand dream become a reality: “To give a good education to his children and to have the largest shop in his city.”

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, and corrugated iron, among other supplies, for home improvement.

loans.name: Carina Bertha

texts.es:
Carina es una joven de 26 años de edad, es madre de un pequeño de 6 años de edad, el cual se encuentra estudiando el primer año de educación primaria, el es su razón de vivir y sobre todo el motor para salir adelante y seguir creciendo cada día; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, por sus atractivos turísticos como las “Islas Ballestas” y el “Candelabro de Paracas”; cuando Carina dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear con si hijo y en oportunidades aprovecha para disfrutar de su platillo favorito el cual es el riquísimo “Cau Cau; ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Hotelería y Turismo.

Co mucho entusiasmo Carina trabaja diariamente en su negocio de Bazar, que es una especie de tienda en la cual se vende diversos productos como regalos, productos de uso personal, peluches, entre otros; ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes de manera diaria; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es  muy amable y su negocio se ubica en una zona céntrica.

Carina está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su valiosa ayuda y con ello podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como peluches, productos de belleza, juguetes,porta retratos, carmines, entre otros, entre otros, lo que le permitirá tener mayores productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos, así ella podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Carina is a 26-year-old woman. She is the mother of a 6-year-old boy who is in the first year of his primary education. He is her reason for living and most of all, the impetus to move forward and continue growing every day. Her home is located in the city of Pisco, a city noted for its hot weather and tourist attractions such as the Ballestas Islands and the Paracas Candelabra. When she has free time, she likes to take walks with her son, and at times, to enjoy her favorite dish: the delicious Cau Cau. She only had a secondary education, but she would have liked to have studied Hospitality and Tourism.

With much enthusiasm, Carina works daily in her bazaar business, which is a type of store that sells various products such as gifts, personal products, and plush toys, among other things. She works in her store around 10 hours a day and can attend up to 30 customers daily. She believes that her business is going well because she is very kind and her business is located in a central zone.

Carina is very grateful for the Kiva lenders since this is the second time that they're offering her their valuable support with which she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business such as plush toys, beauty products, toys, picture frames, and lipsticks, among other things. This will allow her to have a larger number of products to offer to her customers and increase her income so that she will be able to continue working in order to accomplish her greatest dream: to study a career in the university and to provide her son with a good education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business such as picture frames, plush toys, and lipsticks, among other things.

loans.name: Juan Genaro

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se caracteriza por tener paisajes hermosos y sobre todo sus pobladores son personas muy amable y de un carácter muy jovial. Juan es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y es por ello que con mucho esfuerzo está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Forestal, ya que le gusta mucho esta carrera, y para solventar los gastos de sus estudios Juan trabaja como empleado en una empresa de su ciudad, el labora alrededor de 8 horas ya que por las noches va a su centro de estudios, el cree que esta saliendo adelante en su trabajo y estudios porque es muy responsable y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Juan esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales como cemento, calamina, clavos, entre otros; para realizar refacciones en su vivienda, ya que en época de verano hay lluvias fuertes y de esta manera podrá mejorar el techo para evitar que se inunde, así su familia tendrá una mejor calidad de vida y seguirá luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Juan is a 28-year-old young man. He lives in the city of Pucallpa, which is known for having a hot climate and for being warm and inviting. It is also known for having beautiful landscapes and, above all, for its citizens, who are very friendly and fun people. Juan is a young man with many dreams of succeeding and it is because of this that he is studying hard to become a forestry engineer, and he already loves his work. In order to manage the expense of his studies, Juan works as an employee in a company in the city, for which he works about 8 hours per day since he goes to the study center at night. He believes that he is succeeding in his work and his studies because he is very responsible and has many dreams of becoming successful.

Juan is very thankful for the Kiva loans since, thanks to the support that they have given him, he will be able to buy materials such as cement, iron, and nails, among other things, in order to make replacement parts for his house. He needs these because, in the summer time, there are very strong rains, and with the loan he will be able to improve his roof so that the house doesn't flood. In this way, his family will have a higher quality of life and he will continue to fight every day in order in order to realize his biggest dream: to finish his career and have his own house.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as cement and iron, among others, in order to improve his house.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 59 years old, married and has six children. She lives in Buenavista, Oroquieta City-Misamis Occidental.

To earn a living, Adelaida has a general store. She has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP500.00. Adelaida has requested a loan to purchase more stock for her general store, such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, and sugar, etc. 

Adelaida has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Adelaida hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store, such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, and sugar, etc.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is 60 years old and lives in Dolipos Alto, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married with six children. 
Emelia has a general store and earns approximately PHP3,000.00 each month. She has requested a loan to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, and sugar, etc.

Emelis has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Emelia hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store, such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap and sugar, etc.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
Lucy eses una joven de 32 años madre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere muchísimo, son el mayor regalo que Dios le ha dado y por ello lucha cada dia para poder brindarles una vida digna y sobre todo darles lo que ella no pudo tener de niña, ya que debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera encantado estudiar la carrera de contabilidad.

Cada día Lucy se levanta muy temprano para realizar los quehaceres del hogar y luego sale a visitar a sus clientes ya que ella tiene su negocio de venta de productos de belleza y zapatos por catalogo; ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 5 clientes diariamente y ella cree que esta saliendo adelante en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes.

Lucy está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá mejorar su vivienda ya que comprara madera, calamina, entre otros para poder arreglar su techo y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda y darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Lucy is a 32-year-old young lady. She is a mother to two children whom she loves very much; they are the greatest gift that God has given her and she fights every day in order to give them a good life, and above all to give them everything that she didn't have as a child, since due to few economic resources her parents were only able to let her study until the fourth grade of secondary school (9th grade), but she would have loved to have a career in accounting.

Every day, Lucy gets up very early in order to do the household chores and then leaves to visit her clients, since she has a business selling beauty products and shoes from a catalog. She works about nine hours per day and can attend to about five clients daily. She believes that she is getting ahead in business because she is very friendly with her clients.

Lucy is very thankful for the Kiva loans since, thanks to the help that they have brought her, she will be able to improve her home since she will buy wood, iron, and other materials in order to repair her roof. This will improve the quality of life for her family and she will be able to continue fighting in order to make her biggest dream a reality: to finish building her house and to give a good education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials such as wood and iron, among others

loans.name: Franklin Giovanny

texts.es: Franklin es un hombre de 32 años, él considera como su pasatiempo el hecho de trabajar, debido a que disfruta mucho dedicarse a la actividad que realiza, la misma que consiste en el alquiler de sonidos y luces, ya que con su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, el desarrolla esta labor durante toda la semana y es así como logra poder ofrecer sus servicios a un promedio de 5 clientes. Franklin sabe que este tipo de equipos son muy solicitados para fiestas o eventos especiales, también sabe que siempre hay que ofrecer un buen precio a sus clientes debido a la gran cantidad de competidores que existen en la ciudad de Ica, Perú, lugar en el que actualmente vive y trabaja. Él es consciente de que siempre hay que tener un dinero extra, es por esto que también trabaja como ayudante en una panadería. Franklin está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la tercera vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y podrá construir una pequeña habitación para poder guardar sus equipos de sonido, y de esta manera tener los equipos en un lugar más seguro; así Franklin seguirá luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”Tener la mayor empresa de equipo de sonido de la ciudad”.
texts.en:
Franklin is a 32-year-old man.  He considers his work to be his pastime because he very much enjoys making a living at his job, which is renting sound and lights.  With his job he's able to pay his household expenses.  He does this job all week and is able to offer his services to an average of five customers.

Franklin knows that this type of equipment is frequently requested for parties or special events.  He also knows that he has to offer his customers a good price because of the large number of competitors in the city of Ica, Peru, where he currently lives and works.  He's aware that one should always have some extra money.  This is why he also works as an assistant in a bakery.

Franklin's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because this is the third time they've been a big help to him, and he'll be able to build a small room to be able to store his sound equipment and have it in a safer place.  This way Franklin will continue striving every day to make his biggest dream a reality: "To have the biggest sound-equipment business in the city."

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Nilton Ysac

texts.es:
Nilton tiene 21 años de edad y tiene como pasatiempo el escuchar música sobre todo cuando han culminado sus exámenes, ya que Nilton se encuentra estudiando la carrera de electrónica en un instituto de su ciudad, Nilton a su vez trabaja como chofer de taxi y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de sus estudios y apoyar a sus padres en algunos gastos del hogar; Nilton es un joven muy trabajador, diariamente trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; el cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es responsable y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Nilton está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar juguetes al por mayor para poder venderlos en campaña navideña, de esta manera el tendrá un ingreso extra para solventar los gastos de sus estudios y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera de electrónica y ser el orgullo de sus padres”.
texts.en:
Nilton is 21 years old and likes to listen to music in his free time, especially when his exams are finished. He studies electronics at an institute in his city. 

Nilton works as a taxi driver. With the fruits of his labor, he can cover his tuition fees and help his family with some home expenses. Nilton is a very hardworking young man. He works for about 9 hours and serves up to 15 clients every day. He believes that he is succeeding at work because he is friendly to his clients, and above all because he is responsible and has the willpower to succeed.

Nilton is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, he will be able to buy wholesale toys to sell during the Christmas season. He will then have extra income to pay his tuition fees and continue fighting to make his greatest dream come true: to finish his electronics degree and to be a source of pride for his parents.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Rossimer Amparo

texts.es:
Rossimer tiene 36 años de edad y le encanta vender es por ello que después de mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de venta e productos para el hogar como ollas, sartenes, entre otros. Rossimer ofrece sus productos de casa en casa, ella transita por las calles de su ciudad, la cual es la calurosa y cálida ciudad de Pucallpa. Rossimer logro estudiar la carrera de administración de empresas y gracias a ello es muy organizada en su negocio, sobre todo Rossimer le pone mucho empeño ya que ella esta saliendo adelante debido a su esfuerzo y sobre todo su gran motivación, la cual son sus 2 hijos de 15 y 9 años a los que quiere muchísimo y por los cuales daría la vida.

Rossimer está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales como maderas, calaminas, clavos, entre otros para realizar arreglos en el techo de su vivienda ya que debido a las lluvias en ocasiones hay inundaciones en las viviendas y con el arreglo que va a realizar evitaría que esto pase; de esta  manera podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener un gran restaurante”.
texts.en:
Rossimer is 36 years old and she loves to sell, that is why after a lot of effort and saving she is able to start her own business selling household items like pots, pans, among others. Rossimer offers her products traveling from house to house through the streets of her city, which is the hot and enthusiastic city of Pucallpa. Rossimer was able to study Business Administration and thanks to it she is well organized in her business. Rossimer puts a lot of effort in her business, which is flourishing thanks to her work and her main source of motivation, her 2 sons of 15 and 9 years old, whom she loves dearly and would give her life for.  

Rossimer es very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the aid she has received she will be able to purchase materials like wood, corrugated iron, nails and more to repair the roof of her home. It is because of the rains that on occasion there is flooding in the housing and the repair will prevent this from happening. Thus she will be able to give a better quality of life and keep fighting to achieve her biggest dream: "To give a good education to her son and have a big restaurant".

loans.use: to purchase materials like corrugated iron, nails, wood, among others.

loans.name: Hilda Luz

texts.es:
Hilda es una mujer de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, es una mujer que ha pasado por muchas adversidades, hilda nos comento que hace algunos años lastimosamente sufrió la pérdida de su esposo, desde entonces ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, , ya que a raíz de esta pérdida Hilda saco fuerzas y decidió no dejarse vencer por nadie ni nada, a pesar de no tener una profesion ya que sus padres no tenían los medios económicos suficientes, pero a Hilda le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Enfermería .

Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Hilda trabaja en su pequeño negocio venta de comida, ella brinda desayunos desde tempranas horas de la mañana, Hilda puede trabajar por un aproximado de 8 horas diarias, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes. 

Hilda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una olla arrocera pequeña, sillas y podrá realizar la refacción de su refrigerador; de esta manera Hilda tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado para poder seguir brindando sus servicios, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para poco a poco poder ampliar su negocio y así poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Hilda is a 47 year old woman who lives in the city of Ica. She is a woman who has gone through a lot of adversity. Hilda told us that some years ago she suffered the loss of her husband. Since then, she has put all of her efforts into getting her family ahead. As a result of this loss, Hilda found strength an decided not to let her self be beater by anyone or by anything, despite not having a profession since her parents didn't have enough money. Hilda would have liked to study nursing. 

On her own initiative, with a lot of hard work and dedication, Hilda works day to day in her small business selling food. She offers breakfasts starting in the early hours of the morning. Hilda can work approximately 8 hours a day. She feels happy doing her work and believes that it is going well for her because of the friendly service she offers her customers.

Hilda is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she can buy a small rice cooker, chairs and a replacement part for her refrigerator. In this way, Hilda will have her business better set up to be able to keep offering her services. This way, she can keep working and striving to expand her business little by little and in this way get ahead.

loans.use: to buy a small rice cooker, chairs and a replacement part for her refrigerator.

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.es:
Jimmy es un joven de 27 años de edad, vive en la cálida ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por sus paisajes hermosos y también porque sus pobladores son personas muy amables y hospitalarias. Jimmy es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tal es así que el actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera de administración en la universidad de su ciudad, y para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios trabaja como empleado en una empresa, el labora alrededor de 9 horas y por las noches acude a su centro de estudios; Jimmy cree que esta saliendo adelante porque tiene muchas ganas de mejorar y sobre todo por su responsabilidad.

Jimmy está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar las refacciones del techo de su vivienda ya que comprar los materiales necesarios como calaminas, clavos, maderas, pinturas, entre otros, ya que en la ciudad de Pucallpa hay muchas lluvias y debido a ello se inundan las casas; con esta mejora el podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y tener su propia empresa”.
texts.en:
Jimmy is 27 years old. He lives in the warm city of Pucallpa, which is characterized by its beautiful landscapes and its friendly and hospitable people. 

Jimmy is a young man with a great desire to succeed. He is studying administration at the university in his city, and in order to pay his tuition fees he also works as an employee for a company. He works for about 9 hours every day before going to school at night. Jimmy believes that he is successful because he has the drive to improve, and above all because he is responsible.

Jimmy is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, he will be able to make repairs to the roof of his home by buying necessary materials such as corrugated metal sheets, nails, wood, and paint, among others. There are many rainstorms in the city of Pucallpa, which make the houses flood. 

He will now be able to provide a better quality of life for his family. He will continue fighting to make his greatest dream come true: to finish his degree and own his own business.

loans.use: to buy materials such as corrugated metal sheets, nails, and wood, among others.

loans.name: Yan Nestor

texts.es:
Yan tiene 19 años de edad y es un joven que ha tenido que pasar muchas adversidades, vive al lado de su tía quien lo ha criado como a un hijo ya que su madre lo entrego a esta tía porque no podía cuidarlo, es por ello que Yan aprecia mucho a su tía y sobre todo la quiere como si fuera su madre ya que ella le ha brindado mucho cariño y afecto. La vivienda de Yan se ubica en la cálida ciudad de Nazca, la cual es muy visitada por muchos turistas en todo el año. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de derecho.

Cada día Yan trabaja como albañil al lado de su tío, Yan labora alrededor de 10 horas al día pero depende siempre del tipo de construcción que realice; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y cuidadoso con los que realiza.

Yan está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá apoyar a su tía con la construcción de su vivienda, Yan comprar materiales de construcción como cemento y arena y de esta manera podrá apoyar a su tía y poder mejorar su calidad vida y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Yan is 19 years old. Although he is a young man, he has already been through many hardships. He lives with his aunt, who has taken care of him as if he were her own son. His mother gave him up to this aunt because she couldn't take care of him herself. Yan appreciates his aunt very much, and he loves her as if she were his mother because of the care and affection she has given him.

Yan's home is located in the warm city of Nazca, which is a popular year-round tourist destination. Due to his limited financial resources, he was only able to study until the fifth grade of secondary school, but he would have liked to study a law degree.

Every day, Yan works as a construction worker alongside his uncle. He works for about 10 hours per day, but it depends on the type of work he is doing. He believes that his job is going well because he is responsible and thorough in the work he does.

Yan is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, he will be able to support his aunt with the construction of her house. He will buy construction materials such as cement and sand. He will then be able to support his aunt and improve her quality of life. He will continue fighting to make his greatest dream come true: to study for a university degree.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
Felicita es una mujer muy trabajadora, a sus 66 años ella se siente muy joven y con mucha fuerza y salud para seguir trabajando y seguir adelante, ella vive en la ciudad de nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido y por la majestuosas líneas de nazca por la cual la ciudad recibe gran cantidad de turistas durante todo el año, Felicita es madre de 8 hijos los cuales ya son mayores y están casados, así mismo como buena peruana el platillo que más le agrada es el riquísimo "Lomo Saltado", Felicita solo estudio hasta el quinto año de educación secundaria ya que sus padre no tenían muchos recursos económicos pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Secretariado. 

Felicita trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes, al cual le dedica 12 horas diarias, 12 horas a las cuales le pone mucho empeño para vender sus productos, en un día puede atender hasta 30 clientes y es que Felicita cree que le va bien en su negocio porque trata a los clientes con mucho cariño y sobre todo porque se trata a los demás como quisiéramos que nos traten. 

Felicita está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que por segunda vez le brindan su gran apoyo y gracias a ello podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como chocolates, azucar, bebidas gaseosas, fideos al por mayor, entre otros y con ello mejorar su calidad de vida y obtener mayores ingresos para poder seguir ahorrando y poder realizar su más grande sueño:"Tener una bodega mucho más grande y exitosa"
texts.en:
Felicita is a very hard working woman who at 66 years of age feels very young and with a lot of strength and health to keep working and moving forward. She lived in the city of Nazca which is characterised by its warm climate and majestic lines for which the city receives a great deal of tourists all year round. Felicita is the mother of 8 children who are all of age and married and as a good Peruvian, the food that she likes the most is the rich "Lomo Saltado" [strips of beef marinated in vinegar, soy sauce and spices served with rice and french fries]. Felicita was only in school up to fifth grade as her parents didn't have much in the way of financial means but she would like to have taken a secretarial course.

Felicita works in her business selling groceries, to which she dedicates 12 hours a day, 12 hours into which she puts a lot of effort to sell her products. In one day she can have around 30 customers and Felicita believes her business is going well because she treats her customers with a lot of affection, above all because one should treat others and they want to be treated themselves.

Felicita is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as this is the second time that they offer her great support and she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business such as chocolates, sugar, sodas, bulk noodles and others. With this she'll also be able to improve her quality of life and obtain more income so that she can keep saving up and make her biggest dream come true: "To have a much bigger and more successful grocery store".

loans.use: buy more products for her business such as chocolates, sugar, sodas, bulk noodles and others

loans.name: Carlos Abel

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 26 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido, y también por desarrollarse la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de uva, espárragos, entre otros. Carlos es un joven muy trabajador, sobre todo con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. Día a día Carlos trabaja como empleado de limpieza en una institución de la ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y él cree que está saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo cuidadoso en su trabajo.

Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda, especialmente construirá una cerca de ladrillo, de esta manera podrá tener mayor seguridad en su vivienda ya que ahora estará cercada, así el podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Carlos is 26 years old and lives in the city of Ica, which is known for its warm climate and also for its farming, especially grapes, asparagus, among others. Carlos is a hard working young man, who above all uses the fruits of his work to support his parents with the household expenses. Carlos works day after day as a cleaner in an institution in the city. He works around 8 hours a day and he believes he is getting ahead with his job because he is responsible and above all careful in his work.

Carlos is very grateful for the Kiva loans as thanks to the help they have given him he will be able to make improvements to his house. In particular he will build a brick fence and in this way he will give his house great security as it will have a fence. The result will be an improvement to his family's quality of life and he will fight to fulfil his greatest dream: "To have a university degree".

loans.use: to build a fence.

loans.name: Chuija Group

texts.es:
La señora Magdalena  es madre viuda, tiene 37 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica a la confección de delantales y chumpas, inicio este negocio cono una pequeña maquiladora y hasta ahora lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su hijos quienes la apoyan en el trabajo que realiza.

Organiza un grupo y solicitan un  préstamo que lo utilizaran para la compra de materiales para su negocio, telas, cipers, hilos, adornos, y entre otras cosas, necesarias para su trabajo, espera en el futuro tener mas empleados y con exportación de otros productos de confección al exterior de Guatemala.
texts.en:
Sra. Magdalena, age 37, is a mother and a widow.  She did not have the opportunity to study.  Magdalena has four children, one of whom is in school.  She produces smocks and sweaters.  Magdalena’s business started out as a small workshop and now she has 10 years of experience.  She has the support of her children who help her with the work.  

Magdalena organized a group so that could request a loan.  She will use the proceeds to buy materials for her business such as fabrics, zippers, thread, ornaments, and other items that she needs for her work.  In the future, she hopes to have more employees and be able to export other manufactured goods to places outside of Guatemala.

loans.use: to buy materials for sewing.

loans.name: Angel Jesus

texts.es:
Angel es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo es una ciudad que se caracteriza por desarrollarse la agricultura en especial el cultivo de arroz, maíz, frejoles, entre otros. Día a día Angel trabaja como maestro constructor, el le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 2 clientes diariamente, ya que depende del tamaño de la obra que realice, Angel cree que le está saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Angel está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar madera para poder realizar sus trabajos de construcción, ya que actualmente tiene que alquilar las maderas y así el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Comprar un trompo mezclador”.
texts.en:
Angel is a very hardworking man. He lives in the city of Camaná, which is characterized as having a warm and pleasing climate. It is also a city described as having agriculture, especially growing corn, beans and more. Day to day Angel works as a master builder. He works around 10 hours a day and can attend to up to 2 customers a day, depending on the size of the job he does. Angel believes that he is getting ahead with his job because he is very friendly to the customers and above all because he really wants to get ahead.

Angel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to do some construction work. RIght now he has to rent the lumber and this way he can improve his income and keep working to be able to make his biggest dream come true: buying a mixer.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Alan Aleksander

texts.es:
Alan tiene 27 años de edad y le encanta jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos del barrio cuando tiene un tiempito libre, ya que el trabaja muy duro día a día ya que con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. Alan tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de arroz por sacos y ofrece sus productos en un espacio afuera de su vivienda, él le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas y puede atender hasta 8 clientes diariamente, el cree que está saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes. 

Alan está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio ( arroz por sacos) ya que tiene varios pedidos de clientes; de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener un local propio para su negocio”.
texts.en:
Alan is 27 years old and loves to play soccer with his friends and neighbors when he has free time since he works hard every day.  He uses his income to help his parents with their household expenses.  Alan has a small business selling sacks of rice and other products in a space outside his home.  He works at his business around 10 hours a day and can assist up to eight customers a day.  He believes that his work is doing well because he is nice to his customers.  

Alan is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since their help will allow him to purchase more merchandise (sacks of rice) for his business since he has orders from some customers.  This will allow him to improve his income and continue working toward making his greatest dream a reality: to have a store for his business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice.

loans.name: Keren Noelia Yamaly

texts.es:
Keren tiene 18 años, es soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Chiclayo, a pesar de ser tan joven ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos y apoyar a sus padres, no ha podido estudiar la carrera de Derecho que tanto desea, pero sueña con poder hacerlo algún día, en sus ratos libres le gusta preparar dulces y postres y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Cabrito a la Norteña para compartir con su familia.

Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, día a día Keren trabaja como vendedora en una tienda comercial de abarrotes de su ciudad, adicionalmente ella prepara deliciosos postres para su venda y también vende productos cosméticos, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y el trato amble que brinda a sus clientes.

Keren se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y  gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la comprar mercadería, tales como cosméticos y perfumes; de esta manera Keren tendrá su pequeño negocio mejor abastecido y acondicionado para poder ofrecer sus productos, así ella espera incrementar sus vetas e ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda ampliar su negocio y junto a su familia pueda salir adelante.
texts.en:
Keren is 18 years old. She is single and lives with her parents and siblings in the city of Chiclayo. In spite of being so young, she is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to achieve. Unfortunately, because of the need to work to pay her expenses and support her parents, she was not able to study for the career in law that she so much wanted, but she dreams of being able to do it someday. In her free time, she likes to prepare sweets and desserts, and sometimes she cooks a very delicious "cabrito a la norteña" (goat northern style) to share with her family.

With much effort and enthusiasm, Keren works every day as a sales person in a grocery store in her city. In addition, she prepares delicious desserts to sell and also sells cosmetic products. She can work about 10 hours [a day] and feels that it is going well for her because of her dedication and the kind treatment that she offers her customers.

Keren is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since this is the second time that they have offered her their great support, and thanks to the help offered, she will be able to make the purchase of merchandise such as cosmetics and perfumes. In this way Keren will have her little business better stocked and set up to offer her products. Thus she hopes to increase her sales and income, which will help her a lot so that in the not too distant future she can expand her business and be able to advance, along with her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (cosmetics and perfumes)

loans.name: Paul Ricardo

texts.es:
Paul es un joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima templado, así como también por que en esta ciudad de cultiva el limón, arroz, entre otros. Paul ha tenido muchas dificultades, en especial eocnomicas, es por ello que solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero a el le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Mecanica. Paul es muy trabajador, el se dedica a su trabajo como chofer de mototaxi, el ofrece sus servicios de transportes por todas las calles de su ciudad, y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar; Paul cree que el va bien en el trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y conduce con responsabilidad.

Paul está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general de su vehículo y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Paul is a 19-year old young man.  He lives in the city of Guadalupe, which is known for its temperate climate and for growing lemons, rice and other items.  Paul has had a lot of difficulties, in particular financial difficulties.  Because of that, he was only able to go to school through 5th grade.  He would have liked to have studied mechanics.  Paul is very hard-working and makes his living driving a "mototaxi" (a trike used to transport passengers).  He offers his transportation services all over his city.  With the fruits of his work, he helps his parents with the household expenses.  Paul believes work is going well for him because he is very friendly with his customers and he drives responsibly. 

Paul is very grateful for the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they provided him with, Paul will be able to provide general maintenance for his vehicle.  And he will then be able to improve his income and keep working toward making his biggest dream a reality, owning his own house.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
Efrain vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe. La ciudad de Guadalupe se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y en el cual podemos apreciar sitios arqueológicos de "Pakatnamú", "Farfán", "Caracoles", entre otros. Efraín desde muy joven aprendió sobre el trabajo ya que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos. Tal es así que debido a sus pocos recursos económicos el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria.

Cada día Efraín trabaja como vigilante de un centro de esparcimiento de su ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y con el fruto puede su trabajo puede sacar adelante a su hijo de  4 años de edad, a quien saca adelante solo ya que la madre de su hijo se separo de él y desde ese momento se convirtió en madre y padre para él; Efraín cree que está saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo honrado.

Efrain está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar zapatos para implementar su negocio de zapatería, de esta manera podrá tener un ingreso extra y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y luchar por convertir en realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y poder tener su casa propia.”
texts.en:
Efrain lives in the city of Guadalupe. The city of Guadalupe is known to have a very warm climate where one can appreciate the archaeological sites of Pakatnamú, Farfán, and Caracoles, among others. Efrain learned when he was very young about working since his parents had few economic resources. It was because of scarce resources that he could only attend school through the fifth grade.

Efrain works every day as a security guard at a city recreation center. He works about ten hours a day and with what he earns from his work he is bringing up his 4 year old son. He is bringing him up on his own as the child’s mother separated from him and from that moment be became mother and father to him. Efrain believes that he is getting ahead in his work because he is responsible and above all honest.

Efrain is grateful to Kiva lenders and thanks to help that they have given he can buy shoes to establish a shoe business so he will have extra income to improve his quality of life and to fight in order to achieve his biggest dream, “to provide a good education to his son and to be able to have his own house.”

loans.use: to buy shoes for a new shoe business he is establishing.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 29 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Jorge no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ir de pesca con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jorge trabaja como chofer de taxi, brindando servicios de transporte, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien porque conoce las zonas más concurridas y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de llantas y hacer el mantenimiento general de su vehículo, de esta manera tendrá su herramienta de trabajo en mejores condiciones y podrá atener de más clientes, así pues Jorge seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Jorge is 29 years old and single, and lives in the city of Camana.  He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire for improvement.  Unfortunately due to a lack of economic resources and a need to work to pay his expenses he was unable to study for a professional career, although he would have liked to do so.  In his free time he likes to go fishing with his friends and sometimes cook a delicious "lomo saltado" [a Peruvian beef dish] to share with his family.  On his own initiative, and with great effort and dedication, Jorge works as a taxi driver providing transportation services.  He works every day starting early in the morning, and can work for about 10 hours.  He is happy doing his work and believes that it is going well for him because he knows the most popular areas and because of the friendly service that he provides to his customers. Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they are providing he will be able to buy tires and do general maintenance on his vehicle.  Thus he will have his work tool in better condition and can serve more customers.  He will then be able to continue working and trying to get ahead, to achieve his great dream of owning his own house.

loans.use: to buy tires and pay for maintenance of his vehicle

loans.name: Carmen Barbarita

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer con una alegría contagiante y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, sobre todo porque es madre de un hijo el cual ahora ya es mayor de edad pero por el cual ha luchado mucho para poder brindarle una buena calidad de vida y sobre todo mejores oportunidades. Carmen día a día trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes en un espacio que ha acondicionado en su vivienda, ella trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes de manera diaria, también en algunas ocasiones realiza trabajos de costura con lo cual tiene un dinero extra para los gastos del hogar; ella cree que está saliendo adelante con su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a precios cómodos.

Carmen está contenta y sobre todo agradecida por el apoyo que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a este apoyo ella comprar mercadería para su negocio como arroz y azúcar por sacos, fideos al por mayor, conservas, entre otros; de esta manera podrá abastecer su negocio con más variedad de productos y mejorar sus ingresos, de esta manera ella seguirá luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”Tener una empresa de confecciones”.
texts.en:
Carmen is a woman with an infectious happiness and she very much wants to get ahead. This is because she has a son who is grown up but for whom she has fought hard to be able to offer him a good quality of life and better opportunities. Day to day, Carmen works in her small business selling groceries in a space she has converted in her home. She works there about 10 hours a day and can have up to 20 daily customers. Sometimes she takes on sewing work which gives her a bit more money towards the household bills. She believes that she is doing well with her business because she is friendly with the customers and also because she offers quality products at good prices.

Carmen is happy and especially thankful for the support that Kiva lenders have offered her, as thanks to this support she can buy merchandise for her business, such as sacks of rice and sugar, noodles in bulk, jams etc. In this way she will be able to stock up her business with a larger variety of products and increase her income. This will allow her to continue fighting to make her biggest dream come true: to have a dress-making business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Mabel Katherine

texts.es:
Mabel es una mujer de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Mabel no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mabel trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Mabel se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, como arena, cemento, ladrillos y otros, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder hacer refacciones en una habitación de su vivienda, de esta manera Mabel podrá brindar mayor bienestar y seguridad para su familia, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio puesto de ventas y así poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Mabel, 21 years old, is single. She lives in the city of Ica with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly person, hardworking and enthusiastic who has a great desire to get ahead. Unfortunately, because of few financial resources, it was necessary for her to work to help with household expenses. Mabel was not able to study to be a nurse, but she would have liked very much to do it. In her free time she likes to watch television and sometimes to cook the tasty Aji de Gallina (chicken stew) to share with her family.

Through her own initiative, with a lot of effort and hard work, Mabel works in her own small business selling clothing for women, men and children. She works every day from early morning hours for approximately 12 hours. She is happy in her work and believes that it is going well because of good prices and the friendly service she offers her customers.

Mabel is grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to the help she can buy sand, cement, bricks and other items which will help a lot to make repairs to her housing, providing a way for Mabel to be able to offer security and wellbeing to her family. So she will continue working and striving to achieve her big dream of having her own sales facility so she can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Hector Ruben

texts.es:
Ruben es un hombre muy trabajador, vive al lado de su esposa y de su pequeño hijo de 8 años de edad, el cual es su adoración y por el cual lucha cada día para darle una buena calidad de vida, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Camana, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus hermosas playas, así como también por su agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz y también por los riquísimos camarones. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos de su barrio, asimismo le gusta disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo Arroz chaufa.

Con mucho entusiasmo Ruben trabaja día a día en su negocio como maestro constructor, él le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 5 clientes de manera diaria, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo tiene buenos acabados.

Ruben está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran ayuda y gracias a ello gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar madera para su negocio, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia; así el podrá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y una buena calidad a su familia”.
texts.en:
Ruben is a very hardworking man. He lives with his wife and his 8 year old son, who he adores and for whom he struggles every day to provide a better quality of life. His house is in the city of Camana, known for beautiful beaches, agriculture (particularly rice), and also for their delicious shrimp. When he has free time he likes to play soccer with his neighbors and friends who live close by. He also likes to enjoy one of his favorite dishes, fried rice. 

Ruben works enthusiastically every day in his job as a construction master. He works 10 hours a day and can attend to up to 5 customers in a day. He believes that his business is going well because he's very responsible and above all because he provides a good finished product. 

Ruben is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since this is the second time they have given him their help. Thanks to them, he will be able to buy wood for his business, which will allow him to increase his income and give his family a better quality of life. He will also be able to keep fighting to realize his greatest dream: "Giving his son a good education and his family a good quality of life."

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Liseth Carolina

texts.es:
Liseth tiene 22 años de edad, es una joven que tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, y es por ello con mucho esfuerzo logro estudiar la carrera de ingeniería eléctrica, a pesar de sus estudios no pudo encontrar empleo de acuerdo a su carrera, es por ello que luego de  un tiempo logro conseguir empleo en una empresa como vendedora. Día a día Liseth trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día ya que con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Liseth cree que está saliendo adelante por su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo trabaja con muchas ganas cada día.

Liseth está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una cocina a gas, ya que actualmente cocina a leña y con esta mejora podrá evitar accidentes y así poder trabajar más tranquila sabiendo que su familia esta mas segura y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su negocio propio y seguir ayudando a su familia”.
texts.en:
Liseth is 22 years old and is a young woman with a great desire to get ahead, which is why she earned a degree in electrical engineering with great effort. In spite of her studies she was not able to find work in her career, so after a while she got a job with a company as a saleswoman. Day after day Liseth works about 10 hours a day, as from the fruits of her labor she is able to help her family with their living expenses. Liseth believes that she is getting ahead in her work because she is very responsible and above all because she is very invested in her work, every day.

Liseth is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their help she will be able to buy a gas stove, since she currently cooks with firewood. With this improvement she and her family will be able to avoid accidents. She will thus be able to work more calmly knowing that her family is safer, and fight to make her biggest dream a reality: "To have her own business and keep helping her family."

loans.use: to buy a stove

loans.name: Jorge Martin

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Jorge se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Industrial, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las acogedoras calles de su ciudad y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jorge trabaja como Asistente Contable, en una empresa  comercial de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una moto lineal, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder transporte hacia su trabajo, ya que actualmente vive en un lugar muy alejado de la ciudad, de esta manera el podrá ahorrar un poco de dinero para poder utilizarlos en otras necesidades, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia empresa.
texts.en:
Jorge, a young man of 20, lives in the city of Chincha with his wife and their two small children, who he loves are are his main reason for living. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of his efforts to get his family ahead. Thanks to his work and the support of their parents, Jorge is studying Industrial Engineering in college. In his free time he likes to walk through the inviting streets of his city, and sometimes he cooks a delicious Arroz con Pato [rice with duck] to share with his family.

By his own initiative, with a lot of tenacity and dedication, Jorge works as an assistant accountant in a commercial business in his city. He works every day from early in the morning, and can work up to 10 hours. He is happy doing his work and believes that it's going well because of his performance and the friendly way he treats others.

Jorge is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help he will be able to buy a motorcycle which will help him get to work since he lives far outside the city. This way he will save a little bit of money to use for other necessities. He will continue working and making an effort to achieve his biggest dream of having his own business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Daysi Pamela

texts.es:
Daysi tiene de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus 2 pequeños hijos a quienes ama y son el regalo más grande que Dios le ha dado y son su razón principal de vivir, a pesar de ser tan joven ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante; debido a la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres y solventar sus gastos solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero sueña con poder estudiar la carrera de secretariado  algún día, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las calurosas calles de la ciudad y en algunas ocasiones cocina los deliciosos Juanes (plato típico de su ciudad) para compartir con su familia. Con mucho empeño, gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre, día a día Daysi puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, tales como: cecina, chorizo, tacaco y otros potajes típicos de su ciudad, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y puede atender a un promedio de 20 clientes, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien ya que sus clientes la buscan por su buena sazón y por su trato amble.

Daysi se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y gracias a ello podrá realizar la compra de insumos, tales como: arroz, azúcar, carne de cerdo, condimentos, hojas de bijao, entre otros; de esta manera Daysi contará con los insumos necesarios para preparar sus deliciosos platillos como arroz, azucar por saco, entre otros, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales desea utilizar para que en un futuro poder realizar su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación y bienestar de sus pequeños”.
texts.en:
Daysi, 23, lives in the city of Pucallpa with her two small children, whom she loves and who are her biggest gift from God and her main reason for living.  Despite being so young, she's a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who very much wants to get ahead.  She only was able to study up to the fifth year of secondary school because she needed to work to help her parents and pay for her expenses, but she dreams of being able to study to be a secretary someday.  In her free time she likes to walk through the welcoming streets of the city, and sometimes she cooks some delicious Juanes (a traditional dish of her city) to share with her family.

With a lot of effort, and thanks to her mother's teaching, every day Daysi sets up her small business selling food, such as cured meat, chorizo, tacaco, and other traditional dishes of her city.  She spends about 10 hours a day on her business and can serve an average of 20 customers.  She's comfortable doing her job and believes it's going well for her because her customers go to her for her good seasoning and her friendly service.

Daysi's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because it's the second time they've given her a lot of support, thanks to which she'll be able to buy rice, sugar, pork, condiments, bijao leaves, and other supplies.  This way Daysi will have the supplies she needs to make her delicious dishes, such as rice, sugar by the bag, and others.  With this she hopes to increase her sales and her income, which she wants to use in the future to achieve her biggest dream: "To give her little ones a good education and well-being."

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and other supplies

loans.name: Luisa Gladys

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer de 50 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus cuatro hijas, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para sus hijas; gracias a su esfuerzo Luisa pudo estudiar pequeños cursos de repostería, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar y en alguna de estas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Luisa trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de pasteles, como queques, flanes, alfajores y otros, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Luisa se encuentra muy agradecida, con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una pequeña refrigerado y una vitrina, los cuales le servirán de mucho para acondicionar mejor su negocio e iniciar ventas de bebidas en la época de verano, así pues Luisa seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia pastelería.
texts.en: Luisa is 50 years old and lives in the city of Canete, in the district of Imperial, with her four children whom she loves and who are the focus of her life.  She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of her efforts to raising her family, because she is both mother and father to her children.  Thanks to her efforts Luisa has been able to take some confectionery courses.  In her free time she likes to cook, and sometimes cooks a delicious "carapulcra con sopa seca" [a Peruvian pork and potato stew with spaghetti] to share with her family.  On her own initiative, and with great effort and dedication, Luisa works in her small cake business selling products such as cakes, flan, cookies and others.  She works every day starting early in the morning, and can work for about 8 hours.  She is happy doing her work and believes that it is going well because of the good flavors of her products and the friendly service that she provides to her customers.  Luisa is very grateful to Kiva lenders for the help that they are providing, because with it she will be able to buy a small fridge and a display case which will improve her business and allow her to start selling drinks in summer.  In this way she will be able to continue working and trying to get ahead, to achieve her great dream of having her own cake shop.

loans.use: to buy a fridge and a display case.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela is 61 years old and lives in Casusan, Aloran Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married with 7 children. 

Marcela works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. She has requested a loan to purchase more fish to sell for  her fish vending business. Marcela has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. 

In the future, Marcela hopes to have more savings for her family's financial needs.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell for  her fish vending business.

loans.name: Anecia

texts.en: Anecia is married and has one child. She is 52 years old and lives in Tubod, Aloran Misamis Occidental, Philippines. To earn a living, Anecia has a pig business. She has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns approximately 5,000 PHP. She has requested a loan  to purchase more feeds for her pigs business Anecia has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, Anecia hopes to have more savings to support her family's financial needs.

loans.use: to purchase more feeds for her pigs business

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en: Lourdes is married and has three children. She is 45 years old and lives in Poblacion 2, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. Lourdes had a general store business to earn a living and has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap,vinegar and salt for her general store business. Lourdes has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Lourdes hope to have more savings for her children education.

loans.use: to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap,vinegar and salt for her general store business.

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en: Amelita Undagh is married and has two children. She is 48 years old and lives in Talairon Oroquieta City. Amelita is engaged in general store business to earn a living and has had this business for six years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this work. She has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, vinegar, salt and other consumable products for her general store business. In the future, Amelita hope to have more savings for her children education.

loans.use: to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, vinegar, salt and other consumable products for her general store business.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is 71 years old and lives in Canubay, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philiuppines. She is married with four children. 
Lucita has a dress-making business. She has a requested a loan to  purchase more stock of cloth  on her dress making business. 
Lucita has been a member of PMPC for nine years. In the future, Lucita hopes to have more savings for the development of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of cloth  on her dress making business.

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
Lea is married with 3 children. Lea is 33 years old and lives in Dansalan, Labason Zamboanga del Norte.
To earn a living, Lea has a financial services (lending). She has had this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns approximately 10,000. Lea has been a member of PMPC for 2 years.
In the future, Lea hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: additional capital for lending

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is 55 years old and lives in Conat, Aloran Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married and has three children. 
Leonida has a general store and earns approximately 10,000 PHP each month doing this work. She has requested a loan to purchase more stock such as shampoo,toothpaste,soap,vinegar,and salt for her general store business. Leonida has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Leonida hopes to have more savings for her children education.

loans.use: to purchase more stock such as shampoo,toothpaste,soap,vinegar,and salt for her general store business.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is married with two children. Rosemarie is 35 years old and lives in Caputol, Aloran Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

To earn a living, Rosemarie has a piggery. She has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 3,000. Rosemarie has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Rosemarie hopes to save more for her children education.

loans.use: to purchase piglets.

loans.name: Genevieve

texts.en: Genevieve is married and has three children. She is 32 years old and lives in Dolipos Alto, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. To earn a living, Genevieve has a hog fattening business. She has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns approximately 3,000 PHP. She has requested a loan to purchase more feeds for her pigs. Genevieve has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Genevieve hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase more feeds for her pigs

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La Sra. Maria tiene 35 años, tiene dos hijos de las edades de 11 y 12 años, se dedica a la venta de variedad de equipos para gimnasio, tiene una tienda en una zona céntrica de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Maria va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un equipo de gimnasio  ya que le hicieron un pedido y de esta manera brindar este producto a sus cliente ya que no lo tiene en la tienda,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, con el anterior credito le fue bien compro equipos para su negocio, La Sra. Maria va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener un atienda con todos los equipos de gimnasio, La Sra. Maria es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 35 years old and has two children, ages 11 and 12 years.  She makes her living selling a variety of gym equipment.  She has a store in a central zone in the city of Cochabamba.

This loan is her third within the institution.  Maria is going to use this loan to buy gym equipment that has been ordered from her, and so that she can offer this product to her clients since she doesn't have it in the store.  Her reason for applying for this loan is to continue improving her business.  

Maria is going to use the benefits to continue buying products and thus improve her income.  Her desire for her business is to have a store with all the gym equipment.  Maria is a very hardworking person.  She is happy for the opportunity provided to her, since this is the only activity that allows her to support her family.

loans.use: to buy gym equipment.

loans.name: Lilia Rogelia

texts.es:
Lilia es una mujer de 49 años de edad pero con una alegría y las  ganas de vivir y salir adelante de una joven de 20 años, Lilia es madre de un pequeño de 2 años de edad por el cual daría la vida ya que es lo más importante que tiene en la vida y es su motor y motivo para seguir adelante. La vivienda de Lilia se ubica en el distrito de Santiago, el cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se cultivan los productos como el algodón, la uva, el esparrago, entre otros. Lilia estudio la carrera de educación, pero debido a que no encontraba empleo y luego de mucho ahorro logro tener su negocio de venta de productos para el hogar, al cual le dedica alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede llegar a atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque  es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque les ofrece productos de calidad a precios cómodos.

Lilia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como vasos, platos, jarras, entre otros, de esta manera ella podrá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa”.
texts.en:
Lilia is a 49-year-old woman with the happiness and desire to live and get ahead of a 20-year-old.  Lilia's the mother of a small child, 2, for whom she would give her life because he's the most important thing in her life and her driving force and motivation for getting ahead.  Lilia's house is in the Santiago district, which is known for having a warm and welcoming climate.  They also grow cotton, grapes, asparagus, and other crops there.

Lilia studied education but she didn't find work.  Then, after saving a lot, she was able to have her business selling household products.  She works around 10 hours a day and can serve up to 15 customers.  She believes it's going well for her in her business because she's friendly with the customers and especially because she sells quality products at affordable prices.

Lilia's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy glasses, plates, mugs, and other merchandise for her business.  This way she'll be able to have a greater variety of products to sell and to continue striving every day to be able to make her biggest dream a reality: "To finish building her house."

loans.use: to buy glasses, plates, mugs, and other merchandise

loans.name: Rocio Angelica

texts.es:
Rocio es una joven de 18 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial se cultiva el algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros. Rocio trabaja desde pequeña, debido a que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos y tuvo la necesidad de apoyarlos y debido a ello solo logro estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria; pero a pesar de ello Rocio se esfuerza cada día por salir adelante.

Luego de mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Rocio logro iniciar su negocio de venta de desayunos, ella empieza su trabajo desde las 4 de la mañana ya que a esa hora hay muchas personas que se encuentran esperando los buses para ir a trabajar a los fundos y mayormente no desayunan por ello Rocio les ofrece sus ricos platillos y tal es así que diariamente puede atender hasta 25  clientes en el día; ella cree que está saliendo adelante en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo tiene buena sazón.

Rocio está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una congeladora para poder conservar mejor los insumos que utiliza como verduras y carne y de esta manera no comprarlas de manera diaria; así ella mejorara la atención a los clientes, incrementara sus ingresos y seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Rocio is a young woman of 18.  She lives in the city of Ica, which is known for its warm, comfortable climate.  It is also a farming city specializing in cotton, grapes, asparagus, and other crops.  Rocio has worked since she was a little girl, as her parents did not have a lot of money and she had to help them.  Because of that, she was only able to attend school until the fifth grade, but despite that Rocio works every day to get ahead.

After a lot of hard work and saving, Rocio was able to start her business selling breakfasts.  She starts her work at four in the morning, as at that time there are a lot of people waiting to take the bus to work on farms and most of them have not had breakfast.  That is why Rocio offers them her delicious dishes and she can serve up to 25 customers per day.  She believes that she is getting ahead with her business because she is very nice to her customers and above all because everything is very well seasoned.

Rocio is very thankful to Kiva's lenders as it is thanks to the help they have offered her that she will be able to buy a freezer to preserve her ingredients better, such as vegetables and meat, so she will not have to buy them every day.  This will improve the service she provides to her customers and increase her income and she will keep working to be able to make her greatest dream a reality: owning her own home.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Gino Andru

texts.es:
