Gino is 21 years old and lives in Chincha, Peru. Chincha is a region that has deep roots in Afro-Peruvian culture. The rich culture is complimented by a rich cuisine. Gino particularly enjoys a traditional dish called Carapulcra con sopa seca. He works hard to make ends meet as a single young man.

Gino is a beer salesman and a taxi driver. He works at least seven hours every day, and believes that he has found success because of his charismatic personality and high quality products. He works both jobs on his volition, and in addition to this already busy life, he sometimes works as a computer technician. 

He has requested this loan for personal development—he would like to improve his home by purchasing cement to put on his walls and finishing the installation of water and light. This will give more tranquility and a better quality of life. In six months, he hopes to have better sales and create a growing base of loyal clientele. His ultimate dream is to have his own home and study more technical maintenance.
texts.en:
Gino is 21 years old and lives in Chincha, Peru. Chincha is a region that has deep roots in Afro-Peruvian culture. The rich culture is complimented by a rich cuisine. Gino particularly enjoys a traditional dish called Carapulcra con sopa seca. He works hard to make ends meet as a single young man.

Gino is a beer salesman and a taxi driver. He works at least seven hours every day, and believes that he has found success because of his charismatic personality and high quality products. He works both jobs on his volition, and in addition to this already busy life, he sometimes works as a computer technician. 

He has requested this loan for personal development—he would like to improve his home by purchasing cement to put on his walls and finishing the installation of water and light. This will give more tranquility and a better quality of life. In six months, he hopes to have better sales and create a growing base of loyal clientele. His ultimate dream is to have his own home and study more technical maintenance.

loans.use: To improve his surroundings.

loans.name: Elias Isaias

texts.es:
Elias es un joven de 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, se cultivan productos típicos de la zona como son los pallares, frejoles, uva, algodón, entre otros. Co n cada amanecer Elias sale a trabajar como chofer de mototaxi, el le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente, el cree que está saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y también porque conduce de manera responsable. 

Elias está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han  brindado el podrá comprar  una mototaxi, ya que actualmente la que conduce es alquilada, de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y poder tener un vehículo propio, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Elías, 28, is a young man who lives in the city of Ica which is known for its warm, welcoming climate.  The typical crops grown in the area are lima beans, beans, grapes, cotton and others.  Every morning Elías goes out with his motor-taxi and spends about nine hours a day attending to up to 15 customers.  He believes his business is doing well because he is kind to customers and drives responsibly.

Elías is very grateful to Kive lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy his own motor taxi.  He rents the one he currently uses, so he will be able to increase his income with his own vehicle.  This will allow him to continue in his daily struggle toward reaching his goal:  "To have his own home".

loans.use: To buy a motor-taxi.

loans.name: Marcia Thais

texts.es:
Marcia es un joven de 19 años de edad, la cual vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad en la cual se produce uno de los licores bandera del Perú, el cual es el riquísimo “Pisco”. Marcia con mucho esfuerzo se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Administración , y para poder solventar sus gastos ella trabaja como secretaria en  una institución de su ciudad, ella labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, asimismo tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza con lo cual tiene un dinero extra para sus gastos; ella cree que está saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es muy responsable, puntual y sobre todo realiza sus labores con cuidado.

Marcia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza, así ella podrá mejorar sus ingresos ya que tendrá más variedad de productos para ofrecer y también podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y ser una buena profesional”.
texts.en:
Marcia, 19, is a young woman who lives in the city of Ica, where one of the most famous liqueurs in Peru, "Pisco", is produced.  Marcia is studying hard to complete her Business Administration degree and works as a secretary at a local high school to cover her expenses.  She works eight hours a day and is able to help her parents with household expenses.  She also has a small business selling beauty products, which gives her extra money for her personal use.  She believes business is doing well because she is very responsible, punctual and, above all, meticulous in her work.

Marcia is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to them she will be able to buy merchandise for her small beauty products business.  This will allow her to improve her income since she will have a wider variety of goods to offer.  She will also be able to continue working toward her biggest goal, which is:  "To finish her degree and be a good professional".

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as lipstick, creams, eyeshadows, etc.

loans.name: Felix

texts.en: Felix is a 44 year old married man and a father of four children from Getafe, Bohol, Philippines. He is engaged in tricycle transport business for more than two years now. Felix needs a loan to buy fuel and spare parts for motorcycle like nuts and bolts. With this, he will be able to maintain the good working condition of the tricycle thus allowing him to use it to earn a living. In the future, Felix hopes of making his business a success. Moreover, he plans of exploring another venture to augment his income.

loans.use: to buy fuel and spare parts for motorcycle like nuts and bolts

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph still runs his general store business, and he now supports a family of three. He has borrowed another loan of KES 50,000, after having successfully repaid his previous loan. He intends to use the loan to purchase more stock for his retail shop.

He anticipates earning profit, part of which he will use to pay school fees for his children. The rest he will plow back into the business.

loans.use: To expand the business by buying inventory in larger quantity, like sugar, flour, cooking fat, tea leaves and salt.

loans.name: Grecia Gabrielle

texts.es:
Grecia es una joven de 20 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, en la cual se encuentra playas hermosas, sobre todo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, frejoles, entre otros.  Desde muy pequeña aprendió a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente ya que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos y tenía la necesidad de apoyarlos; debido a ello Grecia solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Día a día Grecia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y lencería para damas, caballeros y niños, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo ofrece productos a precios cómodos y de buena calidad.

Grecia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como polos, ropa interior, entre otros para poder abastecer su negocio para la temporada de verano, así podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y podrá mejorar su ingresos; lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local propio para su negocio”.
texts.en:
Grecia, 20, is a young woman who lives in the city of Camaná, a place with beautiful beaches and a main occupation of farming, especially of crops such as rice, beans and others.  From a very early age, Grecia learned to work hard to earn a living because her parents had scarce resources and she wanted to help them.  She could only study as far as the fifth level of secondary school, but would have liked to go to the university.

Every day Grecia works selling women's, men's and children's clothing and underwear, spending about ten hours a day attending to up to some 20 customers.  She believes business is going well because she is kind to her customers and, mainly, offers low prices and good quality.

Grecia is very grateful to Kiva lenders who have helped her buy merchandise for her business, such as polo shirts, underwear and other items for the summer season.  This will allow her to offer a wider variety of products and increase her income, giving her continued work so she can reach her goal:  "To have her own shop".

loans.use: To buy clothing for the summer season.

loans.name: Socorro Del Carmen

texts.es: Socorro es una emprendedora que tiene una pulpería desde hace diez años, es casada, con 49 años de edad y madre de dos hijos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos como arroz, azúcar, chiverías, café, cloro, naturas, sopas magi, cremas, fósforos, productos lácteos, carne de res, carne de pollo.
texts.en: Socorro’s an entrepreneur who has had a grocery store for ten years.  She’s married and 49-years-old; she’s the mother of two children.  She’ll use the loan to buy basic grains like rice and sugar, snacks, coffee, chlorine bleach, vegetables, Maggi soups, creams, matches, dairy products, beef and chicken.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Alcira Del Socorro

texts.es: Alcira es una emprendedora que se dedica  a la venta de comida, es madre de dos hijos, casada, esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace un año. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como plátano, aceite, leña, carne de pollo, papas, zanahoria, queso, ingrediente, vinagre etc.
texts.en: Alcira is an entrepreneur who sells food. She is married, the mother of two children, and has been doing this work for a year. She will use the loan to buy supplies and ingredients such as plantains, cooking oil, firewood, chicken, potatoes, carrots, cheese, vinegar and other ingredients.

loans.use: To buy supplies and ingredients such as plantains, cooking oil, firewood, chicken, potatoes, carrots, cheese, vinegar and other ingredients.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal is a 26-year-old from Gaza.  She owns a small beauty salon which is the only one in the area she lives in.  She asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy an electricity generator and cosmetics.  She hopes that this loan will help her increase her customers and improve her income.

loans.use: buy a generator and cosmetics for her salon

loans.name: Milkah

texts.fr:
Milkah is 50 years old married and she supports a family of ten. She runs retail shop and this has been her income generating business for the last five years, she gets an average monthly income of KES. 10,000. 
She has borrowed a loan of KES.15,000, she intends to purchase more stock of assorted household items for sale

She anticipates of getting profits of which she will use to expand her business by increase more items to meet her clients demand.


Milkah hopes to improve her living standards and be financially stable,she also hopes to save money to enable her to pay school fees for her children as well as expand her business to a general goods wholesales shop.
texts.en:
Milkah is 50 years old married and she supports a family of ten. She runs retail shop and this has been her income generating business for the last five years, she gets an average monthly income of KES. 10,000. 
She has borrowed a loan of KES.15,000, she intends to purchase more stock of assorted household items for sale

She anticipates of getting profits of which she will use to expand her business by increase more items to meet her clients demand.


Milkah hopes to improve her living standards and be financially stable,she also hopes to save money to enable her to pay school fees for her children as well as expand her business to a general goods wholesales shop.

loans.use: To purchase  more stock of assorted items for sale

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 25-year-old married man. He has a child who  is 2 years old. He describes himself to be a very determined man. 

Peter offers bicycle transportation services and has been working in this business for a year. 

His business is located within a busy environment and his primary customers are the general public. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. 

Peter will use the 20,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy another bicycle. 

His business goal is to own many motorcycles within five years. 

He hopes that in the future he will be a successful businessman.

loans.use: to buy another bicycle for his bicycle transportation business.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy  is a married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself as a determined woman . She operates a beauty salon and retail business where she provides hair services and sells clothes . Her business is located within a busy business environment and her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving her beauty salon business . She will use the KES 58,990 loan to buy a fridge and water dispenser which will be used by her four family members on household activities. Her business goal is to expand her business within the next 5 years.

loans.use: to buy a water dispenser and a fridge

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en: Nelson is a 30-year-old married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself as honest and trustworthy. He operates a welding business where he sells gates. He has been involved in this business for 4 years. His business is located at a competitive business environment and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the 20,000 Kenyan Shilling (KES) loan to buy metal for welding. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a bigger welding shop. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy metal for welding

loans.name: Ivar Napoles

texts.es: El Sr. Ivar es una persona soltera. Vive con su madre una señora de la tercera edad a quien mantiene y cuida, él es profesor de Matemáticas, física y  química, enseña a jóvenes de últimos años de colegio , y también dicta clases particulares a los jóvenes que desean presentarse al examen de ingreso de la Universidad,  Vive por la zona del Hipódromo,  pero esa no es su casa propia, él se compró con todos sus ahorros un lote por el lado de Quillacollo pero este terreno no cuenta con nada, ni muralla ni servicios de agua ni nada, y es ahí donde piensa llevar a vivir a su madre, y últimamente ha existido problemas con personas de la zona que desean apropiarse del lugar, por lo que necesita realizar una muralla, es por eso que solicita un crédito, para poder comprar el material necesario para construir la muralla de su lote y en lo posterior construir algunos cuartos e irse a vivir con su  madre.
texts.en: Ivar is single and lives with his elderly mother who he takes care of and supports.  He is a high school math, physics and chemistry teacher and also tutors youth studying to take the college entrance exam.  He lives near the hippodrome, but does not own the home.  He spent all his savings to buy property near Quillacollo but the land has nothing: no wall, nor utilities such as water, etc.  His plan is to take his mother to live there, but he has run into problems with people in the area wanting to take over his property.  So he must build a wall and is requesting a loan to buy the necessary material to do so.  Afterwards, he will build a small house to move to with his mother.

loans.use:
Construcción de muralla de lote
to build a wall.

loans.name: Sandro Adolfo

texts.es: El Sr. Sandro desarrolla sus actividades más de 13 años, se dedica a la actividad de la agricultura es una persona trabajadora, curso hasta la primaria, no pudo concluir el bachillerato, viéndose desde muy pequeño la necesidad de  trabajar y por tanto dejar de lado los estudios; de estado civil  casado, solicita  crédito con el fin de poder seguir percibiendo los ingresos por concepto de la agricultura, el necesita para comprar fertilizantes para su producción de tomate y morrón. El quiere superarse económicamente y este crédito se e será de gran ayuda ya que el cliente presenta muchas necesidades que a futuro quisiese hacerlas realidad como el de poder contar con un medio de transporte que pueda facilitar la llegada hasta dicha comunidad y así poder comercializar de mejor manera sus productos que con mucho sacrificio logra traer hasta la ciudad y de esa forma mejorar  su nivel de vida,  además de sentirse más satisfecho de haber logrado lo que quiso.
texts.en: Sandro has been doing his activities for more than 13 years. He works in agriculture and is a hardworking person. He went to primary school and wasn't able to finish high school. When he was very young, he had to work and leave school. He is married and is asking for loan to be able to make some income farming. He needs to buy fertilizer to grow tomatoes and peppers. He wants to get ahead financially and this loan will really help him since he has a lot of needs. In the future he would like to have a means of transportation so he can go into town and sell his products better. He works very hard to bring them to the city and in this way improve his quality of life. He is also very satisfied to have done what he set out to do.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Daria

texts.es: LA SEÑORA DARIA,   SE DEDICA A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA JUNTO A SU ESPOSO QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN ESTADO DELICADO DE SALUD Y EN TIEMPO LIBRE  A REALIZAR TRABAJOS DE CUIDADO DE ANIMALES DOMÉSTICOS Y ASÍ PODER MANTENERSE EN LA ANTERIOR COSECHA TUVO PROBLEMAS CLIMÁTICOS  DE SEQUÍA Y HELADAS, POR EFECTO, LAS AGUAS  DE RIEGO BAJARON DE CAUDAL AFECTANDO AL RENDIMIENTO DE LA PRODUCCIÓN, ESTE DESASTRE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS A LA FAMILIA QUE SE MANTENÍAN CON LA PRODUCCIÓN AGRÍCOLA. CADA AÑO PRODUCEN PRINCIPALMENTE PAPA, CEBOLLA, ZANAHORIA Y MAÍZ, COMO EL MAIZ SIRVE DE FORRAJE ES IMPRESCINDIBLE PARA LA ALIMENTACIÓN DEL GANADO VACUNO SIN EMBARGO  CUANDO ESTABA SU MAÍZ DE UNA ALTURA DE 15 CENTÍMETROS  HA SUFRIDO EL DAÑO DE LA SEQUÍA DEJANDO EL CULTIVO TOTALMENTE SECO. DOÑA DARÍA ES UNA PERSONA  MUY QUERIDA, CONOCIDA Y RESPETADA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE, POR LO DEDICADO AL TRABAJO AGRÍCOLA Y LA CALIDAD DE PRODUCTOS QUE OFRECE A LOS INTERMEDIARIOS, ELLA Y SU ESPOSO HAN QUEDADO SOLOS YA QUE SUS HIJOS VIVEN EN OTROS LUGARES DEL PAÍS, SOLICITAN EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR  INSUMOS AGRÍCOLAS, SEMILLA DE PAPA, DE CEBOLLA, AGROQUÍMICOS Y ABONO ORGÁNICO, DE ESTA MANERA MEJORARÁ LA PRODUCCIÓN Y EL RENDIMIENTO, LAS PEQUEÑAS PARCELAS QUE TIENE CON SU ESPOSO NO ES SUFICIENTE  POR TANTO SE ALQUILA TIERRAS PARA AMPLIAR LA PRODUCCIÓN TAMBIÉN TIENE LA CLARA IDEA DE QUE CON ESTE CRÉDITO MEJORARÁ LAS CONDICIONES Y QUE EN LAS PRÓXIMAS OPORTUNIDADES REALIZARA INVERSIONES CON CRÉDITOS MAYORES QUE LE PERMITAN EMPRENDER NEGOCIOS CON UTILIDADES DE MAYOR VALOR ECONÓMICO.
texts.en:
Daria farms with her husband, who’s health is fragile.  In her spare time she cares for her animals and supports herself in this way.  She has trouble with the droughts and frost during the last harvest and it affected production.  Each year they raise potatoes, onions, carrots, and corn.  The corn is good for feed for their cattle; however it was damaged by the drought and is completely dry.

Daria is well liked and respected in her community because of her dedication to farming and the quality of the products she sells.  She and her husband are alone now that their children have gone to different parts of the country.  They are asking for this loan to buy supplies such as potato seed, onion seed, chemicals, and compost.  In this way they can improve their production.  The small plots they own are not enough, so they rent land so they can expand production.  She also has the idea of improving her quality of life with the help of this loan.  In the future she will use loans to invest in things that will make her business more efficient.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es: La señora Hilaria es una joven que tiene un hijo, es madre soltera, que vive en la Comunidad de Sipe Sipe a 25 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  es la segunda vez que solicita un crédito kiva ella ya cancelo el crédito anterior  que saco para ampliar su negocio de comida y le está yendo muy bien, ella por eso se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida, ahora ella no ha dejado su negocio de actividad lechera no ha crecido mucho pero ya cuenta con 4 cabezas de ganado lechero de los cuales producen quesillo y continua comercializándolo en el pueblo de Sipe Sipe, Hilaria quiere aprovechar la época del año para abastecerse de forraje para su ganado y asi durante todo el año ya no comprar en proporciones pequeñas. Para Hilaria fue muy difícil salir adelante, sola con su hijo, porque además la sociedad la discriminaba más aun en un pueblo con costumbres tradicionalistas, pero ella está saliendo adelante, y su hijo sigue estudiando en la escuela. El objetivo de Hilaria es que su hijo estudie alguna carrera profesional y triunfe en su vida.
texts.en:
Hilaria is a young woman; she has a son and is a single mother living in the community of Sipe Sipe 25 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.  This is her second Kiva loan request; she’s repaid the previous one that she took out to expand her food business.  She’s doing well and she’s happy and grateful for that.  She’s also not neglected her dairy business.  It’s not grown much but she now has four dairy cows that produce string cheese that she continues to sell in the town of Sipe Sipe.  

Hilaria wants to take advantage of the season to stock up on forage for her cattle so that she won’t have to buy it in small quantities throughout the year.  For Hilaria, it was very difficult to get ahead alone with her son because society looked down on her even more so in a small town with traditional customs but she’s moving forward and her son continues attending school.  Hilaria’s objective is that her son studies a professional career and succeeds in life.

loans.use: to buy forage for her cattle.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto es un joven de 27 años de edad, es profesor le gusta enseñar a las personas y niños actualmente  vive en la casa de algunos parientes, donde recibe algunos malos tratos que no le gustan, también trabaja como moto taxista por las tardes, después de dictar clases en la mañana, tiene una motocicleta el cual le permite generar ingresos económicos para su sobrevivencia donde prácticamente trabaja para poder tener ingresos todo el resto del tiempo, hasta en lluvia, y a veces en las noches, según su necesidad. El joven solicita el crédito para la compra de una motocicleta nueva para poder tener más ingresos contratando un chofer y así podrá buscarse otro lugar donde vivir, más cómodamente, además el cuanta que tiene una hija pequeña a la cual no ha podido conocerla pero quiere asegurarse un espacio donde pueda darle un lugar seguro y cómodo así como también mayores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Roberto, 27, is a teacher who likes to teach people and, currently, children.  He lives in some relatives' house where he doesn't like that he has received some bad treatment.

He also works as a motorcycle taxi driver in the afternoon after teaching class in the morning.  He has a motorcycle that allows him to generate income to survive.  He works practically all the rest of the time so he can have an income, even in the rain and sometimes at night as necessary.

The young man is requesting the loan to buy a new motorcycle to be able to have more income by hiring a driver.  This way he'll be able to look for another place to live more comfortably.

He also says he has a small daughter whom he hasn't been able to get to know, but for whom he wants to give a secure and comfortable space as well as a bigger income.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de carpinteria,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo realizando diferentes tipos de modelos como muebles, camas, armarios entre otros,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de madera para su negocio.

La socia esta contenta con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The member continues to make a living in the carpentry business.  She has been in this business for years and it's going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She works with her husband, making different types of patterns such as furniture, beds, wardrobes, and others.  She wants to continue working so she can continue helping her family.

She's requesting the loan to buy wood for her business.

She's happy about her loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angelica pertenece banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la venta de ropa interior como medias, calzoncillos, polos, bivirís y otras cosas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como medias. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Angelica is a member of the community bank Fuente de Vida.  Her main work is selling clothing such as socks, boxers, shirts, men's briefs, and other items.  She has done this work for many years and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  

She will use this loan to purchase merchandise such as socks.  She is happy with this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as socks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase lamb and beef.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es: Julian pertenece al banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la venta de carne de cordero, chancho, res, pollo, pescado y entre otros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar carne de cordero. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Julian is a member of the Fuente de Vida community bank.  He works selling meat such as lamb, pork, beef, chicken, fish, and others.  He has done this work for many years and it is going well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  

He is requesting this loan to purchase lamb meat.  He is happy with the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase lamb meat.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes,gallinas entre otros,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos en las distintas ferias que se realizan,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando en su negocio para poder seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de cuyes para su negocio.
 La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Luz Marina continues to work raising small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and others.  She has done this work for many years and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts in every day.  She raises these small animals to later sell them at different markets.  She wants to continue working at her business so that she can continue supporting her family.

She is requesting this loan to purchase guinea pigs for her business.  She feels grateful for this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es: La socia continua en el banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la venta de comida, ella tiene una pequeña picantería donde vende chicha de jora también prepara diferentes platos típicos de la región como rocoto relleno, tallarín al horno, milanesa de pollo, chicharrón de cerdo y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar jora e insumos como carne y aceite. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en: She continues to be a member of the “Fuente de Vida” communal bank and is still selling food.  She has a small café where she sells chicha and also prepares typical regional dishes, such as stuffed peppers, Peruvian linguini, chicken Milanese, pork rinds, and other things.  She’s been doing this for several years and things have gone well thanks to her dedication.  She needs this loan to buy chicha and supplies, such as meat and cooking oil.  She is grateful for this loan and is committed to making her payments in time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase perfumes, necklaces, earrings, and other items.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo tiene24 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Santiago, distrito caracterizado por su clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial porque se cultivan productos como algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros. Arturo es un hombre muy trabajador, ya que desde muy joven tuvo la necesidad de trabajar para poder apoyar a sus padres, debido a ello solo pudo estudiar hasta el tercer grado de secundaria.

Día a día Arturo trabaja como guardián en un fundo de su distrito, mayormente el trabaja de madrugada, y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar con los gastos el hogar; él cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y honrado.

Arturo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar un pequeño terreno para poder construir más adelante su vivienda, ya que por ello se esfuerza cada día, para hacer realidad  uno de sus más grandes sueños:” Tener su casa propia y seguir apoyando a sus padres en todo lo que pueda.
texts.en:
Arturo is 24 years old and lives in the Santiago district, which is known for its warm and cozy climate.  There is agriculture here, such as cotton, grapes, asparagus, and other things.  Arturo is a hardworking man because he needed to help support his parents when he was young.  Because of this he was not able to study past middle school.

Arturo works day to day as a field hand in his district from dawn and is able to support the household expenses through his labor.  He believes that he is getting ahead in his work because he is responsible and honest.

Arturo is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to their help he has been able to buy a small plot of land where he could build his house.  He makes an effort every day to make his greatest dream a reality, “To have a house of his own and continuing to support his parents in all that he can.”

loans.use: to buy some land.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia continua en el banco comunal “Fuente de Vida” y su actividad económica principal es la elaboración de muebles de madera para luego venderlos en una feria sabatina o dominical. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone  en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como madera. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en: Julia continues to me a member of the “Fuente de Vida” communal bank.  She makes wooden furniture and then sells it at weekend fairs.  She’s been doing this for several years and things are going well for her thanks to her dedication.  She needs this loan to buy supplies such as lumber.  She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products.

loans.name: Edes Frank

texts.es:
Edes vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura y en especial el cultivo de limones, arroz, entre otros. Edes es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, por ello cada día se levanta muy temprano para aperturar su pequeño negocio de venta de muebles para salas, dormitorios, entre otros, ya que con el fruto de su trabajo puede sacar adelante a su familia ya que es padre de 2 pequeños de 2 y 4 años de edad por los cuales lucha cada día y se sacrifica para brindarles una vida mejor, sobre todo porque ama a sus hijos y su esposa; Edes cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo  porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a un precio cómodo.

Edes está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más muebles para ofrecer en su negocio, especialmente porque tiene pedidos de clientes y asimismo poder tener mas variedad de productos para ofrecer, así mejorar sus ingresos y seguirá luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle a sus hijos una buena educación y tener varias sucursales de su negocio”.
texts.en:
Edes lives in Guadalupe, known for its warm and cozy climate.  There is farming here, especially lemons, and rice among other things.  Edes is a young man with a great desire to get ahead.  Every day he gets up very early to tend to his small business, selling furniture for living rooms, bedrooms, and others.  He gets his family ahead with the fruits of his labor.  He is the father of two children, ages 2 and 4, for whom he works hard every day so he can provide them a better life.  Above all he loves his wife and children.  Edes believes that he is getting ahead because he is very friendly to his customers and above all offers high quality products at comfortable prices.

Edes is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help he was able to buy more furniture for his business, especially since he has requests from customers, so he can have a greater variety to offer.  In this way he can increase his income and continue working to make his greatest dream a reality, “Providing a good education for his children and opening branch stores for his business.”

loans.use: to buy furniture.

loans.name: Christhian

texts.es:
Christhian tiene 28 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y juntos tiene un pequeño de 3 años de edad a quien Christhian quiere muchísimo y por el cual lucha a pesar de las adversidades. Desde joven tuvo la necesidad de trabajar para poder apoyar a sus padres ya que ellos tenían pocos recursos económicos y por ello solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, asimismo por circunstancias del destino tuvo un accidente pero gracias a Dios, Christhian pudo superarlo.

Día a día Christhian trabaja en su pequeño negocio de renovación de calzados, el trabaja en su negocio alrededor de  8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 10 clientes diariamente; el cree que esta saliendo adelante en su negocio ya que es amable con los clientes y también por su responsabilidad y honradez.

Christhian está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para su negocio como pegamento, cuero, nilón, entre otros, de esta manera podrá tener los materiales necesarios para realizar su trabajo y poder seguir trabajando y luchando por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener su propia fábrica de zapatos y darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Christhian is 28 years old and lives with his wife.  They have a three year old son, whom Christhian loves very much and for whom he works hard despite adversities.  Since he was young he has had to work to help support his parents, since they have limited financial resources, he was only able to study to fifth grade.  He also had an accident but was able to recover with God’s help.

Each day Christian works in his small shoe repair business.  He works eight hours a day and can serve up to 10 customers.  He believes that he is getting ahead because he is friendly to his customers and also responsible and honest.

Christian is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he has been able to buy supplies such as glue, leather, nylon, and other things for his business.  In this way he will have the supplies he needs to continue to work to make his greatest dream a reality, “To have his own shoe factory and provide a good education for his children.”

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Julia Jacinta

texts.es:
Julia es una mujer muy trabajadora de tiene 56 años, pero tiene una vitalidad y la alegría de una joven de  20 años, ha pasado por muchas adversidades, una de ella es la pérdida de su esposo a quien aun quiere muchísimo, ya que más que un esposo era su amigo y su mejor compañía, a raíz de este suceso ella tuvo que armarse de valor y luchar por sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos, los cuales ahora ya son mayores de edad, pero se convirtieron en su razón de vivir y el motivo por el cual sigue adelante.  Con cada amanecer Julia sale a trabajar en su pequeño negocio de venta de periódicos y revistas, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que está saliendo adelante con su negocio por su amabilidad con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene un ángel que la protege desde el cielo.

Julia está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá solventar los gastos de su tratamiento dental, ya que debido  su edad le es necesario realizar este tratamiento, y poder mejorar su salud y su calidad de vida y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local propio”.
texts.en:
Julia is 56 years old and a hard working lady.  She has the vitality and happiness of a 20 year old.  She has had many adversities, one of which is the loss of her husband, who she loved very much and who was more than a husband; he was her best friend and her greatest company.  Because of this she needed to arm herself with bravery and fight to get her three children ahead.  They are all adults now, but they became her reason for living and getting ahead.  Each morning Julia goes out to work her small business selling newspapers and magazines.  She works about 10 hours a day and is able to serve about 15 customers.  She believes that she is getting ahead because of her friendliness to her customers and above all she has a guardian angel.

Julia is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their help, which has allowed her to pay for her dental treatments that she needed because of her age.  She was able to improve her health and quality of life and continue working to achieve her greatest dream, “To have her own business.”

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: La solicitante es de estado civil casada, en la foto esta con su esposo,  tiene un nivel de estudios hasta la secundaria ,  actualmente ella tiene 27 años de edad,  es una señora muy responsable, lastimosamente en estos momentos su padre se encuentra en mal estado de salud, por lo que están incurriendo en varios gastos para medicamentos, hospital, y otros. Su padre le dejó a cargo de sus bienes y otras responsabilidades en las cuales la señora Vilma está cancelando deudas por el mal estado de salud de su padre, por esta razón requiere un crédito para la mejor nutrición de sus   vacas que necesitan de un buen Alimento, y ella necesita de la producción de leche para seguir generando ingresos y poder cubrir sus deudas, ante estos momentos difíciles que esta pasando, con una persona muy querida para ella.
texts.en: This requester is married and appears in the photo with her husband.  She has a middle school education and is 27 years old.  She is a very responsible person but unfortunately her father is in poor health at the moment and she is accruing expenses for medicines, hospitals, and other things.  Her father has left her in charge of his property and Vilma has paid off debts.  She needs this loan to provide better feed for her cattle.  She needs to produce milk to continue generating income to cover her debts.  She is spending these difficult moments with a person very loved to her.

loans.use: to buy feed.

loans.name: Grecia Daniela

texts.es:
Grecia es una mujer de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Grecia pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar vóley con sus amigas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Grecia trabaja como Asistente de Marketing en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y responsabilidad.
Grecia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, como cemento y arena, ya que desea hacer el tarrajeo de su habitación, de esta manera Grecia tendrá mayor bienestar y seguridad, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Grecia, 21, is single and lives in the city of Pucallpa with her parents and siblings.  She is a kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who has a strong desire to improve her situation.  Thanks to her efforts and support from her parents, Grecia was able to get a degree in Business Administration.  In her free time, she enjoys playing volleyball with her friends and sometimes likes to cook a delicious Ceviche to share with family.

At her own initiative and with much tenacity and dedication, Grecia works as a marketing assistant at a company in the city.  She works approximately eight hours a day, starting in the early morning hours and enjoys her job.  She believes it is going well for her because of her hard work and responsibility.

Grecia is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to them she will be able to buy construction materials, such as cement and sand, so she can plaster the walls of her bedroom.  This will contribute to Grecia's well-being and safety, so she can continue working and striving to get ahead.  Her goal is to have her own house one day.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Nelly Consuelo

texts.es:
Nelly es una mujer de 66 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo siempre han dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a sus hijos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Nelly no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, pero le hubiera gustado mucho convertirse en una Profesora, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus nietos y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Nelly trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, en épocas de verano vende un riquísimo Ceviche y en invierno vende salchipapas, salchipollo y otras frituras, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, Nelly se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por los buenos precios que ofrece a sus clientes.
Nelly se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mesas, sillas, sombrillas y cañas Guayaquil, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder acondicionar y ampliar su negocio, así pues Nelly seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio restaurant.
texts.en:
Nelly, a 66-year-old woman, lives in the city of Chincha. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who with her husband has always dedicated all of her efforts to raising her children. Unfortunately, because of a lack of economic resources and because of the need for her to work, she has never been able to study Education as a career, but she very much would have like to have been a teacher. In the little free time that she has, she likes to play with her grandchildren and sometimes cook a delicious dish called Carapulcra con Sopa Seca to share with her family. 

By her own initiative, and with a lot of hard work and dedication, Nelly owns a small business in which she sells food. In the summer months she sells a delicious Ceviche and in the winter she sells salchipapas, salchipollo and other fried goods. She works every day, from the early hours of the morning until late, usually working approximately ten hours. She really enjoys her work and believes that her business does well because her food tastes good and she offers it at a good price. 

Nelly feels very grateful to those who make loans through Kiva, since through their help she would be able to buy tables, chairs, shade umbrellas and cane rods, all of which would be very useful in order to cool and enlarge her business. This way, she would be able to continue working and putting forth the effort to achieve her dream of having her own restaurant.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, shade umbrellas, and cane rods.

loans.name: Nicolas Tolentino

texts.es:
Nicolás es un hombre de 47 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Nicolás no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en alguna de estas ocasiones comen una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca, ya que es su plato favorito
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Nicolás trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, el cuenta con un mototaxi alquilada y brinda servicios de transporte, Nicolás trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien porque es  responsable al conducir.
Nicolás se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de la tramitación de su brevete para el cambio de categoría, de esta manera Nicolás contará con todos sus documentos para poder circular en su ciudad, así pues Nicolás seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para poder comprar su propia mototaxi y en un futuro no muy lejano sueña con tener un auto.
texts.en:
Nicolás, 47, is single and lives in the city of Ica.  He's a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic man with a big desire for self-improvement.  Unfortunately, because of a lack of economic resources and the need to work to pay for his expenses, Nicolás wasn't able to study for a profession, but he very much would like to have been able to do so.  In his free time he likes to play soccer with his friends and sometimes they eat a delicious Carapulcra con Sopa Seca [stew with noodles] because it's his favorite dish.

On his own initiative and with a lot of effort and dedication, Nicolás works as a motorcycle taxi driver.  He rents a motorcycle taxi and offers transportation services.  Nicolás works every day from early in the morning and can do it for approximately eight hours.  He's comfortable doing his job and believes it's going well for him because he drives responsibly.

Nicolás is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to cover the expenses to process the change of category of his driver's license.  This way Nicolás will have all the documents to be able to drive in his city and continue working and making the effort to buy his own motorcycle taxi.

He dreams of having a car in the near future.

loans.use: to pay to process his driver's license

loans.name: July

texts.es:
July es una mujer de 31 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, en el distrito de Aguaytia con sus cuatro hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para sus hijos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, July no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo,  en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar y en algunas ocasiones prepara un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, July trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas, adicionalmente también vende zapatos para damas, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
July se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de bebidas, como gaseosas, aguas minerales, refrescos y otros, de esta manera July tendrá mejor abastecido su negocio y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ampliar su negocio y ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en:
July is a 31 year old woman.  She lives in the city of Pucallpa, in the district of Aguaytia with her four children who she loves and who are the most important part of her life.  She is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of her efforts to getting her family ahead because she is both mother and father to her children.  Regrettably, because of a lack of financial resources and because she needed to support herself, July could not study for a professional degree in nursing, although she would have really liked to do so.  In her free time, she enjoys cooking and sometimes prepares the delicious “Ají de Gallina” (traditional Peruvian chicken stew in a spicy, nutty cheese sauce) to share with her family.

By her own initiative, and with much determination and dedication, July works in her small business selling drinks.  In addition, she also sells women’s shoes.  She works every day from early in the morning and may work for about twelve hours.  She feels at ease in her job and believes that it is going well because of her good prices and the friendly treatment she provided to her customers.

July is very grateful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the help offered, she will be able to purchase a large quantity of beverages such as soda, mineral water, soft drinks and others.  In this way, July’s business will be better stocked and she will be able to serve more customers.  She will continue working and striving to attain her great dream of expanding her business and being a successful business owner.

loans.use: to purchase beverages.

loans.name: Sandy Diana

texts.es:
Sandy es una mujer de 26 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus padre y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su padre, Sandy se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Sandy trabaja como empleada del hogar, ella brinda servicios de limpieza, lavandería y cuidado del hogar, Sandy trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 6 horas, ella cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Sandy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de inscripción y matricula en su centro de estudios, de esta manera Sandy podrá continuar cursando su carrera profesional, así pues Sandy seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Sandy is a 26 year old woman. She is single and lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago with her father and brothers. She is a friendly person, hard working and enthusiastic. She is very motivated to improve her life. Thanks to her own efforts and the support of her father, Sandy is studying a professional career in Business Administration. In her free times, she likes to watch television and at times she cooks a delicious meal, called Arroz on Pollo (rice with chicken) to share with her family. 

On her own initiative, and through a lot of hard work and dedication, Sandy works in domestic services; she cleans, does laundry and takes care of homes. Sandy works every day from the early hours of the morning and continues for around 6 hours. She believes that everything is going well for her because of her dedication and because she treats her clients well. 

Sandy is very grateful to the lenders of Kiva because thanks to their help, she will be able to cover tuition costs at her school and she will be able to continue working to get her degree. And so, Sandy will continue to work and pushing herself to achieve her dream as a professional.

loans.use: to cover the cost of her studies.

loans.name: Fredy Raul

texts.es:
Fredy es un hombre de 36 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Fredy no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Fredy trabaja como obrero de campo en un vivero de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Fredy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de la vivienda donde vive, pues desea hacer el tarrajeo y pintado de su vivienda, de esta manera Fredy brindara mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Fredy is a 36-year-old man living in the city of Chincha with his wife and the small son they love. He is their principal reason for living. Fredy is a very likable, hard-working and enthusiastic person who dedicates all his efforts to advancing his family. Unfortunately, for lack of economic resources, and due to the necessity to work to cover his expenses, Fredy was unable to study for a professional career. But he would have liked very much to have done so. In his free time Fredy likes to watch television and occasionally cook a rich 'Carapulcra' [a Peruvian creole dish] with Dry Soup to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Fredy works as a laborer in a plant nursery in his city. Every day he labors from the early hours of the morning for up to 10 hours a day. Fredy is happy with his work and believes that it's going well due to his good effort and because of his friendly treatment of everyone.

Fredy is very grateful for Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help, he is able to make improvements to the house where he lives. He now wishes to plaster and paint his home. In this manner, Fredy will offer better security and wellbeing to his family. He intends to continue working and pressing ahead in order to achieve his grand dream of providing a proper home.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home, including plastering and painting.

loans.name: Yenessy Xiomara

texts.es:
Yenessy es una joven de 20 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Yenessy se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.

Por iniciativa propia y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Yenessy trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de calzado, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.

Yenessy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá comprar la mayor cantidad de mercadería, como zapatillas, sandalias, tacones y otros, de esta manera Yenessy podrá abastecer mejor su negocio, asi atenderà a mas cliente y aumentará sus ingresos econòmicos, los cuales le serviràn de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio y en un fututo n muy lejano desea tener un puesto de ventas en un mercado de su ciudad, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una buena profesional y una mujer de bien.
texts.en:
Yenessy, 20, is single and lives in the city of Pisco with her parents and siblings. She is a very kind, enthusiastic and hard-working person, who strongly desires success. Thanks to the support of her parents, Yenessy is study for a degree in Business Administration. In her free time she likes to do sport and occasionally cooks a delicious meal of chicken and rice to share with her family.

On her own initiative and thanks to the support of her parents, Yenessy runs a small business that sells shoes and similar items for ladies, men and children. She works from the early hours every day for approximately 10 hours, she enjoys working and believes that it is going well because of the good prices and kind service that she offers to her customers.

Yenessy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as it is thanks to their help that she has been able to purchase the majority of her merchandise, such as shoes, sandals, dress shoes and others. This will help Yenessy to have a well-stocked business and be able to better meet her customer's needs. This allows her to keep working hard to achieve her dream of being a good professional businesswoman and well-off.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Aleyda Mariela

texts.es:
Aleyda es una mujer valiente y luchadora, tiene 37 años de edad, vive al lado de su pareja y juntos tienen 3 hijos de 15,10 y 1 añito, a quienes Aleyda quiere muchísimo y por quienes trabaja y lucha cada día para poder salir adelante y sobre todo poder brindarles una vida digna y sean personas de bien. Aleyda se dedica  a la venta de cerveza y bebidas gaseosas, viene trabajando en este negocio aproximadamente hace 2 años, ella se esfuerza tanto para que su negocio le vaya bien,  por  lo fines de semana trabaja hasta las 5 de la mañana ya que a esta hora puede vender mucho mas y tiene más pedidos de sus productos, ella se animo a tener esta clase de negocios ya que veía que se podría tener muy buenos ingresos que la ayudaran con lo que necesitaba para su hogar.

Aleyda está muy agradecida con el apoyo brindado por los prestamistas Kiva ya que con esta ayuda ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio ya que no solo quiere vender cervezas y gaseosas sino que también desea comprar dulces para vender, ya que se acerca la fiesta patronal de su ciudad y con ello podrá ver crecer aun mas su negocio para bien de su familia, lo que lo ayudará a cumplir su más anhelado  sueño: “Tener una Bodega para no tener que atender a los clientes hasta muy altas horas de la noche”.
texts.en:
Aleyda, 37, is a brave and hard-working woman. She lives with her partner and their three children aged 15, 10 and 1, whom Aleyda loves very much and for whom she works hard everyday to be successful and offer them a decent life as well-off people.

Aleyda sells beer and fizzy drinks, and has been working in this business for approximately 2 years. She works very hard and her business is going well. At weekends she works until 5 in the morning as this is the time when she can make the best sales. She has many orders for her products. She is excited to work in this type of business as she sees that she can make a good income for herself and will be able to help where needed with her home.

Aleyda is very grateful for the support offered by the Kiva lenders, as with this help she can buy more merchandise for business. She will be able to sell sweets as well as beer and fizzy drinks as they are coming close to the time of year when they celebrate her city's patron saint. This will allow her to grow her business to benefit her family and achieve her greatest dream: "To have a Bodego so she does not have to serve customers until the early hours of the morning."

loans.use: to buy beer, fizzy drinks and snacks

loans.name: Irma Belinda

texts.es:
Irma es una mujer de 49 años, vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo, en el distrito de Guadalupe, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que he dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, ya que ella es madre y padre para ellos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Irma no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, pero le buera gustado mucho ser una gran Profesora, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.

Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Irma trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien porque gracias a su buen atención, es muy conocida y recomendada por sus clientes.

Irma se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercaderia para su negocio como, como polos, blusas, shorts, pantalones y otros, de esta manera Irma tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues Irma seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ampliar su negocio y tener su propia boutique.
texts.en:
Irma, 49, lives in the city of Chiclayo, in the district of Guadalupe. She is a very kind, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who has dedicated all of her efforts to supporting her three children, as she is mother and father to them.

Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and as she needed to work to earn money, Irma could not study for a degree in education, but she would very much have liked to be a teacher. In her spare time she lives to watch television and sometimes cooks a delicious meal of rice and chicken to share with her family.

One her own initiative, with much struggle and dedication, Irma works in her own business selling clothes for women, men and children. She works everyday from the early hours in the morning and can work for around 12 hours. She enjoys her work and believes that it is going well thanks to her care. She is well-known and recommended by her customers.

Irma, is grateful to the Kiva lenders, thanks to the help they offered she will be able to buy a large quantity of clothes - such as polo shirts, blouses, shorts, trousers and other things. This will allow Irma to have a well stocked business and better meet her customer's needs. This will help Irma to keep working and striving towards her dream of growing her business and owning her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, blouses, shorts, pants, and others

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre de 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y sus hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa, quien se dedica a la venta de hamburguesas, dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Miguel no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional Mecánica Automotriz, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus pequeños.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Miguel trabaja como carpintero, en especial brinda servicios de elaboración de puertas, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos acabados y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Miguel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de herramientas, tales como martillos, lijas, brocas, cepillo eléctrico, entre otros, de esta manera Miguel tendrá su taller mejor acondicionado y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda y tener otro taller de carpintería.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 44-year-old man who lives in the city of Ica with his loved wife and children. He is a very friendly, enthusiastic and hard working individual. His wife sales hamburgers and they both do their best effort to provide for their family. Unfortunately, due to financial constrains and because he needed to work to cover his expenses, Miguel was not able to become a professional in the field of automobile mechanics, although he would have loved to. In his free time he enjoys playing with his children. 

On his own initiative, with a lot of effort and dedication, Miguel started to work as a carpenter. In particular, he builds doors and he works every day from very early in the morning for approximately 12 hours. He feels good with his job and believes that he has succeeded due to the quality of the finishes he provides, and the friendly service that he offers his customers. 

Miguel is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because with their help that he will be able to purchase tools, such as hammers, sand paper, drills and a power brush, amongst others. In this way, Miguel will have his workshop better equipped, allowing him to serve more customers. Thus, he will continue to work and put all of his efforts into achieving his dream of building his own home and another carpentry workshop.

loans.use: to purchase tools.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 28 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Juan no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos.
Por iniciativa propia y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Juan trabaja como chofer de taxi, brindando servicios de transporte en su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Juan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de la vivienda de sus padres con quienes vive, ya que desea hacer el tarrajeo y puesta de un piso de concreto, de esta manera Juan podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Juan is a 28 year old single man who lives in Camaná.  He is a friendly, hard-working, enthusiastic person who has a strong desire to succeed.  Regrettably, because of a lack of financial resources and the need to pay his expenses, Juan was not able to study for a professional degree although he would have really liked to have been able to do so.  In his free time, Juan enjoys playing football with his friends.  

By his own initiative and thanks to his mother’s support, Juan works as a taxi driver, offering transportation services in the city.  He works every day starting early in the morning and may work about twelve hours.  He feels at ease doing his job and believes that it is going well because of his responsibility and the friendly treatment he provides to his customers.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Gino Jose

texts.es:
Gino es un hombre muy trabajador y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Camana, Ciudad que se caracteriza por tener unas hermosas playas, asimismo en él se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, también se desarrolla la pesca y sobre todo en esta ciudad se puede encontrar  varios platillos típicos en especial el Chupe de Camarones. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta pasear en la playa  y también le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual son los riquísimos “frejoles”.

Día a día Gino trabaja como albañil, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar con los gastos del hogar de sus padres; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque siempre tiene a Dios a su lado.

Gino está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mejoramiento a su vivienda ya que debido a la época de verano hay muchas lluvias, por ello realizara refacciones a su techo y de esta manera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir trabajando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una gran ferretería”.
texts.en:
Gino is a hard-working and enthusiastic man. He lives in the town of Camana, a city that is characterized by beautiful beaches. Agriculture is developing there, especially rice. Fishing is also developing, and and above all, in this city you can find several typical dishes especially the Chupe de Camarrones. When he has free time he enjoys walking on the beach and he also likes to eat one of his favorite dishes which is delicious frejoles.

Gino works every day as a construction worker. He works about 8 hours a day and with his work he can help with his parents' household expenses; he believes his business is doing well because he is responsible and above all because God is always by his side.

Gino is very grateful to Kiva lenders and thanks to the help they have given, he can make improvements to his home. During the summer, there is heavy rainfall, so he will make repairs to the roof and in this way, improve the quality of life for his family and keep working every day to realize his larger dream of having a large hardware store.

loans.use: for home improvements.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a 52-year-old married woman. She has 6 children with ages ranging from 11 years to 31 years. She describes herself to be a loving woman.

Leah operates a restaurant where she sells food, tea and snacks. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a residential business area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be shortage of food ingredients for preparing meals to sell.  

Leah will use this KES 20,000 loan to buy food ingredients for preparing meals for sale.  Her business goal is to expand her restaurant business within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy ingredients to make food for sale

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 35 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa y sus hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa, quien se dedica  a la venta de ropa, dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Luis pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Electrónica, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia y en alguna de estas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca, ya que es el plato favorito de todos.
Por iniciativas propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Luis trabaja como chofer de taxi, brindando servicios de transporte, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, lamentablemente Luis no pudo ejercer su carrera, pero se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de llantas nuevas para su auto, de esta manera Luis tendrá su herramienta de trabajo en mejores condiciones y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Luis is a 35 year old man who lives in the city of Ica with his wife and children who he loves and who are his primary motivation in life. He is a very friendly person, a hard worker and enthusiastic. Together with his wife, who works selling clothing, he dedicates all of his efforts to getting his family ahead. Thanks to his efforts, Luis was able to study the profesional career of electrical engineering. In his free time he likes to share free moments with his family and on some occasions he cooks a rich pork stew with seasoned rice because it is everyone's favorite dish. 

Through his own initiative, with lots of persistance and dedication, Luis works as a taxi driver offering transportation services. He works every day starting in the early hours of the morning and he can do it for approximately 12 hours. Unfortunately, Luis could not use his degree. However, he feels good doing his work and believes that it goes well because of the friendly treatment that he offers to his customers.

Luis is very grateful for the Kiva loans. Now, thanks to the help that they bring to him, he will be able to complete the purchase of new tires for his car. This way, Luis will keep his tool for his work in the best condition and he will be able to serve more customers. Through this means he will continue working and striving to accomplish his greatest dream-- to see his children become accomplished professionals and good men.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Ricardo Miguel

texts.es:
Ricardo es un joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, Ricardo no ha podido estudiar la carrera de Computación e Informática, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Pato para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ricardo trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Ricardo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de dos camas, ya que actualmente él y sus dos hermanos menores comparten la misma habitación donde tienen solo una cama, de esta manera Ricardo podrá brindar mayor bienestar y seguridad para su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 19 years old, and he lives in the city of Chincha with his parents and siblings.  He is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person that has a great desire to succeed.  Sadly, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work to support his parents, Ricardo hasn't been able to study the field of Information Technology, but he would very much like to do so.  In his free time he likes to listen to music and at times cook a delicious seco de pato, a duck leg confit in black beer sauce over cilantro rice, to share with his family.

By his own initiative, with a lot of effort and dedication, Ricardo works as a laborer in an agricultural farm in his city.  He works everyday from early in the morning and can do it for approximately 10 hours.  He feels at ease carrying out his work and believes that it's going well because of his good performance and his kind treatment of everyone else.
