Scarleth started working when she was very young.  She discovered that she had a talent for helping people improve their appearance.  That was how she, little by little, developed her business.

Scarleth needs to buy equipment that will help people look better.  The equipment is called Striat, and it is used on the skin.  This way Scarleth will have better equipment to work with, and she will be able to have more customers.  This will allow her to improve her business, and, therefore, improve her standard of living.

She is very excited about being able to get a loan because it will be an opportunity to make her business grow.  Lastly, among Scarleth’s future plans is taking a new loan in order to have her own place to live.  She currently lives in her relatives’ house.

loans.use: to buy equipment to treat wrinkles.

loans.name: Costa

texts.es:
La señora costa tiene 33 años está casada con el señor Javier, juntos tienen 4 hijos de los cuales tiene 2 gemelas, son una familia de escasos  recursos económicos pero muy unidos, gracias al trabajo del marido han logrado reunir y comprarse un  lote de terreno donde construyeron una pequeña casa donde actualmente viven en la zona de Alto Cotapachi de la ciudad de Cochabamba.
La principal actividad de la señora Costa es la cría y venta de cerdos, ella compra cerdos pequeños, para luego engordarlos y vender a un precio más alto, de esta manera ella genera un ingreso mas para mantener a sus hijos.
El destino del crédito es para la compra de cerdos, ya que estas fiestas de navidad término de vender todo los cerdos que había criado, este crédito le ayudara mucho porque comprara más cerdos los engordara y de esa manera generara más ingreso.
Entre sus sueños y metas esta tener una pequeña granja de cerdos, porque ella declara que le va muy bien en dicha actividad, y que sus 4 hijos puedan estudiar una carrera profesional para que de esa manera puedan tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Costa is 33 years old and married to Javier. Together they have four children, two of whom are twin girls. They are a family of scarce economic resources but are very close. Thanks to Javier's work, they have succeeded in locating and buying a plot of land on which they built the small house they currently live in, which is located in the zone of Alto Cotapachi in the city of Cochabamba. Costa's primary activity is the raising and sale of pigs. She buys small pigs, and then she fattens them and sells them at a higher price. In this way, she generates more income in order to sustain her children. The purpose of this loan is to buy pigs. Since she sold all of her pigs during the Christmas season, this loan will greatly help her by letting her buy more pigs. She will fatten them and this way generate more income. Among her dreams and goals is to have a small farm of pigs, because she says this activity is going well for her and that her four children will be able to study a professional career and therefore have a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Octavia

texts.es: La señora Octavia, es una persona de 55 años de edad, de estado civil casada, no alcanzo a estudiar una educación escolar, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es la producción agrícola, produce papa, haba y cebada en sus propios terrenos que una parte cuenta con riesgo por inundación las cuales se hallan situadas en la comunidad de Pucara Chico del municipio de Tíraque distante a unos 72 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Octavia y su familia manifiestan ser personas trabajadoras y responsables que quieren superarse e incrementar su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de reposición por la compra de terreno agrícola y de tal forma producir mayor cantidad y a partir de ello obtener mayores ingresos económicos que van a mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia.
texts.en: Octavia, 55, is married and has no formal education.  She has three dependent children and earns a living farming crops such as potatoes, lima beans and barley on her own land.  Part of the land, which is in the community of Pucara Chico in the municipality of Tíraque, some 72 kms from Cochabamba, is in dange of flooding.  Octavia and her family claim to be hard-working, responsible people who want to increase their farming production.  Therefore, they are requesting a loan to buy more farmland to produce more crops and increase their income.  This will improve the family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy farmland.

loans.name: Richard Guillermo

texts.es:
Richard es un hombre muy trabajador, es por ello que el único pasatiempo que el tiene es su trabajo en su pequeño negocio de confección de prendas de vestir. Su vivienda y negocio están ubicados en la ciudad de Yungay, ubicada en la sierra peruana y la cual posee uno de los atractivos turísticos más hermosos de nuestro país, el cual es el Nevado de Pastoruri. Richard aprendió su oficio desde muy joven ya que debido a sus pocos recursos económicos él solo tuvo estudios primarios. Richard le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 25 clientes al día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y tiene muy buenos acabados en sus confecciones.

Richard está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar telas por fardos para poder realizar sus confecciones, de esta manera el podrá tener los materiales necesarios para realizar su trabajo y así seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una fábrica textil”.
texts.en:
Richard is a very hardworking man, and it's for this reason that his only hobby is working in his small tailoring workshop. His home and business are located in the city of Yungay, situated among the Peruvian mountains, which possesses one of the most attractive and beautiful tourist sites of the country: "el Nevado de Pastoruri [Pastoruri Mountain]." Richard learned his trade from a very young age, since due to limited financial resources, he only had a primary education. Richard works in his business around 10 hours a day and can attend up to 25 customers daily. He believes that his business is going well because he is polite to his customers and he has very good finishing touches with his tailoring. 

Richard is very grateful for the Kiva lenders since thanks to the support they have offered him, he will be able to buy fabric bundles to perform his tailoring. This way, he will be able to have the necessary materials in order to do his job, and so he will be able to continue striving to achieve his greatest dream: "to have a textile plant."

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Judith Maritza

texts.es:
Judith Maritza tiene 36 años de edad, es padre y madre para su único hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la elaboración, compra y venta de artesanía de tipo tejidos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar lana de alpaca, lana sintética y otras más. 

Se encuentra contenta por el préstamo pues se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Judith Maritza is thirty-six years old, and acts as the mother and father of her only son.  She was born in the city of Cusco and she still lives in that same city.  Her principal economic activity is making, buying, and selling woven crafts.  She has been in this business for several years and it is gong well thanks to the commitment she has to her work.

In this opportunity, she requires a loan in order to buy alpaca wool, synthetic wool, and other items. 

She is happy for the loan and promises to pay her installments on time.  She is thankful for the help offered to her.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool, synthetic wool, and other items.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba pero vive en la encantadora ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la elaboración de colchones. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo tela, hilos, esponja y otras cosas más. 

Se encuentra contenta por el préstamo pues se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Francisca is 30 years old. She is married, and she has three children from that marriage. She was born in the city of Quillabamba, but she lives in the charming city of Cusco. Her main economic activity is making mattresses. She has worked in this business for several years, and it's going very well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

At this time, she needs a loan to buy raw materials like, for example, fabric, thread, and foam, among other things.

She is happy about the loan and she is committed to making her payments punctually. She is thankful for the help provided.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like, for example, fabric, thread, and foam, among others.

loans.name: Frank Celso

texts.es:
Frank  es un hombre muy trabajador y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Camana, Ciudad que se caracteriza por tener unas hermosas playas, asimismo en él se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, también se desarrolla la pesca y sobre todo en esta ciudad se puede encontrar  varios platillos típicos en especial el Chupe de Camarones. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta pasear en la playa  y también le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”.

Día a día Frank trabaja como albañil, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar con los gastos de su familia; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque siempre tiene a Dios a su lado.

Frank está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mejoramiento a su vivienda ya que debido a la época de verano hay muchas lluvias, por ello realizara refacciones a su techo y de esta manera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir trabajando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una gran ferreteria”.
texts.en:
Frank is a hard-working and enthusiastic man.  He lives in the city of Camana, which is characterised by its beautiful beaches, its agricultural developments, particularly its rice paddies, and its fishing industry.  Above all, the city is characterised by its typical food dishes, especially "chupe de camarones", a sort of shrimp chowder.  When he has free time, he likes to hang out at the beach or eat his favourite traditional dish, a delicious "lomo saltado" (a beef dish, served with chips and rice).

Frank works every day as a construction worker.  He works some eight hours a day and, with the fruits of his labour, he can help support the family with expenses.  He believes his business is going well because he is very responsible and, above all, he has God by his side.

Frank is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help they have provided him, he will be able to make improvements to his home.  With the summer season, there is much rain so Frank will repair the roof and so be able to improve living conditions for his family.  He will continue working every day so that he can make a reality of his biggest dream: having his own hardware store.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Yohanna Datmen

texts.es:
Yohanna  tiene 32 años de edad, es madre y padre para sus dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal es la costura y también al diseño y elaboración de ropa de vestir. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo tela, hilos, agujas  y otras cosas más. 

Se encuentra contenta por el préstamo pues se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Yohanna is thirty-two years old, and acts as both the mother and father for two children.  Her main work is sewing, but also in design and in making clothing.  She has been in this business for several years and it is going well thanks to the determination she brings to her work.

In this opportunity, she requires a loan in order to buy work materials, like fabric, thread, needles, and other items.

She finds herself happy for the loan and promises to pay her installments on time.  She is thankful for the help offered to her.

loans.use: to buy work materials like fabric, thread, needles, and other items.

loans.name: Kancharisun Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “KANCHARISUN”; Este banco se ubicado en  la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Mary tiene 69 años es casada y tiene 02 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de locería como ollas,sartenes,cubiertos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez es profesora cesante , siendo de esta forma que la socia se dedica  a la venta de locería ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de sartenes para su negocio.
Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de muebles, venta de materiales de construcción y trabajadores de instituciones públicas y privadas.
La socia que sale en la foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "KANCHARISUN." This bank is located in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Mary is 69 years old. She is married and has two children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling kitchenware like pots, pans, and flatware, among other things. Mary has been working in this business for a good amount of time and it has gone well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She is also an unemployed teacher, which is why she is making her living selling kitchenware. Mary is a responsible and determined person, which is how she supports her family.

Mary is requesting this loan to purchase frying pans for her business.

The other members earn their livings selling furniture, selling construction materials, and working at public and private institutions. The member who appears in the inset photo requested permission to arrive late to the meeting.

Mary is grateful to those who are part of her dream through this medium, and she promises to make her loan payments according to the established timeline.

loans.use: to buy frying pans for her business.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: El sr. Humberto tiene  27 años de edad,  no tiene padre ni madre;  ya que fue abandonado con su tía, quien se encargó de criarlo, actualmente viven en la misma casa que es una parte de  adobe,  un material delicado para las lluvias, razón por la que su vivienda se deterioró más en esta temporada de lluvias y fue esta razón por la cual el sr. Humberto  solicita un crédito para la refacción de su techo que se derrumbó, anteriormente también solicitó un préstamo para refaccionar el cuarto en el que habita, demostrando que es una persona responsable. Esta vez necesita para la parte del techo.  Él trabaja como guardia de seguridad en un barrio en el que lo requieren, por ser responsable y trabajador.
texts.en: Humberto is 27 years old and has no parents.  He was left with his aunt who accepted the responsibility of bringing him up.  They currently live in the same house which is partly made of adobe, a material which is susceptible to the effects of rain.  For this reason, his house suffered more damage during this rainy season and so Humberto is seeking a loan to repair the roof which collapsed.  He previously requested a loan to repair the room in which he lives, proving himself a responsible person.  This time he needs a loan for a part of his roof.  He works as a security guard in a district where he is sought after for his responsible and hardworking attitude.

loans.use: to repair his roof

loans.name: Triunfadores Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRIUNFADORES”; Este banco se ubicado en  la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Clara tiene 48 años es casada y tiene 03 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de  venta de ropa, la socia viaja cada cierto tiempo al país de Bolivia para comprar su mercadería, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cuenta con un stand donde puede vender su mercadería como chompas el cual está ubicado por el centro de la ciudad, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de chompas para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican al diseño grafico y al negocio de imprenta.

Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members belong to the "TRIUNFADORES" (Winners) communal bank, which is situated in the province and department of Cusco.  One member is Clara, who is 48 and married with 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily chores and her business selling clothing and periodically travels to Bolivia to buy merchandise.  She has been running her business for some years now and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  Clara sells her goods, such as sweaters, from her stall in the city centre and, in this way, is able to support her family.  She is seeking this loan to buy sweaters for her business.  The other group members are involved in graphic design and a printing business.  The members shown in the attached photo sought permission to arrive late for the meeting.  The member is grateful to those who are part of her dream in this way and is committed to make her repayments within the agreed period.

loans.use: to buy sweaters for her business.

loans.name: Foyer De La Femme Ndande Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Foyer de la Femme Ndande existe depuis le 16 décembre 2011; le groupe PC 01 est constitué de vingt neuf femmes qui habitent le même village et qui mènent diverses activités telles que l'élevage, la couture et le petit commerce.

Madame Bousso l'emprunteur vedette est âgée de 33 ans; mariée elle est mère de trois enfants un garçon et deux filles; elle mène une activité d'aviculture et de couture. Sur la photo elle est debout à droite habillée en tissu noir et blanc et a levé la main gauche.


Elle se ravitaille dans les marchés environnants Ndande, Kébémer ou Mékhé pour les besoins de la couture et de son aviculture.



Avec son prêt elle souhaite acheter des poussins pour une valeur de 37250 F et aliments pour 55000 F pour l'aviculture et ainsi se faire plus de revenus à la vente.


Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices renforcer son épargne afin d'obtenir un prêt plus consistant.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois, "Foyer de la Femme Ndande," was created on December 16, 2011. The PC 01 group is made up of 29 women who all live in the same village and who are involved in various types of business such as livestock farming, sewing, and small-scale trade.

Bousso is the featured borrower for this loan. She is 33 years old, married, and mother of three children (one boy and two girls). She runs a sewing and poultry-farming business. Bousso is the one dressed in black and white, standing on the right-hand side of the photo with her left hand raised.

She stocks up on goods for her sewing and poultry-farming business at the markets around Ndande, Kébémer, and Mékhé.

She wants to use her loan to buy 37,250 F of chicks and 55,000 F of food for poultry so that she can increase her revenue.

She wants to use the profits to increase her savings so that she can obtain a more substantial loan.

loans.use: to buy chicks and food for poultry

loans.name: Edinah

texts.en:
Edinah is a 40-year-old married woman. She has 6 children with ages ranging from 8 years to 18 years. She describes herself to be honest woman. She operates a retail store where she sells cereals. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located within a busy market and her primary customers are local residents. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the 10,000 KES loan to buy more cereals to sell. Her business goal is to add more cereals to her business stock so as to sell to customers to meet their high demand within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. Edinah is in farming which increases her business income.

loans.use: to buy cereals to sell

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en: This is 39-year-old Aminata. She is married and has two children, ages 18 and 17 years. In 1998, Aminata established her local food stuff (rice, beans) business. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are women from up country. Working 6 days a week and 8 hours a day, she earns about 850,000 SLL every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL so that she can buy more bags of rice and beans. Aminata requires a loan in order to buy beans. In the future, Aminata plans to expand her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more bags of rice and beans

loans.name: Sureydi Marioli

texts.en: Sureydi is an 18-year-old single mother. Her son Adrian was born with a cleft lip and is now 1 1/2 years old. Cleft lip is a medical condition that makes it difficult for children to eat or speak. Many also face social discrimination and are unable to attend school as a result. Sureydi lacks the financial resources to seek medical assistance for her son. She and Adrian live with her parents who work as farmers in a rural indigenous community. This loan will help her pay for life-changing corrective surgery for Adrian, vastly improving his quality of life and future opportunities.

loans.use: To pay for reconstructive plastic surgery: cleft lip repair

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en: Clarita, 55, is a married with four children. She lives in Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She plants, harvests and sells bananas and coconut to earn a living. She has been in this business for 5 years and she earns 7,500PHP a month. Clarita has been a member of GDMPC since last year. She is requesting a loan of 10,000PHP to purchase additional like fertilizers such as manure and seeds, seedlings and young plants to raise. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, seedlings and young plants to grow.

loans.name: Rusvel

texts.es:
Rusvel tiene 30 años, vive en la cálida ciudad de Aguaytia, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido, asimismo por el desarrollo de la agricultura y el turismo, Rusvel es padre de 2 pequeños y al lado de su esposa lucha cada día para poder brindarle a su familia una vida digna y sobre todo brindarle a sus hijos mucho amor y comprensión. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Rusvel solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Agrónoma.

Cada día Rusvel se levanta muy temprano para poder ir a trabajar a su campo de cultivo, ya que el es agricultor y actualmente ha sembrado plátano, el le dedica a su cultivo alrededor de 5 horas al día y el cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y porque le gusta lo que hace.

Rusvel está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar abono, fertilizantes, entre otro; con lo cual podrá mejorar su cultivo y obtener una mejor cosecha, lo que le permitirá tener mejores ingresos y poder seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos y ser propietarios de una parcela agrícola”.
texts.en:
Zonia is a 53-year-old woman. Her house is located in the city of Pisco, where there are beautiful beaches, and where the main industry is agriculture, especially cotton, beans, and lima beans. Since she was young, Zonia has had to work because her parents did not have much income and therefore she only finished middle school, although she would have loved to study to become a fashion designer. 

Zonia is the mother of three children whom she loves very much, and she works very hard to provide for them and to give them the opportunities that she did not have.

Every day, Zonia works in her small tailoring and repairs business. She works for around 10 hours a day and serves around 20 customers a day. She believes that she is moving forward with her business because she is very kind to the customers and, above all, because she does a good job. 

Zonia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their great help she will be able to buy supplies for her business like silk, zippers, tubes, thread, elastic among other items, and in this way she will have the necessary materials to increase her income. She will continue working hard day in day out to achieve her dream which is to own her own premises and to be able to give her children a good education.

loans.use: Para la compra de abono, fertilizantes, enter otros.

loans.name: Marco Vinicio

texts.es:
MARCO VINICIO tiene31 años de edad es casado tiene una hija de 9 años de edad, vive con la esposa y con la hija en la ciudad de Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

MARCO VINICIO es empleado privado. Solicita el crédito para comprar material cemento, barillas, piedra, arena. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la construcción. 

Las compras las realizará en Guaranda. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades por el mal clima.

 El sueño es terminar de estudiar.  En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarce a su familia.
texts.en:
Marco is 31 years old. He is married and has a 9-year-old daughter. He lives with his wife and daughter in the city of Chimbo, Bolivar Province.

Marco is a private employee. He is requesting this loan to buy materials such as cement, bars, stone, and sand. With the help of this loan, he will be able to buy what is necessary for construction.

He will make his purchases in Guaranda. The challenges that he is facing are illnesses due to the bad weather.

His dream is to complete his education. In his free time, he likes to devote himself to his family.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, bars, stone, and sand.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth lives in the Nanyuki area of Central province, Kenya. She is a married mother of two children. She owns a tea tree farming business, a business which she has been operating for one year now. The oils extracted from the tea trees are used for cosmetic purposes. She also has been doing farming, mainly planting maize, beans and potatoes. 

She learnt about Milango through a friend who invited her to the group; she joined the group with the aim of accessing credit to better her business operations. The main challenge she faces is lack of water.

Elizabeth is applying for a loan of 20,730 Kenya shillings to buy tea tree seedlings for the business. Her extra income from the loan will be added to the savings to expand the agricultural business. Her future plan in five years time is to expand the acreage under tea trees.

loans.use: To buy tea tree seedlings for the business.

loans.name: Nancy Ester

texts.es:
Nancy de 45 años de edad, es una apasiona por los niños, tanto que desde hace 6 años, decidió crear en su casa un hogar comunitario con el fin de ayudar a  madres cabeza de familia con el cuidado de sus hijos mientras ellas laboran, de igual forma genera recursos para el sostenimiento de su casa y sus hijos de 14 y 19 años de edad. 
Su mayor sueño es tener un salón de juguetería para garantizarles a los niños acceso a una buena recreación, adquirir mayor conocimiento en la elaboración de talleres manuales con el propósito de transmitir su conocimiento y despertar la creatividad de sus pequeños.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la adecuación de su unidad locativa, espera poder invertir el dinero en la compra de baldosa para ofrecerles a sus niños un  espacio con mayor comodidad y menor riesgo.
texts.en:
Nancy is 45 years old. She is passionate about children, so much that 6 years ago, she decided to create in her house a community home with the goal of helping working mothers with childcare while they worked. At the same time, she earns income to maintain her household and her own children, who are 14 and 19 years old. 

Her biggest dream is to have a room of toys to guarantee the children access to good recreation, to acquire more knowledge in making things with their hands and with the purpose of awaking the children's creativity. She currently is requesting a loan for modifying her space. She hopes to incest the money in the purchase of floor tiles to offer the children a space that is more comfortable and has less risk.

loans.use: to modify her space (with the purchase of floor tiles)

loans.name: Alberto Manuel

texts.es: Alberto de 25 años de edad tiene un negocio de peluquería, que inició desde hace 8 años, cuando cortando el cabello gratis a sus amigos y familiares, fue adquiriendo su propia clientela, y también mucha experiencia, con la que hoy trabaja y le permite generar sus propios ingresos. Su actividad la desarrolla en su domicilio, ubicado al suroccidente de la ciudad, desde los lunes hasta los domingos, en un horario que inicia a  las 10 de la mañana y termina a las 8 de la noche y muchas veces hasta más tarde, pues se ajusta a las necesidades e intereses de su clientela. Como toda la comunidad de su barrio lo conoce y la de los alrededores también, son muchos los clientes que llegan a su negocio para acceder a sus servicios y muchas veces se siente sin las condiciones  para responderles, por eso su meta mas adelante es tener un local adecuado y continuar apoyando a su madre, que es manicurista y también está en el sector de la belleza estética. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  una maquina para cortar cabello, pues es la herramienta con la cual se desempeña y necesita tener la mejor y con ello lograr mayor calidad en su desempeño, atrayendo así la atención de su clientela.
texts.en:
Alberto, 25, has a beauty salon. He started this line of work eight years ago, cutting his friends’ and relatives’ hair for free. He began to build up a good customer base and experience, which is how he can work now and generate his own income.

Alberto works at home, south-west of the city, from Monday to Sunday. He starts working at 10 am and finishes at 8 pm, although he stays later many times since he is flexible and wants to adapt to his clients’ needs and interests.

Everyone in his community and the surroundings knows him and this is why many clients come to his shop and pay for his services. Many times, he cannot cope with the demand, and this is why his goal in the future is to improve his establishment and continue supporting his mother, who offers pedicure and other beauty-related services.

Alberto is now requesting a credikiva for the first time with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. It will help him to buy a hair clipper, which is his primary tool. He needs to have the best one possible in order to provide a better service and attract more clients.

loans.use: to buy a hair clipper.

loans.name: Adijja

texts.en:
Adijja aged 42 years is married with four children who are all at school.

The client's business is retail with general merchandise that she sells to residents around the area where she lives.

She works 10 hours a day, six days a week. Her other source of income is agriculture, whereby she sells matooke (plantains) from her farm. The business was started in 1989, in the cell B Ishaka ward on the outskirts of town. The business was started for her to earn a living. The loan money will be used to buy more stock. Her customers are people staying around town more so students.

She has competitors all over with well-stocked shops and debtors who limit the growth of the business. She is honest and hardworking.

loans.use: To buy retail shop items to sell

loans.name: Subhadra

texts.en:
Subhadra is 33 years old.  She is married and has 17 and 15 children aged 22 and 20.  In 201, she established  her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 8 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business.  

In the future, Subhadra plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

 In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery stores, called 'pasal', are an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical 'pasal' might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods for her business

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe crée depuis le cycle un du banc villageois comporte des femmes issues du même village unies par de bons liens sociaux et professionnels.
Le responsable Madame Fatou est une femme mariée âgée de 57 ans et mère de 11 enfants dont 9 garçons et 2 filles .
Elle est debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo la main levée habillée de tissu orange claire.
Fatou s'active dans le commerce de céréales depuis longtemps.
Son nouveau crédit de 200000 francs cfa lui permettra de se procurer de l’arachide en graine pour en faire une patte et la revendre mais elle va acheter du mil et des et de l'huile qu'elle va revendre au niveau de son village.Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins alimentaires et scolaire de sa famille mais ègalement de de renforcer ses épargnes et payer les intérêts de son crédit.
texts.en:
This group has been created before the last banc villeagois loan cycle. It is composed of women from the same village who are united by social ties as well as their work. 

Mrs. Fatou, the group’s leader, is married, 57 years old, and the mother of 11: nine sons and two daughters. She is standing on the far left in the photo raising her hand, dressed in a light orange outfit. Fatou has been selling cereals for a long time. Her new loan of 200,000 West African franks will allow her to purchase peanuts in order to process them into a paste for sale. She would [also] like to buy millet and vegatble oil to resell in her village. The resulting revenue will allow her to provide for her family’s food and education costs, but also to bolster her savings and to pay off the interest on her loan.

loans.use: to buy peanuts and millet for retailing.

loans.name: Christiana

texts.en:
Christiana is married and has two children. She has received schooling through primary school. Christiana sells rice in Apowa near Takoradi, which she has done for five years. Her husband is a supervisor at a local business. 

Christiana uses her income to help pay her husband's and children's expenses. Christiana will use the loan to purchase a greater quantity of rice to sell in the market. With the new profits from her expanded business, Christiana plans to grow her rice selling business.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of rice to sell in the market.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen is 28 years old. She lives with her husband and three children (two girls and a boy, aged 10, 8,5) in the Old City of Jerusalem. She is the household breadwinner as her husband is unemployed on modest disability benefit. She gets some income from hairdressing and beauty treatments, but their home is too small to expand this business. She has received business training from MATI, a business development foundation in Jerusalem, and has begun to import blouses on a small scale. Demand for these imports was heavy at a good price, and she now seeks working capital to expand this import business. If this is successful, she hopes to set up a boutique in the Old City where she can combine this business with her hairdressing and beauty treatments.

loans.use: for working capital

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 37 years old. His loan amount is UGX 1,700,000=. He is married, with three children, all of whom are in school. 

John is in the business of raising tea seedlings in his nursery bed. His clients are the tea farmers in the area, who plant tea on a large scale. John works eight hours per day, six days per week and he started this business in 2006. The business is located in rural Bushenyi, a district in Western Uganda. This business has improved his livelihood and it has changed his lifestyle for the better.

John needs a loan to buy manure, so that he can improve on the quality of his seedlings. He hopes to be a great businessman by establishing a big tea plantation since he already has the seedlings. The challenge is that pests and diseases attack the seedlings and, hence, affect their quality. John is a hard-working person who has achieved a lot out of his good work. In the photo is John in the nursery bed.

loans.use: to buy manure for his tea seedlings.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.en:
Ronald, 23, works as a motorcycle taxi or “boda boda” driver in Kampala, Uganda. Motorcycle taxis are extremely popular in Uganda because they allow passengers to avoid being stuck in traffic and to navigate the country's rough roads. 

Ronald likes working as a boda boda driver, because, he says, “when you work hard you make more money.” 

Ronald currently rents his motorcycle, but indefinite renting schemes make it difficult for drivers to build up savings. He is excited to take a loan from Tugende because after paying off the loan, his profits will double.

Outside of motorcycle business, Ronald cheers for Arsenal football club and helps manage a small family poultry business. After building up his savings, Ronald wants to start a business transporting produce from rural areas.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle instead of renting, doubling his profits

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, 21, works as a motorcycle taxi or “boda boda” driver in Kampala, Uganda. Motorcycle taxis are extremely popular in Uganda because they allow passengers to avoid being stuck in traffic and to navigate the country's rough roads. 

John  likes working as a boda boda driver, because he earns enough every day to meet his expenses and save a little money. 

John currently rents his motorcycle, but indefinite renting schemes make it difficult for drivers to build up savings. He is therefore excited to take a loan from Tugende because after paying it off his profits will double, as he will no longer have to pay rent or make loan payments. 

Outside of motorcycles, John likes watching commando movies and occasionally takes side jobs laying bricks. When he owns his own motorcycle he wants to use his extra money to buy land and build his own house.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle instead of renting, doubling his profits

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses, 34, works as a motorcycle taxi or “boda boda” driver in Kampala, Uganda. Motorcycle taxis are extremely popular in Uganda because they allow passengers to avoid being stuck in traffic and to navigate the country's rough roads. 

Moses used to be a night cleaner, but likes working as a boda boda driver because, he says, it is easier to save money when you earn for yourself every day instead of getting paid monthly. 

Moses currently owns an old motorcycle and doesn’t have enough money to purchase a new one on his own. A new motorcycle will allow him to attract more customers, drive without worrying about mechanical problems, and earn extra income from selling or sub-letting the old one in a rural area. 

Outside of motorcycles, Moses cheers for Arsenal football club, and his favorite hobby is practicing studio photography. After paying off the new motorcycle, Ronald plans to use his increased savings to build his own house on a small plot of land he saved to buy recently.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle to replace his aging one, attracting more customers and improving his safety

loans.name: Bashiri

texts.en:
Bashiri, 26, works as a motorcycle taxi or “boda boda” driver in Kampala, Uganda. Motorcycle taxis are extremely popular in Uganda because they allow passengers to avoid being stuck in traffic and to navigate the country's rough roads. 

Bashiri likes working as a boda boda driver, because he gets to be his own boss. Before becoming a motorcycle driver, he worked in a restaurant. 
 
Bashiri currently owns an old motorcycle and doesn’t have enough money to purchase a new one on his own. A new motorcycle will allow him to attract more customers, drive without worrying about mechanical problems, and earn extra income from selling or sub-letting the old one in a rural area. He plans to use the increased profits after completing this loan to invest in a small shop. 

Outside of motorcycles, Bashiri cheers for Chelsea football club.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle to replace his aging one, attracting more customers and improving his safety

loans.name: Muhamad

texts.en:
Muhamad, 30, works as a motorcycle taxi or “boda boda” driver in Kampala, Uganda. Motorcycle taxis are extremely popular in Uganda because they allow passengers to avoid being stuck in traffic and to navigate the country's rough roads. 

Muhamad currently rents his motorcycle, but indefinite renting schemes make it difficult for drivers to build up savings. He is therefore excited to take a loan from Tugende because after paying off the loan, his profits will double as he will no longer have to pay rent or make loan payments. 

Outside of motorcycles, Muhamad cheers for Manchester United football club and enjoys spending his free time at home with his family, including kids ages eight and one. He plans on using the extra profits from owning his motorcycle to put his kids in better schools.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle over 18 months instead of renting, doubling his profits

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a client of this institution in his second loan cycle. He applied for a loan of 1,200,000 shillings. John is a married man, 40 years old and has a family of seven children, all of whom are of school-going age and in school. John is a farmer engaged in agriculture, specifically banana growing supplemented by produce trade during the harvest period. He has been doing this business for the last 10 years and has experience in it. The purpose of this loan is to buy fertilizers and mulch to boost his banana production and to buy produce from other farmers. John hopes that with this loan his production levels will increase, he will alleviate poverty at his family level, produce enough food for his family and continue paying tuition for his siblings. Problems that he encounters in his business are price fluctuations, vagaries of weather, pests and diseases and limited capital to expand his business. However, with continued support from this institution, these will be solved with time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and mulch

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is aged thirty eight and is a farmer in Litein county in Kenya where he lives. He has been practicing mixed farming for the past twelve years, producing milk which he sells to the cooling plant and tea at the market in his area and wants to venture in poultry keeping.

He is requesting for 30,000 KES loan from Juhudi kilimo to purchase poultry birds which he will later sell the products and earn extra income to uplift his livelihood and increase his  farming business, he aspires to have doubled his business in the next five years.

Poor markets for his products is his major challenge in farming.

Wilson is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for providing him with the loan.

loans.use: To purchase poultry birds

loans.name: Augustin

texts.en: Augustin is a 25 year old man from Ngoma District in the Eastern Province of Rwanda. He is seeking a loan of $100 to purchase 21 rechargeable LED lights, which he will resell to people without electricity in his village. Every week or so, these customers will return to him to have their lights recharged for just $0.20.  He will reinvest the money he makes into buying more lights to earn more money for himself and his wife.

loans.use: To pay for 21 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Mame Abdou Aziz Sy Group

texts.fr: Le groupe de crédit qui porte le nom d'un grand marabout décédé: Mame Abdou Aziz Sy, est un groupe de cinq personnes qui regroupe aussi bien des commerçants que des éleveurs. La présidente, la dame Maimouna Bouna, âgée de 32 ans, fait de l’élevage depuis cinq ans maintenant. Elle en est à son 1èr crédit et désire acheter des poussins pour faire de l’élevage. Elles n’a pas de charges. Avec le crédit, elle pourra diversifier ses produits et services. Maimouna travaille pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: The credit group which bears the name of a great deceased marabout: Mame Abdou Aziz Sy, is a group of five people which regroups shopkeepers as well as breeders. The president, the woman Maimouna Bouna, 32 years old, has been breeding for five years now. She is on her first loan and wants to buy chicks to breed. She has no dependents. With the loan, she will be able to diversify her products and services. Maimouna works to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy chicks to breed and resell.

loans.name: Cikwanine Group

texts.fr: Kulondwa est une cliente entrepreneur, vice présidente du groupe de credit Cikwanine. Agée de 36 ans, mère de 9 enfants dont 7 étudient est mariée à un charpentier. Bien avant qu'elle n’intègre son groupe de crédit, elle vendait pour les autres. En 1997, elle tira profit de 10$ de cette activité et entreprit son commerce de vente des souliers usagers dans lequel elle s'est spécialisée. Ce nouveau crédit va lui procurer 30 paires des souliers usagers(hommes-femmes). Elle craint toute fois la concurrence et pourtant aimerait être un jour fournisseur des souliers usagers aux détaillants. Elle remercie Hekima pour son appui.
texts.en: Kulondwa is a client entrepreneur, and vice president of the credit group Cikwanine. She is 36 years old and mother to 9 children of whom 7 study and is married to a carpenter. Well before she joined her credit group, she sold for others. In 1997, she made a profit of $10 from this business and undertook her business selling used shoes in which she specialized. This new loan is going to get her 30 pairs of used shoes (men-women). She fears competition all the time yet would like to be a supplier of used shoes to retailers one day. She thanks Hekima for its support.

loans.use: to buy 30 pairs of used shoes (men-women).

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Ameera

texts.en:
Ameera is twenty eight years old , with two children, and lives in Beit Safafa in south Jerusalem. Ameera holds a master's degree in Education from Bir Zeit University, and a Batchelor’s in Science from Beit Lehem University. After looking for work for a long time, Ameera has in the last year established a kindergarten in Sur Baher, in the east of the city, working with her sister. They have both received business training from MATI, a business development foundation in Jerusalem. After receiving all the required approvals for the kindergarten (which is unusual in the east of the city, but ensures a safe and supportive environment for the children), they began the school year with 37 children. They reached an agreement with the Municipality in which the Municipality would subsidize the tuition of each child so that the parents would only pay NIS 1,500 (US$400) for the entire year. She employs 2 teachers and 2 teaching assistants, and according to the work plan next year there will be over 50 children in the kindergarten.

Ameera is seeking a loan to purchase equipment to enhance the nursery: play equipment, cooking equipment to allow her to provide cooked meals, audiovisual aids, etc.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to enhance the nursery

texts.en: Chantal is 28 years old. She sells various items in her store. With the loan, she wants to buy more electric materials for sale. With the profits from the business, she wants to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more electric materials for sale.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en: This is 33-year-old Rashid.  He is married with 2 children, ages 8 and 5.  He has 3 additional dependents that live with him (his wife and two sales assistants).  In 2004, Rashid established his provisions business to assist his family.  His business is located at the center of town and he primarily serves business customers.  Working 7 days a week and 16 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,300,000 every month.  He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000 in order to buy additional mayonnaise, biscuits, and butter.  He hopes that this loan will help him to expand his business.  In the future, Rashid plans to build a house, to educate his kids, and to perform Hajj.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy false hair and jewelry.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: This is 41-year-old Ibrahim.  He is married and has four children aged 18, 15, 12 and 8. In 2003, Ibrahim established his dry fish business. He began his business just to enable him to solve his domestic problems. His business is located in the center of town and his main customers are mostly women. Working 7 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,700,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Ibrahim requires a loan to purchase a packet of dry fish for Le 5,000,000. He hopes that this loan will increase his income level and hence his stock. In the future, Ibrahim plans to rent his own store/shop, to build another house and to educate his children. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy Dry Milk

loans.name: Gie Assafiro Group

texts.fr:
GIE ASSAFIRO EST UN GROUPE DE 4 FILLE NON MARIEES 2 ETUDIANTES UNE EST EN FORMATION DANS UNE ECOLE DE SANTE ET LA PRESIDENTE HABILLEE EN PANTALON BLEU AVEC UN COEUR SUR SUR SON TEE-SHIRT A FAIT UNE FORMATION EN INFORMATIQUE .HABITE DANS LA REGION  SUD DU SENEGAL EN FACE UNIVERSITE.IL SOLLICITE UN CREDIT DE 1300000F POUR ACHETER UNE MACHINE PHOTOCOPIEUSE NEUVE.
ASSAFIRO A COMME ACTIVITE :RELIURE,PHOTOCOPIE ,CONFECTION TEXTES ETC .IL A UNE 2EM ACTIVITE ,LA VENTE DES JUS DE FRUITS QUI MARCHE TRES BIEN DANS LA ZONE .IL AMBITIONNE DE FAIRE UN CYBERCAFE DANS L'AVENIR POUR POUVOIR ETENDRE SON ACTIVITE ET SECRUTER D'AUTRES EMPLOYERS.
texts.en:
Gie Assafiro is a group of four unmarried girls.  Two are students and one is training in a health care school. The president, dressed in blue pants with a heart on her t-shirt, was trained in computers and lives in the southern region of Senegal, opposite the university.  She seeks a loan to buy a new photo copier.
Assafiro's business includes binding, copying, printing, etc.   She has  second business selling fruit juices that is very successful in the area.  Her wish is to have a cyber cafe in the future to enable her to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a photo copier

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en: Rosalina is 45 years old and married with four children. She wants to start a small business making and selling rice and curry in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy flour, sugar, salts, rice, onions, cooking oil, curry, chickens, large tin bowls, and an oven. In the future, Rosalina hopes to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, salts, rice, onions, cooking oil, curry, chicken, large tin bowls, and an oven.

loans.name: Marie Therese

texts.fr: Marie est une jeune femme de 28 ans,mariée et avec à sa charge 02 enfants. après ses études,elle s'est lancéé dans la couture et pour ce fait,elle a ouvert un atelier de couture dans un quartier de la place.elle confectionne des paires de draps.elle sollicite cependant un crédit qui va lui permettre d'augmenter son stock de tissus et aussi sa capacité à satisfaire ses clients.les bénéfices obtenus seront reversés dans son activité.
texts.en: Marie is a 28-year old woman, married, with two dependent children. After finishing her studies, she went into sewing business, opening a sewing shop in a local neighborhood. She sews sets of bed  sheets. She is seeking a loan that will allow her to increase her stock of fabric and also her capacity to meet customer demand. The revenues will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to increase her fabric stock and be able to sew more bed linens.

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en: Racheal dropped out of school due to lack of tuition. She got married at a young age of 20 years and became a housewife because she could not find a job. She, however, had passion for fashion designing. In 2009, she requested her spouse to provide her with capital for the same. She bought material for making wedding gowns and party dresses and started the business. She operates the business in her living room and has since attracted many customers. The income from the business is able to support the family in meeting their basic needs. Due to the ever increasing demands for her products, she has decided to borrow in order to meet the expectations of her customers and to out compete her competitors. She is very hardworking and believes she will grow a large customer base.

loans.use: to buy material for making wedding gowns.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Jorge, tiene estudios hasta el bachillerato , es transportista y trabaja como taxista con una experiencia de 4 años con su propio Vehículo, es soltero, vive en casa en alquiler, durante los últimos meses su vehículo fue deteriorándose y el cual corre el riesgo de sufrir algún accidente o de quedar plantado en el trabajo, pero aún bajo estas circunstancias el Sr. Jorge asume las responsabilidades que tiene, al prestar falencia del Vehículo, requiere mayor inversión para el mantenimiento, el motivo por el que solicita el crédito es por la razón de que sufrió un fallo de su motorizado con el que trabaja y tuvo que realizar reparaciones del mismo a pesar de aquello aún permanece fallas en el buen funcionamiento y para ello requiere efectivo para dejar en buenas condiciones la movilidad. El Sr. Jorge no cuenta con recursos suficientes, y necesita solucionar el problema en su vehículo para poder continuar con los gastos del día a día.
texts.en:
Jorge has a high school education and is a driver and works as a taxi driver with four years of experience with his own car. He is single and lives in a house where he rents. During the last few months his vehicle has deteriorated and runs the risk of him suffering from an accident or left behind with his work. 

Under these circumstances Jorge assumes his responsibilities for his car's shortcoming. He needs a greater investment for maintenance. His vehicle for work has had motor failure and he had to make repairs to it. However, failures still remain and this is his reason for requesting the loan. For the repairs he needs cash to leave his vehicle in good condition. Jorge does not have enough resources and needs to solve his car problems in order to continues with his daily expenses.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Jhenny

texts.es: La señorita Jhenny terminó sus estudios, es soltera y radica en Patacamaya, vive con sus papás comparte un cuarto con sus hermanos, desde muy niña empezó a trabajar en tiendas vendiendo dulces y abarrotes y en restaurantes como ayudante de cocina  y siempre quiso independizarse y ayudar a su familia, pues también dedicaba medio tiempo para estudiar en el colegio, viendo las ganas de superación sus papás le heredaron una parcela de terreno para sembrar papa, zanahoria haba y otros productos y así fue que gano experiencia en esta actividad, con la ayuda de sus hermanos y padre ella vende los productos en la ciudad de La Paz, el Alto y Patacamaya, como no tiene mucho recursos económicos acude a solicitar este crédito para comprar un ganado ya que sus papás están dispuestos a colaborarle en la crianza de ganado y de esta manera mejorar sus ganancias, también la señorita Jhenny tiene como meta Estudiar en la Universidad pública Mayor de San Andrés en la carrera de Técnico Superior en Agronomía.
texts.en: Jhenny finished her studies, is single and lives in Patacamaya. She lives with her parents and shares a room with her siblings. Since she was a little girl, she worked in stores selling sweets and groceries and in restaurants as a kitchen aid and has always wanted to be independent and help her family. She also dedicated half of her time to studying at school. Seeing her drive to overcome, her parents gave her a parcel of their land to sow potatoes, carrots, beans and other products. That is how she gained experience in this business. With the help of her siblings and father, she sells her goods in the city of La Paz, el Alto and Patacamaya. Since she does not have a lot of financial resources, she is resorting to requesting a loan to buy a head of cattle. Her parents are ready to collaborate in livestock raising and in this way improve their income. Jhenny also has the goal to study agronomy in the public university Mayor de San Andrés.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: El señor Miguel tiene estudios a nivel primaria procedente de la provincia Ayopaya, trabajó desde muy joven para apoyar a sus hermanos, después de colaborar con sus hermanos, a los pocos años formo su propia familia, en la que tiene 4 dependientes, don miguel trabaja como agricultor para poder mantener a su familia también realiza actividades como jornalero. Con su esposa, se dedican al comercio de ropa. El préstamo que solicitan es para capital de operaciones para aumentar la mercadería en ropa (ropa nueva) para que continúen con las actividades de venta de ropa y mejoren los ingresos de la familia.
texts.en: Miguel completed primary school and is from the province of Ayopaya. He worked since he was very young to support his siblings. After collaborating with his siblings for a few years, he formed his own family. He has four dependents. Miguel works as a farmer to be able to support his family. He also works as a day laborer. With his wife, they have a clothing sales business. The loan that they are requesting is to have working capital to increase the clothing stock (new clothes) to continue with the business of selling clothes, and improve the family income.

loans.use: to have working capital for his wife's business (buying clothes).

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: El señor Juan José Gonzales  vive en el barrio Urkupiña  de la zona de el Plan 3000 él vive en la casa de uno de sus hermanos en alquiler no cuenta con esposa ni con hijos, él cuenta con un vehículo el cual lo trabaja en una línea de trufis que hacen el servicio a las provincias. Trabaja desde que amanece hasta que anochece en su vehículo pero en a línea que trabaja el paga un alquiler por la línea el pide el préstamo para poder comprarse una línea de este sindicato ya que el no conoce muy bien la ciudad el no trabaja de transporte de taxi por este motivo, y como la línea en la que trabaja es una sola ruta esto le facilita el trabajo, así no hay riesgos de perderse en las calles de la ciudad ni tampoco memorizarse los nombres de las calles para saber donde estar ubicado.
texts.en:
Juan José Gonzales  lives in the Urkupiña neighborhood in the Plan 3000 zone. He lives in one of his brothers houses where he pays rent. He does not have a wife or children. 

He owns a car which he drives on a trufi route [fixed route taxi] that services the provinces. He drives from dawn till dusk. 

However he has to pay rent on the route that he drives. 

He is asking for a loan to buy a route from this union. 

He does not know the city very well and does not want to work as a taxi driver. 

Since his work is just one route it makes his job easier. There is no risk of getting lost in the city streets and he doesn't have to memorize names of streets in order to know where they are located.

loans.use: to buy a transportation route

loans.name: Tina

texts.en: Tina is a 27-year-old single lady. She would like to start growing taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. Tina has requested a loan to buy knives, chemicals, axes, spades and weed killer in order to help her operate her business. She joined SPBD this year. Tina will spend her profits to not only expand her business and cover her family activities.

loans.use: to buy knives, chemicals, axes spades and weed killer to help with her planting.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es: La señora Paula es casada y vive con dos hijos dependientes, sus habitaciones, tienda de barrio y granja pequeña se hallan ubicadas en Sumumpaya a ocho kilómetros de la ciudad de Cochabamba, una zona netamente lechera,al mismo tiempo con sus remanentes de la leche ha construido una habitación extra hacia la calle para habilitarla como tienda de barrio donde vende artículos como arroz, pan, leche, huevos, azúcar, refrescos y gaseosas y es para esta actividad que necesita un poco de capital porque los clientes y vecinos que adquieren los artículos no siempre pagan al contado, ella tiene un sistema de crédito cada 15 a 30 días y necesita capital por tal motivo, con la tienda le da trabajo a su hija que le ayuda también con la crianza de las vacas.
texts.en:
Paula is married and lives with two dependent children. 

Their rooms, neighborhood store and small farm are located in Sumumpaya, 8 km. from the city of Cochabamba, an area known for its dairy. 

With the milk profits she has built an extra room facing the street used as a neighborhood store.  She sells items like rice, bread, milk, eggs, sugar, soft drinks and soda water. 

The clients and neighbors who buy the goods do not always pay in cash so she needs a bit of capital. She has a 15 to 30 day credit system which is why she needs some capital. 

The store also gives work for her daughter who also helps with raising the cows.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es:
Lizbeth  es una persona joven trabajadora,  tiene 19  años de edad, viven en  una  comunidad  alejado del pueblo por  la lejanía no pudo terminar sus estudios de secundaria otro de los factores fue para la culminación de sus estudios no abandonar a sus hermanitos menores ya que por el abandono de su madre tuvo que hacerse cargo ella como hermana mayor cumpliendo la labor de madre.  
Esta época por el desastre natural de la sequía su pequeña parcela de cebolla no maduro bien, este desastre le hizo fracasar en sus ingresos económicos que ella esperaba es el único ingreso que tiene para mantenerse y a mantener a sus pequeños hermanitos ya que el padre se dedicó a buscar su vida propia. 
 Lizbeth   es una persona  muy querida y respetada en el lugar donde vive, por lo dedicada a sus pequeños hermanitos y su trabajo que a veces hasta tiene que trabajar en jornal en la agricultura para ganar algunos pesos y así mantener a sus hermanitos, ella está solicitando el crédito para compra semilla de zanahoria y   abono orgánico. Para producir más y de esta manera aumentar su producción para mejorar sus ingreso económico y  darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hermanitos y de esta manera pueda enviarles  a la escuela  en mejores condiciones.  El crédito ayudara mucho a Lizbeth y a sus hermanitos  en el duro trabajo que realiza.
texts.en:
Lizbeth  is a hard working 19 year old. She lives in a community outside of a remote village. She was not able to finnish high school. 

One of the reasons was because she did not want to abandon her small siblings. Her mother has abandoned them so she takes care of them as the oldest sister and mother. 

This season due to the drought her small plot of onions did not mature well. This natural disaster caused her to lose the income she was expecting. 

This is the only income she had to take care of herself and her small siblings since their father left them. 

Lizbeth is very loved and respected person where she lives. She is very dedicated to her small siblings and her work. Sometimes she has to do day work in the farms in order to earn a few pesos so she can take care of her small siblings.

She is asking for a loan to buy carrot seeds and organic fertilizer. This will allow her to produce more, increase her production and improve her income. 
She can then give her siblings a better quality of life and send them to school under better conditions. 

The loan will help Lizbeth and her siblings a lot in the hard work that she does.

loans.use: to buy carrot seeds and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Leyla Pamela

texts.es: Leyla , es un señorita de  23 años de edad, es soltera, la cliente trabaja en una empresa de distribuidora de carga pesada, donde la empresa queda a 10 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, actualmente  vive por la zona sud de la ciudad de Cochabamba, aproximadamente a 7  1/2 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, la casa donde vive es de sus padres, ella vive con sus padres y sus hermanos y el destino del crédito que solicita es para la compra de mercadería, (capital de operación), ya que quiere realizar un negocio donde tendrá más ingresos y de alguna u otra manera podrá satisfacer sus necesidades que tiene en su familia, ya que en este momento su trabajo no le genera un buen ingreso. Este crédito le ayudará bastante y ella está muy contenta de poder acceder a esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Leyla is a 23-year-old, single young woman. She works in a heavy load distributing company, located 10km away from the city of Cochabamba. Currently, Leyla is living in the southern part of Cochabamba, approximately 7 1/2 km from the heart of the city. She lives in her parents' house along with her siblings.

Leyla is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise (operating capital). She wants to increase her earnings and, in some way, help to meet her family's needs. Since her earnings at the moment are lacking, this loan will be extremely helpful as she improves her business. She is very happy to have this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Ruth Maria

texts.es: La señora Ruth llego de la ciudad de La paz desde muy temprana edad con nuevas perspectivas de vida junto a su familia, dedicándose al trabajo desde muy temprana edad donde solo llego a terminar el bachillerato y debido a la necesidad dejo a un lado sus planes de estudios es desde ahí que se puso a trabajar tiempo completo de ayudante de cocina de un restaurante de Quillacollo y que por factores de embarazo y las exigencias que había que cumplir dejo ese empleo hace 2 años y con los ahorros que tenía es donde decidió abrir este tipo de negocio, de librería, pensando en las necesidades que paso por la deficiencia de útiles escolares que tuvo en su niñez, Ella sola fue la que empezó su negocio con mucho sacrificio ya que tenía que atender a su familia a la misma vez. Ahora para ir consolidando este negocio es cuando quiere un préstamo para surtir su negocio y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Ruth came to the city of La Paz at a very young age with new perspectives on life, along with her family. She began to work at a very young age, and so, only continued her education long enough to graduate from high school. She left behind her plans to continue her studies because she needed to work full-time under a chef in a restaurant in Quillacollo. She left this job two years ago when she became pregnant. She decided to use some of her savings to open her own bookstore, remembering the lack of school supplies that she had as a girl. 

Ruth opened this business completely on her own, making many sacrifices and taking care of her family at the same time. Now, she is looking to strengthen her business and is requesting a loan to help her stock her store and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Yhair

texts.es: Yhair, tiene 26 años de edad es bachiller, soltero tiene sueños de seguir estudiando pero por falta de recursos económicos no puede, actualmente vive con sus padres, quienes son personas mayores ya de tercera edad no pueden costearle los estudios a su hijo pero el muchacho es trabajador lo comentan sus amigos y vecinos por ahora se dedica a trabajar en una parcela de lote agrícola que le otorgaron sus padres tiene cultivos de plátano y arroz pero no le es suficiente para que ahorre y continué con sus estudios a nivel profesional por tal motivo quiere mejorar sus ingresos con sus cultivos en su chaco (plátano). Yhair necesita  mucha ayuda económica para mejorar sus ingresos y así el joven pueda ser un gran profesional, nos comentaba que quiere ser abogado para coadyuvar a su familia.
texts.en:
Yhair is 26 years of age, single, and is a high school graduate. He dreams of continuing to study but because of a lack of economic resources he cannot.
Currently he lives with his parents, who are elderly people, whose advanced age means they cannot fund their son's studying. However, the boy is hardworking, as his friends and neighbours affirm. For now he works on a plot of farm land given to him by his parents. He has crops of plantain and rice but this is not enough for him to save money and to continue his studies to a professional level. For this reason he wants to improve his earnings with his farm (plantain). Yhair needs a lot of economic help to improve his earnings and so the young man can be a professional. He told us that he wants to be a lawyer to assist his family.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his plantain plantation.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
El Señor Marcial de 30 años de edad conviviente más de 8 años con la señora Lidia, ambos con una instrucción de nivel primario, tienen 2 hijos dependientes los cuales aún son pequeños, la familia vive en una comunidad rural de Segunda candelaria hacia el norte de Colomi.
Don Marcial y su esposa cuentan con una actividad económica producción agrícola, vende papa, papaliza, oca y haba de esta forma ellos mantienen económicamente a través de su trabajo para la alimentación de su familia, ellos necesitan un crédito para construcción de vivienda  ya que el espacio donde viven actualmente es pequeño y necesitan ampliar su vivienda, por este motivo solicitan el crédito ya que el ahorro que tenían invirtieron en compra de insumos agrícolas y compra de ganado vacuno.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Por ultimo el Sr. Marcial y Sra. se sintieron contentos al tener la oportunidad de poder acceder al crédito, además de poder contar con esta ayuda para poder ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Marcial is 30 years old and has been living with his wife, Lidia, for the last eight years. Both Marcial and Lidia have a primary-level education and have two young children. The family lives in a rural community, the Segunda Candelaria, north of Colomi. Marcial and his wife make a living farming and selling potatoes, potato chips, oca (a tuber native to the region), and beans. This is how they support their family.

Marcial is requesting this loan to build a house for his family. Currently, they live in a very small space that their family has outgrown. Marcial invested his savings to buy farming supplies and cattle, so he needs this loan to build his house. 

Marcial and his wife are very happy to have this opportunity, which will help them build a new house.

loans.use: to build his house.

loans.name: Lucio Cidar

texts.es:
LUCIO CIDAR  ES UNA PERSONA TRABAJADOR  DESDE MUY PEQUEÑO  EMPEZÓ A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA JUNTAMENTE CON SUS PADRES DONDE FUE APRENDIENDO A CULTIVAR PAPA, ZANAHORIA, CEBOLLA DURANTE  EN EL TIEMPO QUE CRECIÓ.
LUCIO CIDAR CON  46 AÑOS DE EDAD DURANTE ESTE TIEMPO VIVIÓ EN EL CAMPO  DESDE MUY PEQUEÑO POR LA POBREZA EMPEZÓ A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA COMO JORNALERO ESTA ÉPOCA POR EL DESASTRE NATURAL DE LA HELADA  SU PEQUEÑA PARCELA DE PAPA NO MADURO BIEN, ESTE DESASTRE LE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS QUE EL ESPERABA. POR LA DISTANCIA Y LEJANÍA  DE SU COMUNIDAD DEL PUEBLO VINO A VIVIR A LA PROVINCIA Y BUSCAR UNA MEJOR COMODIDAD DE VIDA PARA TODA SU FAMILIA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE SOLO COSECHAN UNA SOLA VEZ AL AÑO EN SU LUGAR NO CUENTAN CON RIEGO TIENEN QUE ESPERAR LA ÉPOCA DE AGUACERO PARA SEMBRAR SUS PRODUCTOS CON EL ESFUERZO DE SU TRABAJO Y CON EL  CRÉDITO QUE ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL DESEA TRABAJAR INDEPENDIENTEMENTE Y PARA COMENZAR NECESITA COMPRAR  ABONO ORGÁNICO Y SEMILLAS PARA  DE ESTA MANERA MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA
texts.en:
Lucio Cidar, 46 years old, is a hardworking man. Due to financial hardship, he began working in agriculture at a very young age, alongside his parents. From them, he learned to grow potatoes, carrots, and onions. Lucio Cidar practically grew up in the fields, and began working as a day laborer when a harsh frost ruined his potato crop. This was disastrous for the income that he heavily depended on. 

Lucio Cidar decided to move from his isolated town, closer to the province in search for a better life for his family. Where his family lives, there is only one harvest each year. There are no irrigation systems, so they have to wait for the rainy season to plant their crops. 

Lucio Cidar is requesting this loan so that he can work independently. In order to get started, he must buy organic fertilizer and seeds. In this way, he will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Modesta

texts.es: La señora Modesta y su esposo provienen  de familias humildes, trabajadoras y responsables, tienen más de treinta  años de casados. La señora Modesta desde que era muy joven se dedicó a la actividad del comercio,  logrando sacar adelante a sus ocho hijos, declara que al comienzo de esta actividad fue difícil, ya que se tuvo que ir de su lugar de nacimiento Inquisivi La Paz a la Ciudad de Cochabamba buscando un futuro mejor para sus hijos, ella recuerda que hace 25 años  comenzó la actividad de comercio soñando dar a sus hijos todas las oportunidades que ella no pudo tener,  por la voluntad y constancia la señora Modesta consiguió un puesto de comercio en el mercado de Quillacollo- Cochabamba,  por el servicio cordial y eficiente  la señora Modesta comenzó a incrementar y diversificar su clientela  , la necesidad por la cual busca el crédito es incrementar y variar  su mercadería.
texts.en:
Modesta and her husband come from humble, hard-working, and responsible families.  They have been married for over 30 years.  Modesta has been working in commerce ever since she was very young.  By doing so she managed to get her eight children ahead.

She says that in the beginning this business activity was difficult.  She had to leave the place where she was born, Inquisivi, La Paz, to go the city of Cochabamba looking for a better future for her children.  

She remembers that she started her commercial business activity 25 years ago.  She was dreaming of giving her children all of the opportunities that she was not able to have.  Through her will and her perseverance Modesta got a commercial stand at the Quillacollo – Cochabamba market.  

Due to her cordial and efficient service, Modesta started to increase and diversify her clientele.  The reason she needs to look for a loan is to increase and vary her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Laureano

texts.es: Don. Laureano, tiene 33 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por siete miembros cinco hijos y los dos padres, es una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos, viven en el municipio de Mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura y la pecuaria, produce papa, frejol y cebolla; los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Don Laureano es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la alimentación y la educación de su familia. Por el desborde del rio Moqontuyu, ha perdido sus cultivos de frejol, papa, maní y una cuarta hectárea de terreno cultivable. Don Laureano, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más semillas, abonos y agroquímicos  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia,, y poder recuperarse antes estos desastres naturales.
texts.en:
Laureano is 33 years of age. There are seven members in his family: five children and the two parents. It is a humble family with few economic resources. They live in the small town of Mizque, in the Cochabamba department. He works in agriculture and livestock. He grows potatoes, beans and onions, which he sells in his home town to the businesses in Mizque. 

Laureano is a well-respected member of his community because of his dedication to his work and also because he is the one who takes responsibility for his family's education and food requirements.

He lost his potato, bean and groundnut crops, as well as a quarter hectare of arable land, when the River Moqontuyu burst its banks. Laureano is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertiliser and agrochemicals and to improve his family’s situation, so as to be able to recover from this natural disaster.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers and agrochemicals

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: El señor Cesar, es una persona de 25 años de edad, de estado civil soltero pero vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo las cuales son sus pequeñas hijas. La actividad económica principal del señor Cesar es el servicio de cerrajería, trabaja en el taller de su hermano que se halla situado en la población de Tíraque, asimismo se dedica a la producción agrícola, produce papa y trigo en sus propios terrenos las cuales se hallan situadas en la comunidad de Laguna del municipio de Araní y finalmente también cabe mencionar que su esposa realiza la venta de pipocas de maíz en Tíraque especialmente en época escolar por el cual también genera ingresos económicos adicionales.
