These same lower-income farmers are sadly stuck spending $10-$15 per month - a considerable portion of their income - on lighting and phone charging.

To break this cycle and provide renewable energy to these farmers, Joyce would like to start offering flexible payment terms to those who need it most. She seeks support from Kiva lenders to make this happen.

Joyce will use funds for 150 BrightBoxes, which will be used to energize and empower farming households across the region. Farmers will be able to collect BrightBox systems immediately and pay for them over several months. Since they are currently spending money on polluting, unsafe, and inefficient energy, most will save enough to recoup costs in 4-5 months and never worry about fuel or fire again. With your help, Joyce will help farming families eliminate energy expenses, improve safety, and allow their children to read into the night.

loans.use: to pay for solar energy systems and offer financing plans to lower-income farmers.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Virgen Asunta” del distrito de Izcuchaca de la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de la crianza de animales menores, venta de hortalizas, venta de comida, venta de leche, engorde de ganado y otros brindar servicio de albañilería. 

Yuli es miembro del banco comunal tiene 25 años de edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Limatambo pero vive en la ciudad de Izcuchaca, ella se dedica a la venta de comida. Ya son  3 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Yuli en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo carne, sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, verduras, aceite y otras cosas más. (Las persoans que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografia llegaron tarde a la reunion). 
 
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends established the Virgen Asunta Communal Bank in Izcuchaca district, in Anta province in the department of Cusco. This bank is made up of several people who are constantly looking for opportunities to get ahead and to provide a better future for their children through their daily efforts. The members of the bank have different businesses, which include raising small animals, selling vegetables, food sales, milk sales, fattening cattle and construction.

Yuli is a member of the communal bank. She is 25 years old and has a common-law partner with whom she has a son. She was born in the city of Limatambo, but lives in the city of Izcuchaca. She has had a business selling meals for three years and it has been going very well. At present, Yuli needs a loan in order to purchase more supplies such as meat, sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, vegetables, cooking oil and other items.

(The two people shown in the lower left-hand insert arrived at the meeting too late to be in the group photo).

The bank members are grateful for the opportunity being provided to them and are committed to making their respective payments within the established time period.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, such as meat, sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, vegetables, cooking oil and other items.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en:
Kassem is a 35-year-old Lebanese married man who lives with his wife and three children, all of whom attend school. Since 2004, he has been a painter and is well-known among people. Kassem provides the only source of income for his family and he therefore works hard to earn higher returns. 

Kassem is requesting a loan from the Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase new painting equipment to expand his business. His loan will enable him to start a new project on time. Kassem is sure that his loan will push him to take on more and bigger projects in the near future to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase new painting equipment

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old Lebanese single man who lives with his parents and two siblings. He owns an internet cafe in his town and he welcomes customers from different areas and villages to enjoy their time. Mohammad is responsible for providing for his family's expenses and covering the high costs of living. 

Mohammad is requesting a youth loan from the Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to increase his inventory of computers to accommodate new clients and increase his profits. In the future, Mohammad plans to expand his business and add a corner into his shop to serve food and sandwiches.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of computers to accommodate new clients

loans.name: Zarohi

texts.en:
Zarohi, age 48, is a tailor. She started her business in 2007. She has her own shop, located in a strategically strong location in the town where she lives with her husband, their two children, and two other relatives. Zarohi helps her husband and son to generate income to support the family.

Zarohi is a stylish and fashionable woman, and she seeks to please her customers as much as she can. This is why she has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l., which she will use to purchase a wide variety of textiles and tailoring tools. This investment will help her to improve her business and thereby increase her productivity. 

Zarohi has a lot of responsibilities, and she considers this to be the perfect time to better develop her work and augment her earnings.  Her goal for the near future is to expand her business to areas outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase a wide variety of textiles and tailoring tools

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
An independent young man working really hard to build his career, Ali is a 32-year-old Lebanese man living with his wife and three school-aged children. After gaining many years of experience in his present occupation, Ali was able to open his own barbershop. Due to his good business reputation, he has been achieving his goals and building a good career with a fair number of loyal customers.

With his requested loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l., Ali will renovate his salon’s decor in order to satisfy customer demand and serve them better. He seeks to expand his business and income to enhance his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate his salon’s decor.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 19-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and two working siblings. He aims to work really hard in order to satisfy his family's needs. Hussein decided to work on his own and has opened his own carpentry shop. He’s a reputable person who has gained a fair number of loyal customers so far. He works independently and looks forward to taking on new projects. Today, he needs to take out a youth loan from Kiva's partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase an electrical saw for his work. He also wants to buy new tools and materials. He notes that this will improve his business; thus, boost his productivity. In the future, he plans to take on bigger projects and better develop his work.

loans.use: to purchase an electrical saw for his work

loans.name: Roger

texts.en: Roger is a 46-year-old Lebanese man. He’s divorced and has only one child. Roger is ready to sacrifice his life just to offer his child a suitable life far from problems and complications. Although Roger had to work really hard and nonstop, he was capable of managing the family household in a good way. He has many years of experience as a car mechanic and opened his own garage many years ago. As he wishes to better develop his work, Roger is asking today for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase a new scanner machine. This step will facilitate his business, allowing him to receive more clients who are going to be served rapidly.

loans.use: to purchase a new scanner machine

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 42-year-old married man from Lebanon. He is living with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He has worked as a blacksmith since 2002 and has gained a great experience. To be able to afford the high costs of living and meet his family needs, Mohammad was obliged to work continually. Although he stated that his financials are barely enough, this is why he is requesting today to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase added metal for his business. This will definitely boost his business operations, thus his profits. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and better develop his business.

loans.use: to purchase added metal for his business

loans.name: Blanca Piedad

texts.es:
Blanca es casada viene con el esposo y con los hijos en San Jose de Chimbo Provincia de Bolivar.

Blanca se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cultivo de maiz y trigo en el sector de la ciudala Sangrado Corazon de Jesus edn San jose de Chimbo.

El credito solicita para la comprar de abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y fungicidas para los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a adquirir los productos necesarios para realizar el cultivo de maiz y trigo.

El sueño de Blanca es aumentar la produccion y tener mas utilizades para seguir invirtirndo en la agricultura. En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear con los hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca is married and lives with her husband and children in San Jose de Chimbo, Bolivar Province.

Blanca is a farmer who grows corn and wheat in a section of the Sangrado Corazon de Jesus neighborhood in San Jose de Chimbo. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, and fungicides for her crops. This loan will help her acquire the products that she needs to grow her corn and wheat crops.

Blanca dreams of increasing her production so that she can generate more profits and continue investing in her farming activities. In her free time, she enjoys going for walks with her children.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, and fungicides for her crops.

loans.name: Margarita María

texts.es:
Margarita a sus 18 años de edad, ya piensa como toda una empresaria, montar su propio negocio es su gran sueño y por el cual se encuentra luchando a fin de convertirlo en una realidad. Cuenta que aprendió el oficio viendo a su hermana quien es estilista, se apasionó tanto por este trabajo que realizó un curso para perfeccionar su conocimiento. Hoy ya labora como independiente  frecuentando los clientes que solicitan su servicio.
 
Margarita desea abrir un salón de belleza, por lo cual recurrió a un crédito para comprar los implementos necesarios para su funcionamiento como plancha de cabello, secador, kit de cepillos y esmaltes.
Con los ingresos recaudados, gracias a su trabajo, esta joven colabora con los gastos del hogar, debido a que las condiciones económicas de su familia no son las más optimas. 
Su mayor sueño es poder iniciar una carrera universitaria con el propósito de convertirse en una profesional y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Margarita, at her 18 years of age, is already thinking quite like a businesswoman.  To start her own business is her great dream and for which she is struggling in order to make it into a reality.  She says that she learned the trade watching her sister who is a stylist.  She got so excited by this work that she took a course to perfect her knowledge.  Today she already works independently seeing the customers who request her service.

Margarita wants to open a beauty salon, therefore she turned to a loan to buy the necessary implements for her operation like a hair iron, hair dryer, brush kit and nail polishes.  With the income gathered, thanks to her work, this young woman contributes to the household expenses, due to the fact that the economic conditions of her family aren’t the most optimal.

Her greatest dream is to be able to start a university degree with the intention of becoming a professional and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a hair iron, hair dryer, brush kit and nail polish.

loans.name: Nyakazinga Group

texts.en: ifa is a single mother of 5 from Nyakazinga, rural Ntungamo. She buys and sells goats for survival. Her previous loan was paid well so she has come for another loan of 500,000 UGX to buy more goats which she will rear and then sell after a period of three months depending on the market price. With the proceeds, she will be able to pay tuition for her children as well as meeting the other household necessities. She is a hardworking and resilient lady.

loans.use: To buy goats

loans.name: Good Time Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 59-year-old Alice from Mutare. She is married and is living with one child, who is attending school. She also cares for two dependents.

Alice runs a retail business selling electrical gadgets (fridges, tvs and radios) and clothes. The business has been in operation for 8 years. She says the main challenges faced are high customs duties at the border post.

Alice has requested a loan of $900 to purchase electrical gadgets. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to improve her family's general welfare. In the future,  Alice plans to have ownership of her own shop.

loans.use: to buy clothes from South Africa for resale

loans.name: Tsuwa

texts.en:
Tsuwa is a 34 year old from Samburu, Kenya. He is married and has two children. He lives in a rental house in a rural coastal town of Kenya with solar electricity. He has a butchery business which he has been operating for the last two years.

He has been approached for a loan amounting to KES 50,000 to buy goats to sell in his butchery. He is grateful for the opportunity.

loans.use: to buy goats to sell in his butcher shop.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.en: Ernestina sells books and stationery in Elmina, Ghana. Ernestina has received schooling through to secondary school level.  She is married and has five children. Her husband also sells books alongside her. Ernestina has been selling books for several years now. She is responsible for supporting her husband with their family's general expenses. Her loan will be used to buy an increased quantity and variety of books to sell in the market. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to grow her book trade and to meet rising customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy an increased quantity and variety of books to sell in the market.

loans.name: Ndeye Arame's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 27 femmes faisant partie du banc villageois Adja Saly1. Les plus anciennes sont membres depuis l'inauguration dudit banc villageois le 09 juillet 2011. Ces femmes sont en bonne entente.

L'emprunteuse en vedette de ce groupe, Khady, est une femme de 50 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 03 filles. Elle fait du petit commerce de tissus. Elle fait aussi de la couture. Sur la photo, elle est debout tout à fait à droite avec la main levée.

Avec son prêt, elle espère pouvoir agrandir son activité en achetant plus de tissus que dans le passé.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle voudrait pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group comprises 27 women who are members of the Adja Saly 1 "banc villageois".  Some of these women have been members since July 9, 2011, when the banc villageois was created.  The members of the group get along well with one another. 

Khady, the group's featured borrower, is a 50-year-old woman.  She is married and the mother of five children, including three girls.  She is involved in small retail business and sells fabrics.  She is also a seamstress.  She is standing at the far right of the photo, raising her hand.

With her loan, she hopes to be abe to expand her business and purchase more fabric than in the past.

She hopes that her profits will help her to take care of her children's needs.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for sewing and retail resale.

loans.name: Wilfredo Jr.

texts.en:
Wilfredo is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

He is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for his food vending business.

Wilfredo has been in this business for 21 years. Wilfredo earns more income from beauty salon.

Wilfredo successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build his restaurant and beauty salon business.

Wilfredo has been sustaining he business activities through he own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. He dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy additional ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is married with four children. Estrella is 54 years old and lives in Namnama, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Estrella has owned a general store to earn a living for 15 years. Each month, she earns 4,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, etc.

Estrella has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Estrella hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock such as shampoo, toothpaste, etc.

loans.name: Lorelie

texts.en:
Lorelie is 62 years old and lives in Canunan, Guipos, ZDS. She is widowed with 3 children.                       

To earn a living, Lorelie has a business selling snacks. She earns about 4 thousand pesos each month doing this type of work. Lorelie has requested a loan to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business.                   

Lorelie has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, Lorelie would like to have more distribution of her snacks.

loans.use: to purchase more raw ingredients for her snack vending business.

loans.name: Elizabeth's Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 61 years old and lives in Lumbia, Pagadian City. She is married with 2 children.

To earn a living, she has a business selling food. She earns about 6500 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan amounting to 7000 PHP to use as additional capital for her business.

She has been a member for 2 years. In the future she would like to have her own stall in her town.

loans.use: to have additional capital for her food vending business.

loans.name: Profetisa

texts.en:
Profetisa is widowed, with three children. Profetisa is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines.                    

Profetisa is a farmer and grows palay to earn a living. She has been doing this for ten years. She has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer.

Profetisa has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for five years. In the future, Profetisa hopes to harvest more palay during every cropping.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Elda

texts.en:
Elda is 52 years old, married, with two children who are in school. They are presently living in Cangmohao, Siquijor, Siquijor.

She has been engaged in the general store business for 19 years and earns PHP 4,000 (four thousand pesos) per month to earn a living.

She's a new member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) and has requested a loan amounting to PHP 7,000 (seven thousand pesos) to purchase raw ingredients for her general store business, such as shampoo, toothpaste, and soap.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her general store business, such as shampoo, toothpaste, and soap.

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
Anne is a farmer who mainly grows maize and does dairy farming.  She had requested for a previous loan which she used to buy maize seedlings and fertilizer.  She got a lot of farm yields and she made a good profit out of her sales.
This helped Anne to repay her loan and pay school fees for her children.  She has requested for another loan of 20, 87 KES to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 74 years old and widowed with six children.  She does crop farming to earn a living.  She also owns a retail shop where she earns extra income.  Through Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business because she has been trained on business management skills.
Her desire is to practice large-scale farming for more income generation in the future. She needs a loan of 53, 156 KES to buy fertilizer, seedlings and farm inputs.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer,seedlings and farm inputs

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is 48 years old, married and has four children.  He does farming to earn a living.  He has been farming from 2006.  He also owns a van for transport business.  Through Faulu Kenya, he has grown his businesses because he has been trained on business management skills.  He has also learnt how to save his money.
Moses hopes to own another van in five years for more income generation.  He also desires to practice large-scale farming.  
He needs a loan of 32, 298 KES to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizer

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice sells a variety of provisions at her shop. She also sells pots, soft drinks and pure water to her customers. Beatrice’s provisions shop is located in the town of Elmina. Beatrice has been working in this business for some time now. 

Beatrice has received a middle school education.  She is married and has no children living at her home. Her husband is a petty trader in their community. Beatrice is responsible for helping her husband with their general expenses and saving for their future. Her loan will be used to buy an increased quantity and variety of provisions to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to expand her provisions shop and meet her community's demand.

loans.use: to buy an increased quantity and variety of provisions to sell.

loans.name: Jovy

texts.en:
Jovy is 44 years old and is married. She sells bags around her village as a source of income. Her husband is a farmer and her partner in making their living better. With her determination to achieve her dream, Jovy keeps on her journey in life by selling bags. 

Jovy’s wish is for continued growth of her business to gain higher income and invest in an additional businesses as a source of income. She is requesting a loan of PHP 18,000 to buy more bags to sell. She hopes to manage her business well and to be able to have a better living.

loans.use: to buy more bags to sell

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia is 53 years old and is married to Cruzaldo, a father who is engaged in a rice farming business. They work hard to raise their four children. Cecilia is busy managing their hog-raising business. She has been in this business for six years. Right now, Cecilia is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 17,000 to buy feed, vaccines, and vitamins to sustain the proper growth of her hogs.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, and vitamins

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: El Sr. Gregorio tiene 63 años, el se dedica  a la  venta de  ganado vacuno, el vive en la localidad de Chirapaca, la gente de la población se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  El Sr. Gregorio utilizara  este préstamo para la compra  de una vaca que le están ofreciendo a un bajo costo y quiere aprovechar esta oportunidad,  Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es no tiene dinero  para la compra ya que esto le beneficiara de gran manera  y mejorar sus ingresos económicos, El Sr. Gregorio enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el forraje que debe comprar cada cierto tiempo, y  utilizara los beneficios mejorar su ganado,  sueña comprar otras vacas y así de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Gregorio, age 63, sells cattle.  He lives in Chirapaca, where the people devote themselves to farming and livestock.  This is his first cycle within the institution.

Gregorio will use this loan to buy a cow that is being offered at a low cost.  He wants to take advantage of this opportunity.  His reason for requesting this loan is that he does not have money to buy it.  This will help him a great deal, and his income will improve.

The challenge that Gregorio faces in his business is the fodder that he needs to buy on a regular basis.  He will use the profits to improve his livestock.  He dreams of buying other cows and improving his income that way.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.es:
Jhonny está casado, tiene un hijo y vive en la zona de San Martin de la ciudad de La Paz, tiene un auto para transportar pasajeros con el cual genera sus ingresos de forma diaria y puede mantener a su familia, 

Jhonny solicita el crédito para efectuar el mantenimiento de su vehículo y ponerlo en buen estado de funcionamiento ya que es su única fuente de ingresos con la cual se mantiene y mantiene a su familia.

El sueño de Jhonny es poder tener su empresa de radio taxi y tener su casa propia ya que actualmente vive en alquiler.
texts.en:
Jhonny is married, has a son, and lives in the San Martin neighborhood of the city of La Paz.  He has a car to transport passengers that he uses to generate a daily income and support his family.

Jhonny is asking for a loan to perform maintenance on his car and get it in good working condition as it is his only source of income to support himself and his family.

Jhonny's dream is to have his own radio taxi business and his own home, as he currently rents.

loans.use: to pay for general maintenance on his taxi

loans.name: Kofia Keur Momar Sarr Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe existe depuis le 07/07/2011, date de création du Banc Villageois. Il est composé de 29 femmes qui habitent dans le même village.

La responsable du groupe, levant la main à droite de la photo, s'appelle Minetou, elle est âgée de 48 ans, marié et mère de 6 enfants ( 2 garçons et 4 filles). 
Elle s'active dans le petit commerce de sucre, de tabac, de thé...au marché du village.

Avec les bénéfices obtenus elle espère pouvoir augmenter son épargne et développer son activité.
texts.en: This group was formed on the 7th of July, 2011, the same day the "banc villageois" was created. It is made up of 29 women who all live in the same village. The group's representative, Minetou, is on the right of the photo and has her hand raised. She is 48 years old, married and the mother of 6 children (2 boys and 4 girls). She sells items like sugar, tobacco and tea at the village market. She hopes to use the profits she earns to increase her savings and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (e.g. sugar, tobacco, tea) for her business.

loans.name: Oumouff's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Keur Thierno de ce banc villageois a été créé le 29 décembre 2010. Il compte 23 femmes. Les femmes habitent la même concession et leur principale activité est l'embouche.

La représentante de ce groupe, Gnagna Wedou, est une femme mariée de 44 ans avec 5 enfants dont un garçon. Elle fait de l'embouche. Elle achète du bétail qu'elle engraisse pendant 05 mois et les revend au marché hebdomadaire.Sur la photo elle est debout avec la main levée.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 10 têtes de moutons qui pèsent environ 20Kg.

Avec les bénéfices, le membre compte mieux s'occuper de la scolarité de ses enfants et augmenter son niveau d'épargne.
texts.en:
The solidarity of this Banc Villageois, the Keur Thierno Group, was founded on December 29, 2010. There are 23 women in this group. They all live in the same concession and their main business is raising livestock.

The representative of this group is named Gnagna Wedou. She is a married woman who is 44 years of age and who has five children, one of whom is a boy. Her business is raising livestock. Gnagna Wedou purchases livestock, which she then fattens for five months before reselling them at the weekly market. She is shown in the photo standing and with her hand raised. With her loan, Gnagna Wedou intends to purchase ten heads of sheep weighing approximately 20 kg each. With the income she earns, Gnagna Wedou plans to pay for her children's education and increase her level of savings.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Jamilu

texts.en:
Jamilu is a married 30 year old farmer, from Katuri, Kaduna State. He uses the yield he produces from his farm to take care of his family of 10.  Jamilu has been farming from a very young age and although he has years of experience, his inability to access the right inputs such as high-quality seeds and fertilizers has seen years of below average yields from his maize farm.  A Babban Gona loan of $485 would help Jamilu see improvements in his crops by providing him with seeds and fertilizers while allowing him the means to store his crops and the ability to sell them at a premium market price.  By receiving a Babban Gona loan, Jamilu has the opportunity to reap yields and earn profits three times as high as the average Nigerian farmer.

With the technical training he has received from Babban Gona, Jamilu can envision a future where he is better able to provide for his large family.  He has the chance to see his children obtain a good education and maintain a healthier lifestyle, as his farm continues to grow and eventually moves from subsistence farming to commercial scale farming.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, seeds, and agricultural technologies to increase maize yields

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is  young and energetic, and he is happy to serve his community and to uplift the welfare of his family. Eric is married with two children and lives in the crowded Kawangware neighborhood of Nairobi.  Eric has been involved in small-scale retail business, and now he wants to purchase a motorcycle to  make a difference in his community by engaging in community health outreach programs run by a local  Community-Based Organization (CBO). A motorcycle will enable him to do volunteer community health work, along with income-generating activities, more efficiently. 

Additionally, he will enroll in the local clinic to be on call for any emergencies at night. He will also take part in volunteer community health worker (CHW) counseling lessons for advising youth on drug abuse and HIV/AIDS prevention. 

Eric is excited to own his own motorcycle and is ready to give back to the community as a trainee CHW volunteer in Nairobi. Eric will also use the income generated from his motorcycle business to support his family and pay back this loan.

He plans to buy another motorcycle and support more CHWs in future. Eric wants to lead youth to volunteer as CHWs in their communities, aiming to recruit more members.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle to support community health work

loans.name: Ester

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos residente no bairro 6 desde 2004.
É negociante de profissão e com o presente empréstimo pretende adquirir material de construção (chapas de zinco e barrotes) para cobrir sua residência.
No futuro espera terminar sua obra e estar devidamente apetrechada pelo todas as suas atenções estão viradas para o efeito, e para tal irá priorizar os reembolso .
O seu maior desafio é flexibilizar o reembolso do empréstimo de forma aceder aos outros subsequentes.
texts.en:
Married and the father of 5 children, he has lived in neighborhood 6 since 2004.

He is a trader by profession and with this loan he plans to buy construction material (sheets of zinc and beams) to create a roof for his house. In future, he hopes to finish the building work and fit out his home. All his energies are focused on this at the moment and to this end he will prioritize paying back this loan.

His greatest challenge to be flexible enough to pay back this loan in order to have access to subsequent loans.

loans.use: construction material (sheets of zinc and beams) to create a roof for his house

loans.name: Alberto

texts.pt:
Casado e vivendo com sua esposa e residente em Changalane
É activista da saúde e comerciante, possui negócio próprio e com o empréstimo pretende comprar produtos diversos (arroz, açúcar, óleo) para revenda.
Para o futura almeja adquirir uma viatura próprio que lhe facilitará o transporte de mercadoria e ampliar o seu estabelecimento comercial.
Constitui seu maior desafio reembolsar o crédito com maior rapidez de forma aceder outro empréstimo.
texts.en:
Alberto is married and lives with his wife in Changalane.

He's a health activist and a trader, owns his own business and with this loan he plans to buy various products (rice, sugar, oil) for resale.

In future Alberto hopes to buy a vehicle which will facilitate the transport of his goods and to expand his commercial establishment.

His greatest challenge is to pay back this loan as quickly as possible so that he can request another loan.

loans.use: buy various products (rice, sugar, oil) for resale.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.pt:
Natural de Maputo, casado maritalmente a 4 anos e pai de 4 filhos, dos quais uma já na idade escolar. Sustenta mais 3 pessoas sendo 2 (duas) sobrinhas e sua mãe.
Tem o negócio como sua actividade, sendo um cliente que já teve 3 financiamento e com o presente empréstimo pretende adquirir diverso produtos para comercialização (arroz, feijão, fósforo, velas etc) como forma de incrementar seu stock.
No futuro aspira ampliar cada vez mais a sua actividade e o seu maior desafio é juntar fundo suficiente para o efeito porque só assim poderá expandir o seu negócio
texts.en:
Ernesto was born in Maputo, has been married for 4 years and has 4 children, one of whom is already of school-going age. He supports 3 additional people - 2 (two) nieces and his mother.

He owns a business and is a client who has had loans from Hluvuku 3 times already. With the current loan he plans to buy various products to sell (rice, beans, matches, candles, etc) in order to increase his stock.

In future he aspires to expanding his commercial activities and his greatest challenge is having enough funds to do this.

loans.use: buy various products to sell (rice, beans, matches, candles, etc) in order to increase his stock.

loans.name: Lucy N.

texts.en: Lucy is a lady, thirty-two years old, married to John, and the mother of two children. She operates a mobile money transfer service (M-PESA) and also sells CDs in her retail shop. She has been in this business for five years and receives a monthly income of 35,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). This will be Lucy’s second loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to add to the M-PESA float (working capital) of her money transfer service. In the future she wants to open another shop.

loans.use: to add to the float (working capital) of her M-PESA money transfer service.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a very hardworking man. He is not afraid of getting his hands dirty for the sake of his family.
He is married with three children all in high school and he is the bread winner. 
He lives with his family in Gakui sublocation, Thika district, central kenya. 
He and his wife are dairy farmers. They have Seven cows producing 20 liters of milk per day. This they sell at ksh 30, earning around ksh 18,000 per month.
However with the many family responsibilities he could not save enough to have a biogas constructed for him, so he took a loan with VEP of ksh 100,000 to help facilitate this.
His energy expense include one bag of charcoal per month for ksh 1,200, 20 litters of kerosine for lighting  at ksh 1600 and firewood which he doesnt buy but his wife spends atleast 2 hours a day to go collect.
With Biogas, he will be able to save that money, He and his wife can have some time to rest or do other chores while they will as well enjoy a cleaner smoke free kitchen.
He says happily that with biogas, he can also enjoy cooking for his wife once in a while as a treat or when the wife is not around he will not have a problem warming his food as its easy to light a biogas jiko.
Savings from fuel expenses and income from the sale of milk will enable him pay for the loan comfortably while enjoying convinient cooking and lighting.

loans.use: TO INSTAL A BIOGAS

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 42 years old, married and has three children. She is in the business of selling clothes and has been in business for the past twelve years. She also practices farming. She used her previous loan to buy clothes for resale. Her business flourished and she successfully repaid her loan. She is a very hard working lady and describes her business as quite busy. Through Faulu Kenya, she has learnt how to save her money for future purposes.
She hopes to be a very successful business lady and to open a boutique. She requires a loan of 32,298 KES to pay school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es:
Evelyn es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, en el distrito de Aguaytia con su esposo y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Evelyn no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Medicina Humana, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar y en algunas ocasiones prepara un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho y dedicación, Evelyn trabaja en su pequeño taller de costura y confección de prendas de vestir, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Evelyn se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de telas, moldes, alfileres y otros materiales para realizar sus trabajos, de esta manera Evelyn podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para tener su casa propia y lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus pequeños convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Evelyn is a 22-year-old woman who lives with her husband and two young children in the city of Pucallpa, in the district of Aguaytia. She loves her family very much and they are her biggest motivation in life. Evelyn is a kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person. Together with her husband, she dedicates herself entirely to helping her family get ahead. Unfortunately, due to scarce financial resources, Evelyn had to begin working at a young age and was not able to study Medicine like she had wanted to. In her free time, Evelyn likes to cook. On special occasions she makes a delicious Ceviche to share with her family. 

By her own initiative and with much dedication, Evelyn works in a small sewing shop repairing and making garments. She works 8-hour days each day and believes that she has been successful so far because of the kind way she treats her customers. 

Evelyn is very grateful to Kiva lenders for the help being offered to her. With this loan she will be able to buy fabrics, sewing patterns, pins, and other necessary supplies for her work. In this way, Evelyn will be able to take on more customers. She plans to continue working hard in order to one day own a house and to fulfill her dream of seeing her children get good jobs as professionals.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Keyly Geraldina

texts.es:
Keyly es una joven de 18 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Keyly se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Ingeniería de Sistemas, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Adobo de Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Keyly trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y verduras, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Keyly se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de dos andamios y mercadería, como arroz, azúcar, verduras, leche, menestras y otros, de esta manera Keyly tendrá mejor acondicionado su negocio y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran convertirse en una buena profesional y poco a poco desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Keyly is an 18-year-old, single young woman. She lives in the city of Nazca with her parents and siblings. Keyly is a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with dreams of succeeding. Thanks to the hard work and support of her parents, Keyly is currently able to study Systems Engineering. In her free time, Keyly likes to watch television and on special occasions she cooks the delicious Adobo de Pollo (a typical chicken dish) to share with her family. 

Through her own initiative and with much determination and dedication, Keyly works in her own small grocery store. She works 10-hour days each day and believes that her success so far is due to the competitive prices she offers and the kind way she treats her customers.

Keyly is very grateful to Kiva lenders and the help offered to her that will let her buy two shelving units and merchandise such as rice, sugar, vegetables, milk, vegetable soup, and others. In this way, Keyly will keep her store better set up and she will be able to serve more customers. Keyly plans to continue working hard toward her dream of becoming a professional and little by little moving forward.

loans.use: to buy two shelving units and merchandise.

loans.name: Karina Zenaida

texts.es:
Karina es una mujer de 26 años, es soltera vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Karina no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Ambiental, pero le gustaría poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver novelas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Karina trabaja como cajera en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Karina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un pequeño refrigerador, el cual le servirá de mucho para poder conservar adecuadamente sus alimentos y bebidas, de esta manera podrá contar con mayor seguridad y bienestar al momentos de consumir sus alimentos, así pues Karina seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y poco a poco desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Karina is 26 years old. She is single and lives in the city of Ica with her parents and siblings. Karina is a kind, hardworking and enthusiastic young woman who dreams of succeeding. Unfortunately, due to scarce financial resources, Karina had to begin working at an early age and was not able to study Environmental Engineering. like she had hoped to. In her free time, Karina likes to watch soap operas and, on special occasions, she cooks the delicious Ají de Gallina (a typical chicken dish) to share with her family. 

Through her own initiative, and with much dedication and determination, Karina works the cash register for a store in her city. She works 10-hour days each day believes that she has been successful thanks to her work ethic and the kind way she treats others. 

Karina is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help offered her, she will be able to buy a small refrigerator, which will be very useful to her. Being able to adequately refrigerate food and beverages will improve the health and well-being of her family. Karina will continue working hard toward her dream of one day owning a house and, little by little, moving forward.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Margarita Irene

texts.es:
Margarita es una mujer de 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su hijo, ya que ella es madre y padre para él; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Margarita no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Mariscos para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Margarita trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Margarita se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, como cosméticos, perfumes, esmaltes de uñas, desodorantes, cremas y otros, de esta manera Margarita tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Margarita, 51, lives in the city of Pisco with her son who she loves and is her main reason for living. 

She is a very hard working, kind and enthusiastic person who devotes all her efforts to getting her son ahead in life since she a single parent. 

Unfortunately due to a lack of economic resources, and because she had to work from when she was very young, Margarita could not study Business Administration as she had wanted. 

In her spare time she likes to play sports and sometimes she will cook a delicious meal of rice and seafood to share with her family. 

On her own initiative and with a lof of effort and dedication Margarita has a small business selling beauty products. She works every day for approximately ten hours and believes it is going well due to her experience and because she treats her customers well. 

Margarita is very thankful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the help given she can buy more merchandise such as cosmetics, perfumes, nail polish, deodorant, creams etc.. This way her business is better stocked and she can take care of more customers. 

She can keep working and striving to achieve her big dream of owning her own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Madeleine Justina

texts.es:
Madeleine es una mujer de 42 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposo y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Madeleine no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Pescado Frito para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Madeleine trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de choclos y zapallos, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Madeleine se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de choclos y zapallos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para abastecer su negocio y atender a más clientes, así pues Madeleine seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Madeleine is a 42-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Ica with her husband and their two children, whom she loves and who are her principal cause in life. 

She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic woman who, with her husband, dedicates all her effort to getting their family ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need she had to work at a very young age, Madeleine was unable to study for a professional degree in Education.

In her free time, she likes to watch movies and on some occasions she cooks a delicious fried fish meal to share with her family.

Madeleine works in her small business selling corn and pumpkins on her own initiative and with much effort and dedication. She works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes it is going well for her due to her good prices and the friendly treatment she offers her clients. 

Madeleine is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help they offer, she will be able to buy a larger quantity of corn and pumpkins, which will help her to supply her business and attend to more clients. 

In this way, Madeleine will continue working and striving to achieve her great dream of having her own home.

loans.use: to buy corn and pumpkins

loans.name: Martha Beatriz

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer de 54 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus hijos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Martha no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Derecho, pero le hubira gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear con sus hijos por las acogedoras y calurosas calles de su ciudad.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Martha trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, adicionalmente tiene 2 mototaxis las cuales alquila a choferes para que brinden servicios de transporte, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Martha se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento general que necesitan sus mototaxis, de esta manera ella podrá seguir alquilando sus vehículos, así pues Martha seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Martha, 54, lives in the city of Ica with her three children who she loves and are her main reason for living. 

She is a very nice, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all her efforts to getting her family ahead as she is a single parent. Unfortunately, due to poor economic resources and because she had to work since she was very young, Martha was not able to study law but she would have very much liked to. 

In her free time, Martha likes to stroll through the cozy hot streets of the city with her children. 

By her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Martha owns a grocery store. She also has two motorcycle taxis which she rents to drivers so that they can provide transportation services. 

She works every day for approximately ten hours and believes it is going well due to her good prices and great customer service. 

Martha is very thankful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help she is able to do general maintenance on the motorcycle taxis. 

This way she can keep renting out the vehicles and she can keep working and striving to reach her big dream of owning her own home.

loans.use: to provide general maintenance to her motorcycle taxis.

loans.name: Marcelina Victoria

texts.es:
Marcelina es una mujer de 56 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, lamentablemente es viuda, hace ya algún tiempo sufrió la pérdida de su esposo, desde entonces ella ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Marcelina trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ella tiene un pequeño puesto en un mercadillo de su ciudad, allí atiende a sus clientes ofreciéndoles diversos platos típicos de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Marcelina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su puesto de ventas, ya que desea comprar un toldo para proteger del sol a sus clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos y desea verlos convertido es buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Marcelina is a 56-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Nazca with her two children, whom she loves and who are her principal cause in life. 

She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person. Unfortunately, she is a widow, and for a while now she has suffered due to the loss of her husband. Since that moment she has dedicated all her effort to getting her family ahead. In her free time she likes to distract herself by watching television and on some occasions she cooks a delicious Lomo Saltado (A Peruvian meat, vegetable and rice dish) to share with her family.  

Marcelina  works in her small store selling food, on her own initiative, and with much effort and dedication. She has a small booth in a market in her city. There she attends to her clients, offering them different meals typical of her city. She works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes it is going well for her due to her good flavors and the friendly treatment she offers her clients.

Marcelina is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help they offer, she will be able to make improvements to her sales booth, since she wishes to purchase an awning to protect her clients from the sun. Thus she will continue working and striving to achieve her great dream of being able to offer her children a good education and her wish to see them become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy an awning for her booth

loans.name: Anela Lina

texts.es:
Angela es una mujer de 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus hijos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Angela no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las acogedoras y calurosas calles de su ciudad y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Tacu Tacu para compartir con si familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Angela trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Angela se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de mercadería, como arroz, azúcar, leche, menestras, dulces, golosinas, gaseosas y otros, de esta manera Angela tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de brindar una buena educación a sus hijos y desea verlos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Angela, 33, lives in the city of Pucallpa with her two children who she loves and are the main reason for living.

She is a very nice, hard working and enthusiastic person who devotes all her efforts to getting her family ahead as she is a single parent. 

Unfortunately due to a lack of economic resources and because she had to work when she was very young, she was unable to study Business Administration like she had wanted to. 

In her free time she likes to stroll through the cozy hot streets in the city and sometimes she will cook a delicious Tacu Tacu [Peruvian steak, rice and beans dish] to share with her family. 

By her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Angela has a small grocery store. She works every day for approximately twelve hours. She believes it is going well for her because she has good prices and great customer service. 

Anglea is very thankful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help she is able to buy a larger quantity and variety of merchandise such as rice, sugar, milk, vegetables, candy, sodas etc. 

Angela will have her business better stocked and will be able to attend to more customers. 

This way she can keep working and striving to reach her big dream of offering a good education to her children who she wants to see working as professionals.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Cynthia Melchorita

texts.es:
Cynthia es una mujer de 21 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y su pequeño bebé recién nacido, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante con su pequeño, ya que ella es padre y madre para su bebé; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Cynthia no pudo terminar sus estudios primarios, tampoco ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería que deseaba, pero le gustaría poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con su bebé y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Frejoles con Seco para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Cynthia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y golosinas, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Cynthia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de mercadería, como arroz, azúcar, leche, menestras, dulces, golosinas, gaseosas y otros, de esta manera Cynthia tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y un puesto de ventas en el centro de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Cynthia is a 21-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Chincha with her parents and her small, recently-born baby. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who dedicates all her effort to getting ahead with her small son, since she is her baby's mother and father. 

Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work since she was very young, Cynthia was unable to finish her primary school studies, nor has she been able to study for the professional nursing degree that she wanted, but she would like to do so.

In her free time she likes to play with her baby and on some occasions cook a delicious "Frejoles con Seco" dish (A Peruvian meat, bean and rice dish) to share with her family. 

On her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Cynthia works in her small store selling groceries and candy. She works every day for approximately 12 hours and believes it is going well for her due to the good prices and friendly treatment she offers to her clients.

Cynthia is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help they offer, she will be able to purchase a larger quantity and variety of products such as rice, sugar, milk, beans, sweets, candy, soda and more. Thus, Cynthia will have her business better stocked and will be able to attend to more clients. 

In this way, she will continue working and striving to achieve her great dream of having her own house and a sales booth in the city center.

loans.use: to buy grocery store products

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 67 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposo e hijos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo han dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo desde muy joven de trabajar, Maria no pudo terminar sus estudios primarios, tampoco pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo novelas y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de sus hijos, Maria trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, adicionalmente los fines de semana trabaja en las afueras de su vivienda vendiendo salchipapas y salchipollo, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Maria se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de mercadería, como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, menestras, golosinas, bebidas y otros, de esta manera Maria tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio restaurant.
texts.en:
Maria is a 67-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Chincha with her husband and children. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person that, together with her husband, dedicates all her effort to getting her family ahead. 

Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work at a very young age, Maria was unable to finish her primary school studies, nor was she able to study for a professional nursing degree. 

In her free time, she likes to distract herself watching "novelas" (soap operas) and, on some occasions, cook a delicious "Carapulcra con Sopa Seca" (A Peruvian meat, potato and pasta dish) to share with her family.

With much effort, dedication and thanks to the support of her children, Maria works in her small store selling groceries, additionally on weekends she works outside her home selling "salchipapas" (A sausage and french fry dish) and "salchipollo" (A sausage, chicken and french fry dish). She works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes it is going well for her due to the good prices and friendly treatment that she offers her clients. 

Maria is very thankful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they provide she will be able to buy a larger quantity and variety of products, such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, beans, candy, soda and more. Thus, Maria will have her business better stocked and she will be able to attend to more clients. 

In this way, she hopes to continue working and striving to achieve her great dream of having her own restaurant.

loans.use: to buy grocery store products

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre de 34 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Huaraz con sus padres, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Rolando no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado ser un gran Abogado, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un  riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Rolando trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de extintores y artículos de seguridad, él trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos productos y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Rolando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea construir la parte trasera de su vivienda, así podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para sus padres, quienes son muy mayores y necesitan de sus cuidados, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Rolando is a 34-year-old, single man who lives in the city of Huaraz with his parents. He is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to excel. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work since he was very young, Rolando could not study for a professional degree, but he would have liked to have been a great lawyer. 

In his free time he likes to listen to music and, on some occasions, cook a delicious "Arroz con Pollo" (Chicken with rice) to share with his family.

Rolando works in his small business selling fire extinguishers and security items, on his own initiative, and with much effort and dedication. He works every day for approximately 12 hours and he believes it is going well for him due to the good products and friendly treatment he offers to his clients. 

Rolando is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help they offer, he will be able to make improvements to his home, since he wishes to build the back of his house and thus offer better security and well-being to his parents, who are older and need his care. In this way, he will continue working and striving to achieve his great dream of having his own home.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home

loans.name: Hector Cayo

texts.es:
Héctor es un hombre de 23 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Huaraz con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Héctor no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría mucho, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Héctor trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de frutas, él trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas, él realiza sus ventas en diversos mercados y en algunas ocasiones en las ferias dominicales de su ciudad, Héctor cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Héctor se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea construir la parte trasera de la casa de sus padres, de esta manera podrá brindarles mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues Héctor seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un gran comerciante mayorista de frutas.
texts.en:
Héctor is 23 years old, single, and lives in the city of Huaraz with his parents and siblings. He is a very friendly, hard-working, and enthusiastic person, who has a grand desire to overcome. Unfortunately, due to the lack of economic resources and that he had to work since a young age, Héctor has not been able to study toward a professional career, but he would really like to. In his free moments, he likes to play soccer with his friends. 

By his own initiative, and with much effort and dedication, Héctor works in his small business selling fruit. He works every day for approximately 10 hours. He makes his sales in different markets and on some occasions at the Sunday fairs in his city. Héctor believes that it is going well for him due to the good prices and the kind manners that he has with customers. 

Héctor is very grateful toward the Kiva lenders: thanks to the help given, he will be able to improve his home, and he wishes to construct the rear part of his parents' house. In this way, he will be able to give them better security and well-being. Héctor will continue working and putting forth the effort in order to achieve his big dream of being a great salesman of wholesale fruits.

loans.use: to improve his home.

loans.name: Kathia Evelyn

texts.es:
Kathia es una mujer de 30 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposo y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con el apoyo de su esposo, dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Kathia no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Farmacia, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Kathia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Kathia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, como útiles escolares y de verano, ya que al iniciar la época escolar desea surtir su negocio con mayor variedad de productos, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una casa adecuada que brinde mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia.
texts.en:
Kathia is a 30 year old woman. She lives in the city of Ica with her husband and her two small children whom she loves and are her main reason for living. She is a very friendly person, hardworking and enthusiastic and she and her husband dedicate all their efforts to bringing up the family. Kathia would have liked to study for a degree in pharmacy, but unfortunately couldn’t due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work since she was very young.

Through her own initiative, with a lot of effort and dedication, Kathia works in her own small business selling groceries. She works every day for approximately 12 hours and she believes it is going will because of her good prices and the friendly service she provides her customers.

Kathia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help provided she can buy merchandise for summer and school supplies as she wants to begin the school season with a better variety of products, as she continues working and struggling to achieve her big dream of having a suitable home that provides greater security and wellbeing for her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store business

loans.name: Ronald Augusto

texts.es:
Ronald es un joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Ronald no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ronald trabaja como Conserje en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Ronald se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que comprara una puerta de fierro para colocar en su vivienda, de esta manera él y su familia podrán contar con mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder convertirse en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Ronald is 19 years old. He lives in the city of Nazca with his parents and siblings. He is a very kind person, hardworking and enthusiastic, who has a great desire to succeed. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and because of the need to work, he could not study towards a professional career, but he would have liked to. In his spare time he likes to listen to music and sometimes he cooks delicious chicken and rice to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with a lot of effort and dedication, Ronald works as a custodian at a commercial business in the city. He works every day for approximately ten hours and believes that it is going well because of his good performance and the kind treatment he gives to others.

Ronald is grateful to Kiva lenders, as thanks to the assistance he can make improvements to his home, as he can buy an iron gate to place at home, so that he and his family will have better security and wellbeing. He will continue working and struggling to achieve his big dream of becoming a good professional.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home

loans.name: Lissex Cecilia

texts.es:
Lissex es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pequeño bebé recién nacido, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante junto con su pequeño; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Lissex no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, pero gracias a su esfuerzo pudo estudiar una pequeña carrera técnica de Costura.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Lissex trabaja como operario en una empresa textil de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Lissex se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una máquina de coser, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder iniciar su pequeño negocio de refacción y costura de prendas de vestir, de esta manera Lissex podrá contar con más ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener su propio taller de costura.
texts.en:
Lissex is a 22 year old woman. She lives in the city of Chincha with her newborn baby. She is a very friendly, hard working and enthusiastic person who dedicates all her efforts to providing for her child. Unfortunately, because of a lack of financial resources and the need to work, Lissex couldn't go to school to study Business, but, because of her hard work, she was able to study to become a seamstress.

With a lot of hard work, drive and dedication, Lissex works as an operator in a textile business in her city. She works everyday, 10 hours a day, and believes that things are going well because of her good performance and because of the friendly way she treats others. 

Lissex is very grateful for the Kiva micro loans because they will help her buy a sewing machine which will help her, in the near future, open her own seamstress shop and increase her income.

loans.use: purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Nelva Florcita

texts.es:
Nelva es una mujer de 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus dos hijos,  a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para sus hijos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Nelva no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Gastronomía, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajando y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Nelva trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y en las mañana vende desayunos, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Nelva se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una cocina, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder preparar adecuadamente sus alimentos, ya que actualmente su cocina presenta desperfectos y su uso es peligroso, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Nelva, 33, lives in Ica with her two beloved children, who are her main reason for living. She is friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic. She strives to provide for her family, and she is both mother and father to her children. Since she did not have the money to go to school and had to start working at an early age, Nelva wasn't able to study cooking professionally. Even in her free time, she likes to be working, and sometimes she prepares a delicious, spicy rice dish to share with her family. 

On her own initiative and with dedication, Nelva runs her small grocery store and sells breakfasts. She works about 12 hours every day, and she believes her business is prospering because her food is tasty and her service is excellent. 

Nelva is grateful to Kiva lenders because, with their help, she will be able to invest in a kitchen to properly prepare her foods. Her kitchen equipment is damaged and dangerous to use. A new kitchen will allow her to keep working and striving to achieve her great dream of owning a house.

loans.use: to buy a kitchen.

loans.name: Andres Roberto

texts.es:
Andrés es un hombre de 59 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que siempre ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su hijo, ya que él es padre y madre para su hijo; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, ya que se quedo huérfano a muy corta edad, Andrés no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios y tampoco pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta preparar deliciosos postres para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Andrés trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de helados y deliciosos postres, como pasteles, alfajores y otros, él trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por la amabilidad que brinda a sus clientes.
Andrés se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea construir una pared de ladrillos y concreto que cerque la parte trasera de su hogar, de esta manera él podrá contar con mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues Andrés seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder tener una gran pastelería.
texts.en:
Andrés is a 59-year-old man and lives in the city of Cañete in the Imperial district with his son, who he loves and is his primary motivation for living.
